source_string: On your device, screen reader support is enabled by default.
translation: 根據預設，螢幕閱讀器在您的裝置為已經啟用。

source_string: We've detected that your system has a screen reader enabled and have automatically enabled Minecraft's screen reader.
translation: 我們已偵測到您的系統已啟用螢幕閱讀器，並已自動啟用 Minecraft 的螢幕閱讀器。

source_string: Touch and drag to find controls on the screen, and double tap controls to select. To scroll on a screen, double tap and hold while swiping up or down.
translation: 觸碰並拖曳以尋找畫面上的控制選項，然後點按兩下控制選項即可選取。若要在畫面上捲動，點按兩下，並在向上或向下滑動時按住。

source_string: We've detected that your account has "Let games read to me" enabled and have automatically enabled Minecraft's screen reader.
translation: 我們已偵測到您的帳戶已啟用「讓遊戲讀給我聽」(Let games read to me) 的功能，並已自動啟用 Minecraft 的螢幕閱讀器。

source_string: Must be an opped player in creative mode
translation: 必須是創造模式中的伺服器工作人員

source_string: Command blocks are not enabled on this server
translation: 這個伺服器不允許使用指令方塊

source_string: Command Input exceeds 500 characters. It is not possible to open the keyboard input on this device type.
translation: 輸入指令超過 500 個字元。無法在此裝置類型上開啟鍵盤輸入。

source_string: Your worlds are not getting saved properly. They might not be here next time you play Minecraft. Go to your Apple TV settings and turn on iCloud to make sure all of your worlds get saved.
translation: 你的世界並未妥善儲存，下回玩 Minecraft 的時候恐怕已經不在。請至 Apple TV 設定開啟 iCloud，確保你所有的世界都會儲存下來。

source_string: You do not have enough iCloud space free to save your worlds properly. They might not be here next time you play Minecraft. Free up space on your iCloud account to make sure all of your worlds get saved.
translation: 你的 iCloud 可用空間不足，無法將世界妥善儲存下來，下回玩 Minecraft 的時候恐怕不復存在。請在 iCloud 帳戶下釋出空間，確保你所有的世界都會儲存下來。

source_string: You need an internet connection to save your worlds properly. They might not be here next time you play Minecraft. Reconnect to the internet to make sure all of your worlds get saved.
translation: 你需要具備網際網路連線，以將世界妥善儲存下來，否則下回玩 Minecraft 的時候恐怕不復存在。請重新連線到網際網路，確保你所有的世界都會儲存下來。

source_string: You need to be signed in to iCloud to play Minecraft. Go to your Apple TV settings and turn on iCloud.
translation: 您需要登入 iCloud，才能玩 Minecraft。請前往 Apple TV 設定並開啟 iCloud。

source_string: A new iCloud account has signed in. You will need to restart Minecraft to play.
translation: 已登入新的 iCloud 帳戶。如要進行遊戲，您必須重新啟動 Minecraft。

source_string: Minecraft wants to access your local network. This allows you and others on your local network to play together. Declining this permission does not affect online features or gameplay. But will prevent you and others, on the same network, from playing together.
translation: Minecraft 想存取您的本地網路。此操作能讓您與本地網路上的其他人一起遊玩。拒絕授權不會影響線上機能或遊玩遊戲，但會讓您無法與其他人在同一個網路中遊玩遊戲。

source_string: To view attributions, please visit https://minecraft.net/attribution in any web browser.
translation: 若要查看署名，請以任何網頁瀏覽器造訪 https://minecraft.net/attribution。

source_string: We're sorry, but this lesson is not currently available.
translation: 很抱歉，此課程目前暫不提供。

source_string: Sign in with your school or organizational account to use Minecraft Education.
translation: 使用你的學校或組織帳戶登入以使用 Minecraft Education。

source_string: This account is not eligible to use Minecraft Education.
Sign in with a different account

translation: 再見，希望很快可以再相見。

source_string: This is your final trial of Minecraft Education.%1%1After this session, your school or organization will need to purchase a license for you to continue to use all the features of Minecraft Education.
translation: 這是你試用 Minecraft Education 的最後一次機會。%1%1 本次試用結束後，你所在學校或組織需要購買許可證才能繼續使用 Minecraft Education 的所有功能。

source_string: You have 1 trial of Minecraft Education remaining before your school or organization will need to purchase a license.%1%1Every time you open Minecraft Education, you will use one trial.
translation: 你還能試用 1 次 Minecraft Education，之後你所在的學校或組織就需要購買許可證。%1%1 每次開啟 Minecraft Education，就會使用一次試用。

source_string: Welcome!%1%1You have %2 trials of Minecraft Education available before your school or organization will need to purchase a license.%1%1Every time you open Minecraft Education, you will use one trial. Enjoy!
translation: 歡迎！%1%1你可試用 %2 次 Minecraft Education，之後學校或組織才需要購買授權。%1%1每次開啟 Minecraft Education，就會使用一次試用次數。祝你玩得愉快！

source_string: You have %2 trials of Minecraft Education remaining before your school or organization will need to purchase a license.%1%1Every time you open Minecraft Education, you will use one trial.
translation: 你還剩下 %2 次的 Minecraft Education 試用次數，之後學校或組織才需要購買授權。%1%1每次開啟 Minecraft Education，就會使用一次試用次數。

source_string: Your trial of Minecraft Education is complete.%1%1Your school or organization will need to purchase a license for you to continue to use all of the features of Minecraft Education.%1%1You'll be signed out of your %2 account now and you can explore our feature-limited demo lesson.
translation: 你的 Minecraft Education 試用版已完畢。%1%1你的學校或組織必須購買授權，才能繼續使用 Minecraft Education 的所有功能。%1%1你現在將從你的 %2 帳戶登出，歡迎探索功能有限的體驗課程。

context: Translations should be 20 characters or less

source_string: We can't connect to the service you need right now. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translation: 我們目前無法連接至您需要的服務。請檢查您的網路連線，或稍後再試一次。

source_string: Another device has logged in using your account.
translation: 另一部裝置已使用您的帳戶登入。

source_string: If you are not an education user, go to the app store to download the standard version.
translation: 如果您不是教育版使用者，請前往 App Store 以下載標準版本。

source_string: Sign In with a Different Account
Your trial of Minecraft Education is complete. To continue playing Minecraft Education, you will need to purchase a license.
translation: 您的《Minecraft Education》已試用完畢。若要繼續玩《Minecraft Education》，您必須購買授權。

source_string: Sorry, we were unable to complete your purchase. Maybe check your internet connection?
translation: 抱歉，我們無法為您完成購買程序，能否請您確認目前的網際網路連線狀態？

source_string: The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and the subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the subscription price option you have previously selected.
translation: 款項於您確認購買時自您的 iTunes 帳戶計收，除非於距離當期結束至少 24 小時前關閉自動續約，否則將自動續訂。當期結束前 24 小時內會依您先前所選取的訂閱服務價格選項，自您的帳戶收取續訂費用。

source_string: You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by accessing your iTunes Account settings after purchase. If you cancel after your subscription has activated, you won't be refunded for the remaining active period of the subscription. Your iTunes account will be linked to your O365 Education Account for this subscription, so you will not be eligible to purchase additional Minecraft Education licenses with this iTunes account.
translation: 購買後，您可以存取自己的 iTunes 帳戶設定以管理自己的訂閱和關閉自動續訂功能。如果您在訂閱啟用後取消，您將無法獲得剩餘訂閱有效期的退款。您的 iTunes 帳戶將於此訂閱中與您的 O365 教育版帳戶連結，因此您不符合使用此 iTunes 帳戶購買額外《Minecraft Education》授權的資格。

source_string: There's something wrong with your account info. Please sign in again to continue using multiplayer features.
translation: 您的帳戶資訊發生問題。請再次登入以繼續使用多人遊戲功能。

source_string: We were unable to sign you in. Please make sure you are signing in with your school or organizational account and try again.
translation: 你無法登入。請確保你正在使用學校或組織帳戶登入，然後重試一次。
了解更多帳戶資格的相關資訊。

source_string: We're sorry, but this version of Minecraft Education is no longer supported. Please update to the latest version to continue playing.
translation: 很抱歉，已不再支援此版本的 Minecraft Education。請更新至最新版本以繼續遊玩。

source_string: Oops! It looks like you signed in with a personal account. This account is not eligible to use Minecraft Education. Please make sure you are signing in with a school or organizational account and try again.
translation: 哎呀！看起來你使用個人帳戶登入了。此帳戶不符合使用 Minecraft Education 的資格。請確保你正在使用學校或組織帳戶登入，然後重試一次。

source_string: To use Minecraft Education you must accept the End-User Licensing Agreement.
translation: 欲使用《Minecraft Education》，您必須接受「使用者授權合約 (EULA)」。

source_string: Click Accept to accept the terms of this agreement.
translation: 按一下 [接受] 接受此合約條款。

source_string: Note! When you sign the book, it will no longer be editable.
translation: 注意！當您在這本書署名後，將無法修改書中內容。

source_string: Height limit for building is %s blocks
translation: 最大建築高度限制為 %s 格

source_string: Minimum height for building is %s blocks

translation: 確定要打開以下網頁嗎？

source_string: Do you want to open this link or copy it to your clipboard?
translation: 確定要打開此連結或複製到剪貼簿嗎？

source_string: Never open links from people that you don't trust!
translation: 千萬不要打開任何可疑人士給的網址！

以靜音方式使用表情符號聊天

source_string: %s is sleeping in a bed. To skip to dawn, %s more users need to sleep in beds at the same time.
translation: %s 正在床舖上睡覺。如果要讓遊戲時間跳至日出，還要有 %s 位使用者同時睡在床舖上。

translation: 您在此伺服器上已暫時更名為「%s」

source_string: You are about to clear all projects. This operation can't be undone. Are you sure?
translation: 您即將清除所有專案。此操作將無法復原。是否確定清除？

source_string: Learn to code in Python! Use a notebook interface to explore computer science lessons, tutorials and challenges.
translation: 學習 Python 中的代碼！使用筆記本介面探索電腦科學課程、教程和挑戰。

source_string: Microsoft MakeCode lets you code Minecraft in Blocks, Python or JavaScript!
translation: Microsoft MakeCode 允許您以 Blocks、Python 或 JavaScript 中為您的 Minecraft 寫碼！

source_string: Mod your world with Tynker! Build mini-games, create instant structures, and make your own mods with code.
translation: 使用 Tynker 設計自己的世界！建立小遊戲、立即建立結構，並使用程式碼製作您自己的 Mod。

source_string: This device does not meet the recommended memory amount. Editors may not work as expected.
translation: 此裝置不符合記憶體容量需求。編輯工具可能無法正常運作。

source_string: Error in editor process, check if your device has enough memory.
translation: 使用編輯工具時發生錯誤，請檢查您的裝置是否有足夠的記憶體。

source_string: Cheats must be enabled in the world to code!
translation: 必須在世界中啟用「作弊」才能進行編碼！

source_string: Unable to connect to network, check your network settings.
translation: 無法連接至網路，請檢查您的網路設定。

source_string: Are you sure you want to change the editor you are using? All unsaved work will be lost.
translation: 您是否確定要變更使用中的編輯器？所有未儲存的工作都將遺失。

source_string: This coding editor will be leaving Minecraft Education soon. You can continue your Minecraft Education coding adventures with MakeCode. Click 'Learn more' for details about this change like timing and how to make a back up of your coding projects.###{MaxLength=1000}
translation: 此代碼編輯器即將離開 Minecraft Education。你可以用 MakeCode 繼續進行 Minecraft Education 的編碼冒險。請按一下「了解更多」以取得關於此變更的詳細資訊，例如時機以及如何備份你的編碼作品。
計分板已刪除，指令已封鎖

source_string: You must provide a non-empty track name.
translation: 您必須提供非空白的曲目名稱。

source_string: %s has been queued and it will start playing when the current track stops.
translation: %s 已佇列，目前的曲目停止後將開始播放。

source_string: %s has been queued to start playing.
Music volume will be updated to %d.

可重新載入並套用權限許可。

source_string: Succeeded in setting operator level for player %s.
translation: 設定玩家 %s 的操作者指令成功。
可重新載入並套用權限許可。

source_string: Failed to list permissions from file, file not found.

權限已自檔案重新載入。

translation: 無法為玩家 %s 設定權限等級 %s。

translation: 設定玩家 %s 的權限等級 %s 成功。

source_string: Could not save permission level %s for player %s.
translation: 無法儲存玩家 %s 的權限等級 %s。

source_string: Succeeded in saving permission level %s for player %s.
translation: 儲存玩家 %s 的權限等級 %s 成功。

source_string: Request to create %1$s sent to all players.
translation: 要求建立發送給所有玩家的 %1$s。

source_string: Feature placement failed. Not all chunks are loaded.
translation: 無法放置功能。未載入所有區塊。

source_string: Places a jigsaw structure, feature, or feature rule in the world.
translation: 在世界中放置一個拼圖結構、功能或功能規則。

source_string: Feature could not be placed at this location.
translation: 功能無法放置在這個位置。

source_string: Invalid max depth. Value must be between 1 and 20.
translation: 無效的最大深度。值必須介於 1 到 20 之間。

source_string: Jigsaw structure generation failed. Structure placed out of bounds.
translation: 拼圖結構生成失敗。結構放置超出範圍。

source_string: Makes one or more entities play a one-off animation. Assumes all variables are setup correctly.
translation: 使一個或多個實體播放一次性動畫。假設所有變數都正確設定。

source_string: Animation request sent to clients for processing.
translation: 已發送至客戶端進行處理的動畫要求。

source_string: Player %1$s is too far away to hear the sound
translation: 玩家 %1$s 距離太遠，聽不到音效
播放 '%1$s' 音效給 %2$s 聽
在 %1$s 網路埠上主持的本機遊戲

source_string: Gets transform, name, and id information about the given target entity or entities.
translation: 取得指定目標實體的轉型、名稱和 ID 資訊。

source_string: Unlocks recipe in the recipe book for a player.
translation: 解鎖玩家配方書中的配方。

source_string: The recipe could not be found.
The recipe is not unlockable in the recipe book.
translation: 該配方在配方書中無法解鎖。

source_string: Reloads all function and script files from all behavior packs, or optionally reloads the world and all resource and behavior packs.
translation: 重新載入所有行為套件中的所有函數和指令碼檔案，或者選擇重新載入世界以及所有資源和行為套件。

source_string: Reloads all function and script files from all behavior packs.
translation: 從所有行為套件中重新載入所有功能檔和指令碼檔。

source_string: Reloading the world has been started.
Function and script files have been reloaded.
translation: 功能檔和指令碼檔已重新載入。

source_string: Only host player can reload the world.
translation: 只有主辦者玩家可以重新載入世界。
無法將 %s 的 %d 插槽取代成 %d * %s

source_string: There is already an item occupying %s slot %d.
translation: 已經有一個物品佔用 %s 槽 %d。

source_string: Block at %s is not a container
translation: 在 %s 的方塊不是容器

source_string: Could not replace slot %d, must be a value between %d and %d.

source_string: Makes entities ride other entities, stops entities from riding, makes rides evict their riders, or summons rides or riders.
translation: 讓實體搭乘其他實體、阻止實體搭乘、讓載具驅逐搭乘者，或是召喚載具或搭乘者。

source_string: Rides that have successfully evicted their riders: %1$s
translation: 成功驅逐搭乘者的載具：%1$s

source_string: Riders that did not meet ride conditions: %1$s
translation: 不符合搭乘條件的搭乘者：%1$s

source_string: The group of riders does not fit on the ride.
translation: 這群搭乘者不適合搭乘。

source_string: The selected entity is not rideable.
The ride is full, so some riders were not added.

source_string: Too many riders were specified. Only one is allowed at a time for teleport_ride.

translation: 指定的載具太多。一次只允許指定一個。

translation: 已成功停止搭乘的搭乘者：%1$s

source_string: Rides were summoned, but these riders could not be added to them: %1$s
translation: 載具受召喚而來，但這些搭乘者無法加入這些載具：%1$s

source_string: Entity was summoned, but it is not rideable.
translation: 實體受召喚而來，但不可搭乘。

source_string: Rides were not summoned for the following entities that already have rides: %1$s

source_string: Riders were summoned, but could not be added to rides: %1$s
translation: 搭乘者受召喚而來，但無法加入這些載具：%1$s

source_string: Riders could not ride these rides because they are full: %1$s

source_string: The following entities are not rideable: %1$s
Control or check how the game saves data to disk.

關閉地圖自動存檔功能
開啓地圖自動存檔功能

source_string: An error occurred when trying to pause the world storage.
translation: 嘗試暫停世界儲存時發生錯誤。

source_string: Data saved. Files are now ready to be copied.
translation: 資料已儲存，檔案現已可供複製。

source_string: A previous save has not been completed.
Changes to the world are resumed.
Checks if a previous save-all has finished and lists the files involved.
translation: 檢查是否之前的全部儲存已經完成，並列出包含在內的檔案。

source_string: Sends a message in the chat to other players.
translation: 在聊天中傳訊息給其他玩家。

source_string: Scheduled function %1$s in %2$d ticks at gametime %3$d.

translation: 結構的大小不能大於 (%1$d、%2$d、%3$d)，原限制為 (%4$d、%5$d、%6$d)

translation: 結構的大小不能小於 (%1$d、%2$d、%3$d)，原限制為 (%4$d、%5$d、%6$d)

source_string: Rawtext object must contain an array. Example: "rawtext":[{..}]
translation: Rawtext 物件必須包含陣列。範例："rawtext":[{..}]

source_string: text field in rawtext must contain a string. Example: "rawtext":[{"text": "text to display"}]
translation: Rawtext 的文字欄位必須包含字串。範例："rawtext":[{"text": "text to display"}]

source_string: translate field in rawtext must contain a language key. Example: "rawtext":[{"translate": "gui.ok"}]
translation: Rawtext 的翻譯欄位必須包含一種語言機碼。範例："rawtext":[{"translate": "gui.ok"}]

source_string: selector field in rawtext must contain a selector as a string. Example: "rawtext":[{"selector": "@e"}]
translation: rawtext 中的選取器欄位必須包含一個選取器作為字串。範例："rawtext":[{"selector": "@e"}]

source_string: score field in rawtext must contain an object. Example "rawtext":[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}]
translation: 原始文本中的分數欄位必須包含物件。範例「rawtext」：[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}]

source_string: name field in the score field must be a string. Example "rawtext":[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}]
translation: 分數欄位中的名稱欄位必須是字串。範例「原始文本」：[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}]

source_string: objective field in the score field must be a string. Example "rawtext":[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}]
translation: 分數欄位中的物件欄位必須是字串。範例「原始文本」：[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}]

source_string: with field in rawtext must contain a array or another rawtext object. Example 1: "rawtext":[{"translate": "chat.type.announcement", "with": [ "value1", "value2" ]}]  Example 2: "rawtext":[{"translate": "chat.type.announcement", "with":{"rawtext":[{"text": "value1"}, {"text": "value2"}]}}]
translation: rawtext 中的欄位必須包含一個陣列或另一個 rawtext 物件。範例 1：「rawtext」:[{"translate": "chat.type.announcement", "with": [ "value1", "value2" ]}] 範例 2：「rawtext」:[{"translate": "chat.type.announcement", "with":{"rawtext":[{"text": "value1"}, {"text": "value2"}]}}]

source_string: Json value in rawtext array was not an object. Example: "rawtext": [{ "text" : "my text" }]
translation: Rawtext 陣列中的 Json 值不是物件。範例："rawtext": [{ "text" : "my text" }]

translation: 控制由用戶端或伺服器負責檢查玩家的移動是否有效。使用「client」設定為用戶端，或使用「server」設定為伺服器。
context: The "client" and "server", specifically in quotation marks. They are the value passed to the command and must be the same for each language and stay in English. The other occurences of the words, not in quotation marks, should be translated
The %s is either client or server in English and represent what was given to the command

translation: 不允許將移動權限設定為 %s，目前值為 %s

source_string: You can share the Connection I D if others have problems joining your world using the Join Code or shared link.
translation: 如果其他人在使用「加入代碼」或「共用連結」加入你的世界時遇到問題，你可以分享連線 ID。

source_string: The host can find the Connection ID on the multiplayer tab of their world's Game Menu.
translation: 主持人可以在自己世界的遊戲選單中，在多人遊戲分頁上找到連線 ID。

source_string: The host can find the Connection ID on the multiplayer tab of their world's Game Menu.
translation: 主持人可以在自己世界的遊戲選單中，在多人遊戲分頁上找到連線 ID。

source_string: Find classmates in the same lesson to join, or enter their IP address if they don't appear in the list.
translation: 尋找相同課程的同學一起加入，或如果沒有在清單中顯示，輸入其 IP 位址。

source_string: Select the group you would like to join, or enter the IP address if it does not appear in the list.
translation: 選擇您要加入的群組，或如果沒有在清單中顯示，輸入其 IP 位址。

source_string: The port number determines the specific server program to use. This will typically not need to be changed unless the server host specifies to do so.
translation: 連接埠編號決定要使用的特定伺服器程式。除非伺服器主機指定要變更，否則通常不需要變更。

source_string: No valid output for that item
translation: 此物品沒有可用的輸出

source_string: You need to collect blocks to craft!
translation: 您需要收集製造用的方塊！

source_string: You need stone materials to craft!
You need stone materials to craft!
You need to collect blocks to craft!
translation: 您需要收集製造用的方塊！
進階設定 (僅供高級玩家！)
更多進階設定 (僅供高級玩家！)

source_string: Alternatively, here's some we made earlier!
translation: 您也可以選擇預先設定的地形！

source_string: Want to share your preset with someone? Use the below box!
translation: 想分享您設定的地形嗎？請使用下方文字框！

source_string: Do not show trial in worlds list
translation: 不要在世界清單中顯示試用

source_string: Add infinite members and play online with up to §d%d§r friends
translation: 添加不限數量成員並與線上多達 §d%d§r 位好友同樂

source_string: Saved online: Play on any Minecraft device with Minecraft Marketplace
translation: 已在線上儲存：在任何有 Minecraft 市集的 Minecraft 裝置上玩

source_string: Takes up zero storage space on your device
Friends can play even when you are away
translation: 即使您不在，好友仍能玩遊戲
使用 Microsoft 帳戶建立 Realm

source_string: Play online with up to 7 friends
translation: 線上與多達 7 位好友同樂

source_string: Saved to your device: Play offline
translation: 預存至您的裝置：離線玩遊戲

source_string: Beds Work ## In this case 'Beds work' means 'Beds function properly'.
§7Try out features that are under development. Can't be turned off after world creation.
translation: §7試玩正在開發的功能。世界創建後無法關閉。

source_string: Create custom biomes and change world generation
translation: 建立自訂生態域並更改世界生成
即將推出的創作者功能

source_string: Includes actor properties and adjustable fog parameters
translation: 包括 Actor 屬性和可調整的霧參數
創作者攝影機的實驗性功能
context: Experimental toggle to enable in development creator camera features

source_string: Enables the use of the latest custom camera features
translation: 啟用最新自訂攝影機功能的使用
context: Description for in development creator camera features toggle

source_string: Doing a lot of repetitive things? This might help creating your add-on
translation: 你正在做許多重複的事情嗎？這或許能協助你建立附加內容

source_string: Explore the new varied cave generation
translation: 探索全新多樣化洞穴生成

source_string: Try out the early versions of Spectator Mode
translation: 嘗試「觀眾模式」的早期版本

source_string: Use "-beta" versions of API modules in add-on packs
translation: 在附加內容套件中使用 API 模組的「測試版」

source_string: Molang experimental queries and language features
translation: Molang 實驗查詢和語言功能

source_string: New features and content for Minecraft 1.21
translation: Minecraft 1.21 版的新功能和內容
重新調整村民交易的平衡性

source_string: Contains updated trades for villagers for the purpose of rebalancing
translation: 包含村民交易更新，旨在重新調整平衡性

source_string: Get to know the Armadillo and gear up your Wolf with the new Wolf Armor!
translation: 了解犰狳，並用新的狼鎧來裝備你的狼！

source_string: Explore new biome improvements and mob variants coming in the first game drop of 2025
translation: 探索 2025 年遊戲更新 1 中即將推出的新型生態域改良設施和變種生物
在 Realms 伺服器上建立

source_string: Are you sure you want to delete "%s"? This world will be lost forever! (A long time!)
translation: 是否確定要刪除「%s」？這個世界將永遠消失！(很久很久！)

source_string: Some settings are disabled because you selected hardcore mode when creating this world.
translation: 由於你在創造這個世界時選擇硬核模式，因此某些設定被停用。

source_string: Unlimited resources. No damage. Flying. No achievements even if you switch to survival later.
translation: 無限資源。無損傷。飛行。即使稍後切換為生存模式也無法獲得成就。

source_string: Limited resources, you'll need tools. You may get hurt. Watch out for Monsters.
translation: 資源有限，您需要工具。您可能會受傷，注意怪物。

source_string: §7Some functionality may be overridden during Editing session, but are fully respected when exported
translation: §7某些功能可能會在編輯會話期間被覆寫，但在匯出時會完全正常運作

source_string: Enter a seed to generate the same terrain again. Leave blank for a random world.
translation: 輸入種子，再度產生相同的地形。留白會隨機挑選世界。
跳過夜晚所需的玩家人數

source_string: How many players must be in bed to skip the night?
translation: 需要多少玩家在床舖上才能跳過夜晚？

source_string: You are not connected to the internet. Your friends will not be able to join your multiplayer worlds. Sign in to your Microsoft account to play with your friends.
translation: 您未連線至網際網路。您的好友將無法加入您的多人遊戲世界。請登入您的 Microsoft 帳戶以與好友一起遊戲。

source_string: You are not connected to Microsoft services. Your friends with Gamertags will not be able to join your multiplayer world. Sign in to your Microsoft account to play with your friends.
translation: 你未連線至 Microsoft 服務。你有玩家代號的好友將無法加入你的多人遊戲世界。請登入 Microsoft 帳戶以與好友一起玩遊戲。
是否刪除世界的玩家資料？

source_string: Select "All Player Data" to delete absolutely all player data from the world. The next time any player enters the world, they will start with fresh, default data.
translation: 選擇「所有玩家資料」可刪除世界中的所有玩家資料。下次任何玩家進入世界的時候，他們將以全新的預設資料開始遊戲。

source_string: Selecting "Keep Owning Player Data", will retain your current data (such as inventory items & location) and apply it the 'World Owner'. This is any player that loads the world locally or the owner of a realm it's on.
translation: 選擇「保留擁有者玩家的資料」將保留您目前的資料 (例如物品欄的物品和位置)，並套用「世界擁有者」。這可以是任何在本機載入世界的玩家或其所在 Realm 的擁有者。
保留擁有者玩家的資料

source_string: Are you sure you want to delete "%s"? This project will be lost forever!
translation: 確定要刪除「%s」嗎？該專案將永遠消失！

source_string: Filename: '%1$s'%2$sLast updated: %3$s%4$sTo download, click OK and then click the 'Download' button.%5$s
translation: 檔案名稱：「%1$s」%2$s最近更新：%3$s%4$s若要下載，請按一下「確認」，然後按「下載」按鈕。%5$s

source_string: Are you sure you want to delete "%1$s" on this device?%2$sThe cloud version '%3$s' will not be affected and can be re-synced later.
translation: 確定要刪除此裝置上的「%1$s」嗎？%2$s雲端版本「%3$s」不會受到影響，且稍後即可重新同步。

source_string: There was a problem saving “%1$s” to the cloud. When exiting a world, please keep Minecraft Education open until the upload completes.%2$sLet’s fix this.
translation: 將「%1$s」儲存至雲端時發生問題。離開世界時，請將 Minecraft Education 保持開啟，直到上傳完成為止。%2$s讓我們來解決這個問題吧。
context: %1$s will be replaced by the world name. %2$s will be replaced by a newline.

source_string: Loads Jigsaw Structures from the behavior pack worldgen folder
translation: 從行為套件 worldgen 資料夾載入拼圖結構
為創作者提供的渲染龍功能

source_string: Enable the deferred rendering pipeline. Requires a PBR-enabled resource pack and compatible hardware.
translation: 啟用延遲的渲染管線。需要已啟用 PBR 的資源套件和相容的硬體。

source_string: Do you want to enable cross-platform play?
translation: 您是否要啟用跨平台遊戲？

source_string: Cross-platform play allows you and friends on other platforms to connect and play together!
translation: 跨平台遊戲可讓您與使用其他平台的好友連線並一起玩遊戲！

source_string: Do you want to disable cross-platform play?
translation: 您是否要停用跨平台遊戲？

source_string: You will no longer connect or play with friends on other platforms.
translation: 您將中斷連線，也不可與使用其他平台的好友一起玩遊戲。

source_string: Enable cross-platform play in the main menu to be able to join Realms, LAN Games, and play with all your Minecraft friends.
translation: 在主選單中啟用跨平台遊戲，就可加入 Realm、LAN 遊戲，並與您所有 Minecraft 好友一起玩遊戲。

source_string: Enable cross-platform play in the main menu to invite friends on other platforms.
translation: 在主選單中啟用跨平台遊戲，就可邀請其他平台的好友。

source_string: Enable cross-platform play in the main menu to join Realms.
translation: 在主選單中啟用跨平台遊戲，就可加入 Realm。

source_string: Enable cross-platform play in the main menu to add or join Servers.
translation: 在主選單中啟用跨平台遊戲，就可新增或加入伺服器。

source_string: Enable cross-platform play in the main menu to play with friends on other platforms.
translation: 在主選單中啟用跨平台遊戲，就可與其他平台的好友一起玩遊戲。

source_string: Something went wrong. We could not add the players you selected to your Realm. Please try again later.
translation: 發生問題。我們無法將你選擇的玩家加入你的 Realm。請稍後再試。
將玩家從 Realm 中移除
context: {StrContains="Realm"}

source_string: Come join me in this realm!
This will disable the current link and generate a new one. Anyone who became a member already will still be able to join your Realm.
translation: 這將停用目前的連結並生成一個新連結。任何已經成為成員的人仍然可以加入你的 Realm。
要產生 Realm 連結嗎？

source_string: Anyone who opens this link will become a member of your Realm. You can disable a link by generating a new one.
translation: 任何開啟此連結的人都將成為你的 Realm 成員。你可以透過生成新連結來停用連結。
要在分享前先下載備份資料嗎？

source_string: Anyone with this link can become a member of your Realm. Be careful who you share it with. You may want to download a backup of your world first. You can remove members from Realm settings.
translation: 任何擁有此連結的人都可以成為你的 Realm 的成員。請謹慎選擇分享對象。你可能會希望先下載世界備份。你可以從 Realm 設定中移除成員。

source_string: Your Realm is closed. Members cannot join.
translation: 你的 Realm 已經關閉。成員無法加入。

source_string: Do you want to revoke access for this player? You can undo this at any time.
translation: 要撤銷此玩家的存取權限嗎？您可以隨時復原此動作。

source_string: Link to your realm copied to clipboard!
translation: 您的 Realm 連結已複製到剪貼簿！

source_string: Failed to set permission for user %s.
translation: 無法為使用者 %s 設定權限。

source_string: Do you want to clear the members list of this realm?
translation: 您是否要清除此 Realm 的成員清單？

context: {StrContains="Realm"}
{StrContains="Realm"}

source_string: Sorry, you've been blocked! Ask the Realm's owner to remove you from the Blocked list.
translation: 很抱歉，你已被封鎖了！請要求 Realm 的擁有者將你從封鎖清單中移除。

source_string: The invite link is either incorrect or deactivated. Ask the Realm's owner for an updated link and make sure you've entered it correctly.
translation: 邀請連結不正確或已停用。請向 Realm 的擁有者詢問更新後的連結，並確定輸入正確無誤。

source_string: Failed to generate new invite link
translation: 無法產生新的邀請連結

source_string: %s has expired. Ask %s to renew it.
%s is closed. Ask %s to reopen it.
translation: %s 已關閉。請 %s 重新開啟。

source_string: Sign in to join this Realm
You need to be signed in to a Microsoft account to join a Realm. Please sign in and try again.
translation: 你必須登入 Microsoft 帳戶才能加入 Realm。請登入然後再試一次。

source_string: Sorry, we had a problem connecting to the Realm. Please try again later.
translation: 很抱歉，連接到 Realm 資料庫時發生問題。請稍後再試。
建立一個 Realm 伺服器

source_string: Create For Free!%s(%s/month after first 30 days)
translation: 免費建立！%s (頭 30 天後每月 %s)

source_string: Your realm name cannot be blank.
translation: 您的 Realm 名稱不可空白。

source_string: Your realm name cannot be blank, and you must accept the terms of service to create a realm.
translation: 您的 Realm 名稱不可空白，同時您必須接受服務條款以建立 Realm。

source_string: Must accept terms and conditions to create a realm.
translation: 必須接受條款與條件以建立 Realm。

source_string: Sorry, we were unable to complete your realm purchase. Maybe check your internet connection?
translation: 抱歉，我們無法完成您的 Realm 購買程序，可否請您檢查網際網路連線？

source_string: Your purchase succeeded, but we couldn't create your Realm right now. We will create your Realm as soon as possible. Check back later on this device. If this problem happens for more than a day, please contact Mojang Support.
translation: 您已成功購買，但此刻尚無法為您建立 Realm，我們會盡快為您建立 Realm。請稍後返回本裝置查看。若該問題持續超過一天，請聯絡 Mojang 客服。

source_string: The Realm name %s is not allowed.
translation: 不允許使用 Realm 名稱 %s。

source_string: Club name could not be verified. Please try again later.
translation: 無法驗證俱樂部名稱。請稍後再試。

source_string: The Realm description you selected contains words that others may find offensive and cannot be used. Please change the Realm description and try again.
translation: 您選擇的 Realm 敘述包含可能讓其他人覺得冒犯的字詞，因此無法使用。請變更 Realm 敘述後再試一次。

source_string: The world name %s is not allowed.
translation: 世界名稱 %s 不允許使用。

source_string: You have the maximum number of active subscriptions on this platform and cannot create a new one right now.
translation: 您在此平台已達可用訂閱數目上限，因此現在無法建立新的訂閱。

source_string: Your device lost connection to the store and we can't confirm this offer is still available. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
translation: 您的裝置與商店的連線中斷，我們無法確認此優惠是否仍然可用。請檢查您的網際網路連線或稍後再試。

source_string: Your device lost connection to the store and we can't confirm this offer is still available. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
translation: 您的裝置與商店的連線中斷，我們無法確認此優惠是否仍然可用。請檢查您的網際網路連線或稍後再試。

source_string: You have extended your Realms subscription as long as possible. You cannot add this additional time right now. Try again later.
translation: 你已經儘可能延長了你的 Realms 訂閱。現在，你無法新增額外時間。請稍後再試。

source_string: To view the terms and conditions for Minecraft Realms, please visit https://www.minecraft.net/eula in any web browser.
translation: 若要檢視 Minecraft Realms 條款及細則，請以任何網頁瀏覽器造訪 https://www.minecraft.net/eula。

source_string: To view the privacy policy for Minecraft Realms, please visit https://aka.ms/mcprivacy in any web browser.
translation: 若要檢視 Minecraft Realm 的隱私權政策，請以任何網頁瀏覽器造訪 https://aka.ms/mcprivacy。

source_string: Purchase in progress! This shouldn't take long.
translation: 正在為您處理購買事宜！應該不用等太久喔。

source_string: Unable to connect to Realms and complete your purchase at this time. Please try again later.
translation: 此刻無法連線至 Realms，未能完成您的購買。請稍後再試一次。

source_string: It looks like we didn't finish things last time. Let's complete creating your realm now.
translation: 看來上次的事情還沒有完成。現在，讓我們完成你的 Realm 建立。

source_string: It looks like you started creating a realm with a different Microsoft account. Do you want to complete creating that realm with this Microsoft account as the owner?
translation: 你似乎開始使用不同的 Microsoft 帳戶建立 Realm。是否要使用此 Microsoft 帳戶作為擁有者，完成該 Realm 的建立？

source_string: Someone started creating a Realm with the billing account on this device. Would you like to complete creating that Realm with this Microsoft account as the owner?
translation: 有人開始在此裝置上使用付費帳戶建立 Realm。是否要以擁有者的身分，透過此 Microsoft 帳戶完成 Realm 的建立？

source_string: It looks like we didn't finish things last time. Let's complete renewing your realm now.
translation: 看來上次的事情還沒有完成。現在，讓我們完成你的 Realm 續訂。

source_string: It looks like you started renewing a realm with a different Microsoft account.  Do you want to complete renewing that realm with this Microsoft account as the owner?
translation: 你似乎用另一個 Microsoft 帳戶開始了 Realms 續訂流程。你是否要使用目前這個 Microsoft 帳戶完成續訂並成為 Realm 的擁有者？

source_string: Someone started renewing a realm with the billing account on this device.  Would you like to complete renewing that realm with this Microsoft account as the owner?
translation: 已有人用此裝置上的計費帳戶開始續訂 Realm。你是否要以擁有人身分用這個 Microsoft 帳戶完成該 Realm 的續訂程序？

source_string: You are attempting to create a new realm but a prior purchase was found for renewing a realm. Would you like to apply that purchase now?
translation: 你正在嘗試建立新 Realm，但我們找到可用於續訂 Realm 的先前購買內容。是否要立即套用購買內容？

source_string: You are attempting to renew a realm but a prior purchase was found for creating a realm. Would you like to apply that purchase now?
translation: 你正在嘗試續訂 Realm，但我們找到可用於建立 Realm 的先前購買內容。是否要立即套用購買內容？

source_string: You are attempting to renew a realm but a prior purchase was found for a different realm. Would you like to apply that purchase now?
translation: 你正在嘗試續訂 Realm，但我們找到可用於不同 Realm 的先前購買內容。是否要立即套用購買內容？

source_string: We need you to sign in to the store to view your purchase history before we can continue.
translation: 您必須登入至商店才能檢視您的購買記錄，然後才能繼續。
現在要在 Realm 上遊戲嗎？

source_string: You can invite friends to your Realm and start playing now.
translation: 您可以邀請好友至您的 Realm，並立即開始玩遊戲。

source_string: Otherwise, you can find it anytime in the Worlds tab of the Play screen. Edit it to change game modes or even upload any world to your Realm.
translation: 或者您隨時可以在「遊戲」畫面的「世界」標籤中尋找。編輯即可變更遊戲模式，甚至可以上傳任何世界至您的 Realm。

source_string: Are you sure you want to create a Realm?
Are you sure you want to extend a Realm?
Are you sure you want to renew a Realm?
Resetting a Realm permanently erases the world and starts over. Are you sure you want to do this?
translation: 重設 Realm 會永久消除世界並重新開始。是否確實要執行此動作？

source_string: Failed to reset the Realm. Would you like to try again?
translation: 未能重設 Realm。您要再試一次嗎？

source_string: Failed to open/close the Realm. Would you like to try again?
translation: 未能開啟/關閉 Realm。您要再試一次嗎？

source_string: Your device does not support Minecraft Realms.
translation: 您的裝置未支援 Minecraft Realms。

source_string: The owner pays monthly. Their friends can join for free!
translation: 擁有人每月付費，其好友可免費加入！

source_string: Realms are private Minecraft worlds that are always available for you and your friends.
translation: Realms 是為您和好友永遠開放的私人 Minecraft 世界。

source_string: You can play on them even when the owner of the Realm is away and from any device running Minecraft!
translation: 即使 Realm 擁有者不在，您仍可從執行 Minecraft 的任何裝置在其中遊玩！

source_string: Realms, the safe, simple way to share a Minecraft world with friends, is not available while using beta versions of Minecraft.
translation: Realms 是與好友分享 Minecraft 世界既安全又簡便的方式，在使用 Beta 版 Minecraft 時並未提供。

source_string: If you'd like to stop using the beta and access Realms, click below for instructions.
translation: 若您想停止使用 Beta 以存取 Realms，請按下方取得指示。

source_string: Sign In to Try for Free!
Start Your Free 30 Day Trial%s(%s/mo after the first month)

source_string: There's a lot of exciting new stuff in this new version of Minecraft! Check out the Marketplace, create a Realm, and play online with Cross-Platform friends!

%1$s was obliterated by a sonically-charged shriek
translation: %1$s 被一聲尖銳的尖叫聲抹去了

source_string: %1$s was obliterated by a sonically-charged shriek whilst trying to escape %2$s
translation: %1$s 在試圖逃離 %2$s 時，被一聲尖銳的尖叫聲抹去了

%1$s was doomed to fall by %2$s using %3$s
translation: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 打下懸崖

source_string: %1$s fell too far and was finished by %2$s
%1$s fell too far and was finished by %2$s using %3$s
translation: %1$s 重摔後被 %2$s 用 %3$s 殺了

source_string: You cannot respawn in hardcore mode!
translation: 您無法在極限模式中重生！

source_string: Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to exit the game to the main menu?
translation: 確定要離開並返回主選單嗎？

source_string: Are you sure you want to save and leave the game?
translation: 您確定要儲存並離開遊戲嗎？

source_string: This demo will last five game days, do your best!
translation: 試玩版只剩下五天的遊戲時間，盡您所能吧！

translation: 您度過了第五天，按 F2 來擷圖留念

translation: 您可以在遊戲中試玩五天 (約為現實世界的 1 小時 40 分鐘)。選單的「成就」選項中有一些實用的提示。希望您玩得開心！

source_string: Use %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s and the mouse to move around
The demo time has expired, buy the game to continue or start a new world!
translation: 試玩時間已經結束，要繼續玩請購買遊戲，或重新開始新的世界！

source_string: The demo time has expired, start a new world to continue playing the trial!
translation: 試玩時間已結束，若要繼續玩試玩版請開始新的世界！

source_string: Are you sure you want to lock the difficulty of this world? This will set this world to always be %1$s, and you will never be able to change that again.
translation: 確定要鎖定此世界的難易度嗎？這樣會把此世界永久設定為 %1$s 而無法更改。

source_string: You are being displayed as a default character
This server has %s disabled. You can switch to a different skin in the dressing room.
translation: 此伺服器已停用%s。您可以在更衣室中切換成不同的外觀。

source_string: This server has %s disabled. Are you sure want to keep this skin equipped?
translation: 此伺服器已停用 %s。您確定要繼續裝備這個外觀嗎？

source_string: Error while downloading packs from server. Please try again.
translation: 從伺服器下載套件時發生錯誤。請再試一次。

You were kicked from the game:
You were removed from the game
You were removed from the game:

無效的階段 (請重新啟動遊戲)

source_string: The authentication servers are currently down for maintenance.
translation: 正版驗證系統下線維修中。

source_string: The server was shut down due to an unhandled scripting watchdog exception.
translation: 伺服器關閉，因為指令碼監視程式出現未處理的異常。

source_string: The server was shut down due to exceeding the scripting memory limit.
translation: 伺服器由於超出指令碼記憶體限制而關閉。

source_string: Unable to join this specific server.
translation: 無法加入此特定伺服器。

source_string: Biome Packet has mixed id presence for Custom Biomes
translation: 生態域套件存在自訂生態域的混合 ID

source_string: Custom Biome %s uses ID from a reserved range. ID range for Custom Biomes is: %s-%s
translation: 自訂生態域 %s 使用了保留範圍的 ID。ID 範圍為自訂生態域：%s-%s

source_string: Vanilla Biome data should not contain 'id' field
translation: 原版生態域資料不應包含「ID」欄位

translation: 客戶端與伺服器的方塊不相符。

source_string: Realm not found, or you are not a member.
translation: 找不到 Realm，或者你不是其成員。

source_string: Enable cross-platform play in the main menu to connect with friends on other platforms. To play with other friends online without cross-play, the host of the game must also have cross-play disabled via the main menu.
translation: 在主選單中啟用跨平台遊戲，與其他平台的好友連線。若要與線上的其他好友遊玩而不進行交叉遊戲，遊戲主持人還必須透過主選單停用交叉遊戲。

source_string: Your client is incompatible or out of date. Update your client to connect to realms.
translation: 您的用戶端不相容或已過時。請更新您的用戶端以連線至 Realms。

source_string: Testing the Realms Alpha has ended. Thank you for helping!
translation: 測試 Realms Alpha 已經結束。感謝你的協助！

source_string: Realms is not available right now.
This world was saved from Minecraft Education. It cannot be loaded.
translation: 這個世界是從 Minecraft Education 儲存，無法載入。

source_string: The server is not running Minecraft Education. Failed to connect.
translation: 伺服器未執行 Minecraft Education，連結失敗。

source_string: The server is running an incompatible edition of Minecraft. Failed to connect.
translation: 伺服器正在執行的 Minecraft 版本不相容。連線失敗。

source_string: The world you selected cannot be opened in this version of Minecraft Education.
translation: 您選擇的世界無法在此版本的《Minecraft Education》中開啟。

source_string: A newer version of the game has saved this world. It cannot be loaded.
translation: 遊戲的新版本已經儲存了這個世界，無法載入。

source_string: We were unable to connect you.
There was a problem finding this server.
translation: 尋找這個伺服器時發生問題。

source_string: We were unable to connect you. Try adding a new server.
translation: 系統無法建立連線，請嘗試新增伺服器。

source_string: There was a problem loading this world.
translation: 載入這個世界時發生問題。

source_string: There was a problem finding this Realm.
translation: 尋找此 Realm 時發生問題。

source_string: There was a problem finding this server.
translation: 尋找這個伺服器時發生問題。

source_string: This world's multiplayer setting is set to friends only. You must be friends with the host of this world to join.
translation: 此世界的多人遊戲設定已設為僅限好友。您必須是此世界主持人的好友才能加入。

source_string: The Skin that you have equipped is from a content pack that is not allowed in cross-platform multiplayer games.
translation: 您所裝備的外觀來自內容套件，不可於跨平台多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: The Skin that you have equipped is from a content pack that is not allowed in multiplayer games.
translation: 您所裝備的外觀來自內容套件，不可於多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: The world has been set to single player mode.
translation: 世界已設定為單人玩家模式。

source_string: Please check your connection to the internet and try again.
translation: 請確認網際網路連線狀態後重試。

source_string: You're not invited to play on this server.
translation: 您未受邀在此伺服器上玩遊戲。

source_string: You need to authenticate to Microsoft services.
translation: 您必須向 Microsoft 服務完成驗證。

source_string: The host is using an older version of Minecraft. Everyone should update to the latest version of Minecraft and try again.
translation: 主持人使用舊版本的 Minecraft。所有人應該更新至最新版本的 Minecraft，然後再試一次。

source_string: You need to update your game to continue playing on this Realm.
translation: 您需要更新遊戲，以繼續在此 Realm 遊歷。

source_string: Your game is up-to-date but this Realm is not.
translation: 您的遊戲為最新，但此 Realm 則否。

source_string: We can't update your Realm server right now because other players are currently online. You can close and reopen your Realm from the Manage Realm screen to make the other players quit and then join your Realm to update it.
translation: 我們無法立刻更新您的 Realm 伺服器，因為其他玩家還在線上。您可以從管理 Realm 畫面關閉並重啟您的 Realm，讓其他玩家退出，然後再加入您的 Realm 進行更新。

source_string: The Realm you are attempting to access is a different version. Contact the owner of the Realm to address the issue.
translation: 您嘗試存取的 Realm 是另一個版本。請連絡 Realm 的主辦人以解決此問題。

source_string: Your Realm will soon be updated. You will need an update too.
translation: 您的 Realm 即將更新，您也將需要更新。
立即檢查有無遊戲更新？
請在開發商選項中指定版本。

source_string: Wow this server is popular! Check back later to see if space opens up.
translation: 哇，此伺服器人數過多！請稍後回來查看是否有多餘空間。

source_string: Cannot join world. The account you are signed in to is currently playing in this world on a different device.
translation: 無法加入世界。您登入的帳戶目前正使用期他裝置在此世界中玩遊戲。

source_string: Unable to connect to world. The world is no longer available to join.
translation: 無法連接至世界。世界已不再開放加入。

source_string: There was a problem connecting to the world. Please try again. If this error continues, check your internet connection or try restarting Minecraft.
translation: 連接至世界時發生問題。請再試一次。如果這個錯誤持續發生，請檢查您的網際網路連線，或嘗試重新啟動 Minecraft。

source_string: It appears you are unable to connect to your network, please connect to a Wi-Fi network or enable 'Use Mobile Data' in profile settings.
translation: 您似乎無法連上網路，請連線到 Wi-Fi 網路或在個人資料設定中啟用「使用行動網路」。

source_string: Unable to connect to the world. Please check your join code and try again.
translation: 無法連線至世界。請檢查你的加入代碼，然後重試一次。

source_string: Encountered a problem while downloading or applying resource pack.
translation: 下載或套用資源套件時遇到問題。

source_string: Unable to connect, please restart your client.
translation: 無法連接，請重新啟動用戶端。
伺服器傳來的封包不完整。

source_string: Realms are disabled for the beta.
translation: Realm 在測試版中無法使用。

source_string: You are unable to join the world because you have the following incompatible packs: %s
translation: 您無法加入世界，因為您擁有下列的不相容套件：%s

source_string: You are unable to join the world because your device doesn't have enough memory for the following packs: %s
translation: 您無法加入世界，因為您的裝置沒有足夠的記憶體可安裝以下套件：%s

source_string: You are unable to join the world because your device doesn't have compatible hardware to support ray tracing
translation: 您無法加入世界，因為您的裝置沒有相容硬體可支援光線追蹤

source_string: Try reopening the world or restoring it from a previous backup
translation: 嘗試重新開啟世界，或使用之前的備份還原
因世界損毀而中斷連接

source_string: Disconnected due to the server being unavailable
translation: 由於伺服器無法使用，連結已中斷

source_string: The server provided invalid height values for the overworld dimension
translation: 伺服器為主世界維度提供了無效的高度值

source_string: This world is a not in Editor Mode. It cannot be loaded.
translation: 這個世界未處於編輯器模式，無法載入。

translation: 這個世界目前處於編輯器模式，無法載入。

source_string: The server is not in Editor Mode. Failed to connect.
translation: 伺服器未處於編輯器模式，連線失敗。

source_string: The server is in Editor Mode. Failed to connect.
translation: 伺服器處於編輯器模式，連線失敗。

source_string: Server and Client have different values set for feature toggle 'Client Side Generation'
translation: 伺服器和用戶端為切換功能「用戶端生成」所設定的數值不同

source_string: Ray Tracing enabled resource packs are not yet compatible with Editor projects.
translation: 啟用光線追蹤的資源套件仍與編輯器專案不相容。

source_string: Disconnected due to an unexpected type of packet received which cannot be processed.  This could be due to a version mismatch or corruption at the networking level.
translation: 因為收到無法處理的非預期資料包而斷線。可能是因為版本不匹配或網路層面的損壞所致。

source_string: The connection to the host was lost. If that world is still being hosted, please check your internet connection and try to connect again.
translation: 與主機的連線已中斷。如果該世界仍在運作中，請檢查您的網際網路連線，並且嘗試重新連線。

translation: 試著以試玩模式開啟這個世界。

source_string: You are almost out of data storage space! Minecraft has restricted access to this feature until you clear up additional storage space.
translation: 您的資料儲存空間即將用罄！《Minecraft》已限制此功能的存取，直到您清出額外的儲存空間為止。

source_string: Your device is almost out of the space that Minecraft can use to save worlds and settings on this device. Why not delete some old stuff you don't need so that you can keep saving new stuff?
translation: 你的裝置上幾乎沒有可供 Minecraft 保存世界和設定的空間了。不如刪除一些不需要的舊東西，繼續儲存新的內容？

source_string: You are out of data storage space and Minecraft is unable to save your progress! Minecraft will return you to the Main Menu to clear up storage space.
translation: 您的資料儲存空間即將用罄！《Minecraft》無法儲存您的進度！《Minecraft》將讓您返回主選單以清出儲存空間。

translation: 連線至 OneDrive 時發生問題。儲存在雲端的世界有可能不是最新版本。另外，您可能需要檢查您的網際網路狀態。

translation: 確定要刪除「%s 」的世界範本？ 這不會影響您從該範本所建立的任何世界。

source_string: World templates are blueprints. You can use them to create new worlds that always start out the same.
translation: 世界範本就是藍圖。您可以使用相同範本來建立新世界。

translation: 您可以從 Minecraft Education 資料庫、其他 Minecraft Education 使用者、或 education.minecraft.net 處取得世界範本

translation: 在當地語系化資料夾中瀏覽搜尋 languages.json
錯誤：選取的檔案並非 languages.json

source_string: You can't copy this world because your device doesn't have enough available storage space. Free up some space and try again.
translation: 無法複製這個世界，因為您的裝置沒有足夠的可用儲存空間。請先釋出一些空間再重試。

source_string: This world must be imported before you can use it in the Beta.
translation: 您必須先匯入這個世界，才能在測試版中使用。

source_string: Importing the world creates a copy, and will not affect the original world.
translation: 匯入世界會建立一個副本，且不會影響原始世界。

source_string: Would you like to make a Beta copy of this world?
translation: 您想製作這個世界的測試版嗎？

source_string: Do you want to exit Minecraft?

translation: 向建立者傳送意見反應

source_string: Write down any feedback and send it directly to the creator. Your message will not be posted to the Marketplace and the creator will not be able to respond.
translation: 寫下任何意見反應，並將其直接傳送給建立者。您的資訊將不會發佈到市集，建立者將無法回復。

source_string: What do you like? What could be better?
translation: 你喜歡什麼？還有什麼比這更好的呢？

source_string: Thank you for sharing your review!
You do not own this item you are trying to provide feedback for. (Error Code: %d)
translation: 您不是您嘗試為其提供意見反應此物品的所有者。(錯誤代碼：%d)

source_string: Oh no! You have sent too many reviews, please try again later. (Error Code: %d)
translation: 哦不！您送出了太多評論，請稍後再試。(錯誤代碼：%d)

source_string: Cannot submit your review at this time, please try again later. (Error Code: %d)
translation: 目前無法提交您的評論，請稍後再試。(錯誤代碼：%d)

source_string: Something went wrong. Try checking your internet connection.
translation: 發生錯誤。請檢查您的網際網路連線。

source_string: We could not create a copy of this project. This may be caused by a lack of storage space or another issue. See https://aka.ms/MCStorage for more information.
translation: 無法建立該專案的複本，可能是儲存空間不足或其他問題所造成。如需更多資訊，請前往 https://aka.ms/MCStorage。

context: Use Minecraft 教育版 in zh_CN translation
Use 离开 Minecraft 教育版? in zh_CN translation

translation: 是否要退出 Minecraft 教育預覽版？

source_string: Update to the latest version to access all the new features, play with friends online, or see what's new in the Marketplace.
translation: 請更新至最新版本以存取所有新功能、在線上與好友一起玩遊戲，或查看市集中有哪些新商品。

source_string: This version of Minecraft can no longer access Minecraft Marketplace. Update to the latest version to restore Marketplace access.
translation: 此《Minecraft》版本已無法再存取 Minecraft 市集。請更新至最新版本以還原市集的存取。

source_string: Please update to the latest version to download your pack purchased in Minecraft Marketplace.
translation: 請更新至最新版本以下載您在 Minecraft 市集中購買的套件。

context: Meaning: Everything Overworld in alphabetical order

source_string: Add-Ons are a content type available in the Minecraft Marketplace that lets you add custom blocks, items, mobs, recipes, and other game content to your world.
translation: 「附加內容」是 Minecraft 市集中提供的一種內容類型，它可讓你新增自訂方塊、物品、生物、配方和其他遊戲內容至你的世界中。

source_string: Add-Ons allow you to modify your existing worlds and Realms through the Edit World screen and the Create New World screen.
translation: 「附加內容」允許你藉由「編輯世界」畫面和「建立新世界」畫面來修改現有世界和 Realm。

source_string: Stacking, or adding multiple Add-Ons, can increase loading times, and could result in unexpected results.
translation: 堆疊或新增多個附加內容可能會增加載入時間，並可能導致意外結果。

source_string: We recommend that you save a copy of your world or Realm before adding or removing Add-Ons.
translation: 我們建議您在新增或移除附加內容之前保存您的世界或 Realm 的複本。

source_string: For more information about how you can make the most out of Add-Ons, you can visit our FAQ page.
translation: 有關如何充分利用附加元內容的更多資訊，您可以造訪我們的常見問題頁面。

source_string: Adventure Mode is a gamemode for world builders. In Adventure Mode, players must use special tools to place or break blocks.
translation: 冒險模式是專為喜歡建造世界的玩家設計的遊戲模式，玩家可以使用特殊的工具來放置或破壞方塊。

source_string: To get these special tools, you must use §e/give§f with §ecanplace§f or §ecandestroy§f parameters while in creative mode.
translation: 如要取得這些特殊工具，你必須在創造模式中將 §e/give§f 搭配 §ecanplace §f 或 §ecandestroy§f 參數一起使用。

source_string: Experience Levels can be used to repair, enchant, or rename items with the Anvil.
translation: 經驗等級可用於使用鐵砧修復、附魔或重新命名物品。
重新命名和套用附魔效果

source_string: All items can be renamed, although only items with durability can be repaired or enchanted with Books on the Anvil.
translation: 所有物品都能重新命名，但只有具備耐久度的物品才能使用鐵砧上的書本來修復和附魔。

source_string: An item can be repaired by placing it in one of the input slots on the left, along with either some raw materials of the item, like Iron Ingots for an Iron Sword, or combined with another item of the same type.
translation: 只要將物品和一些物品的原料 (例如鐵劍的鐵錠塊) 放到左側的輸入欄中，或是與另一個同類型的物品結合，就能修復物品。

source_string: Combining items is more efficient when done with an Anvil.
translation: 使用鐵砧結合物品更有效率。

source_string: There is a chance that the Anvil will be damaged with each use and after enough usage it will be destroyed.
translation: 每次使用都有可能會對鐵砧造成損害，使用過度的話鐵砧就會銷毀。

source_string: By wearing Armor, you can protect yourself from incoming damage. Your Armor level is represented by :armor: on the HUD, the higher the level, the less damage you will take.
translation: 只要穿上盔甲，您就能抵擋外來的傷害。您的盔甲等級會在 HUD 上以 :armor: 表示。等級越高，您受到的傷害就越少。

source_string: Armor can be crafted from Leather, Iron, Gold, or Diamond. Chainmail Armor can be obtained through villager trading and loot from zombies and skeletons.
translation: 護甲可以用皮革、鐵、金或鑽石來製作。鎖鏈護甲可以透過與村民交易或從殭屍和骷髏的戰利品取得。

source_string: Equip Armor by opening your inventory and moving pieces of Armor to the appropriate slot next to your player skin.
translation: 只要開啟物品欄，然後將盔甲部件移到玩家外觀旁的合適空格上，就能配備盔甲。

source_string: Iron, Chainmail, and Golden Armor can be smelted into Iron or Gold Nuggets in a Furnace.
translation: 鐵護甲、鎖鏈護甲和黃金護甲可以在熔爐中熔煉成鐵塊或金粒。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: The Shield will block incoming damage. The Shield can be equipped in the offhand slot as well as the hotbar. Press and hold :_input_key.sneak: to block with the Shield.
translation: 盾可以格擋即將到來的傷害。盾可以裝備在副手物品欄以及物品槽。按住 :_input_key.sneak: 可使用盾來格擋。

source_string: The Shield will block incoming damage. The Shield can be equipped in the offhand slot as well as the hotbar. Press :_input_key.sneak: or press :_gamepad_stick_right: to toggle block with the Shield.
translation: 盾可以格擋傷害，還可以裝備在副手物品欄以及物品槽。按下 :_input_key.sneak: 按鈕或按 :_gamepad_stick_right: 可切換使用盾來格擋。

source_string: The Shield blocks all kinds of incoming damage - even a Creeper explosion! It can be equipped in the offhand slot or the hotbar.
translation: 盾牌可以格擋各種的傷害－甚至是苦力怕爆炸！它可以裝備在副手欄或快捷欄上。

source_string: When using the "D-Pad & tap to interact" control scheme, tap :touch_sneak: to toggle blocking with the shield.
translation: 使用「方向鍵點擊以互動」控制方案時，點擊 :touch_sneak: 來使用盾牌格檔。

source_string: When using a "Joystick" control scheme, tap :tip_virtual_button_sneak: to toggle blocking with the shield.
translation: 使用「搖桿」控制方案時，點擊 :tip_virtual_button_sneak: 以使用盾牌格擋。

source_string: The Shield will block incoming damage. The Shield can be equipped in the offhand slot as well as the hotbar. Press :_input_key.sneak: or click :rift_X: to toggle block with the Shield.
translation: 盾可以格擋所受傷害。盾可以裝備在副手物品欄以及物品槽。按 :_input_key.sneak: 或按一下 :rift_X: 可切換使用盾來格擋。

source_string: The Shield will block incoming damage. The Shield can be equipped in the offhand slot as well as the hotbar. Press :_input_key.sneak: or click :windowsmr_right_stick: to toggle block with the Shield.
translation: 盾可以格擋所受傷害。盾可以裝備在副手物品欄以及物品槽。按 :_input_key.sneak: 或按一下 :windowsmr_right_stick: 可切換使用盾來格擋。

source_string: The Shield can even block a Creeper explosion!
translation: 盾甚至可以格擋苦力怕爆炸！

source_string: You can also wear a Carved Pumpkin on your head. This won't give you any :armor: but will make it so Endermen won't get mad when you look at them.
translation: 您也可以把雕刻過的南瓜戴在頭上。這麼做雖然不會增加任何 :armor:，卻能讓終界使者不會因為您盯著它們瞧而發飆。

source_string: An Armor Stand holds your armor while you aren't using it.
translation: 您可以把暫不使用的盔甲放到盔甲座上。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: on an Armor Stand while holding a piece of armor to place it on the Armor Stand.
translation: 拿著盔甲部件時，只要在盔甲座上按 :_input_key.use:，就能將其放到盔甲座上。

source_string: Tap an Armor Stand while holding a piece of armor to place it on the Armor Stand.
translation: 拿著盔甲部件時，只要輕觸盔甲座，就能將其放到盔甲座上。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: on an Armor Stand with an open hand to remove something from the Armor Stand.
translation: 只要在空手時於盔甲座上按 :_input_key.use:，就能從盔甲座上取下盔甲部件。

source_string: Tap an Armor Stand with an open hand to remove something from the Armor Stand.
translation: 只要在空手時輕觸盔甲座，就能從盔甲座上取下盔甲部件。

source_string: An Armor Stand can change its pose, sneak and press :_input_key.use: on an Armor Stand to change the pose.
translation: 「護甲座」可以改變姿勢，偷偷按下護甲座上的 :_input_key.use: 改變姿勢。

source_string: An Armor Stand can change its pose, sneak and tap an Armor Stand to change the pose.
translation: 盔甲座可以變換姿勢。只要潛行並輕觸盔甲座就能改變姿勢。

source_string: Armor Stands will react to a Redstone signal, try giving it different signal strengths and see what happens.
translation: 盔甲座會對紅石發出的信號產生反應，您不妨嘗試不同的信號強度，看看會有什麼結果。

source_string: Banners are a cool way to decorate your house or castle with custom patterns and colors.
translation: 您可以自訂旗幟的圖案和顏色，來裝飾您的屋子或城堡。

source_string: After crafting a Banner, you can put it on a Crafting Table or Loom and add different dyes to create your own unique, cool design!
translation: 旗幟製作完成後，您可以將其放到精製台或織布機上並加入不同染料，創造出獨一無二的酷炫設計！

source_string: There are many different patterns that you can create with your dye such as:
translation: 您可以使用染料來製作以下不同圖案：

source_string: - Making a triangle will give you a chevron pattern.
translation: - 三角形可以製作出 V 型圖案。

source_string: - Making a cross gives you a cross pattern.
translation: - 十字可以製作出十字圖案。

source_string: - Use an Oxeye Daisy to craft a flower pattern.
translation: - 使用雛菊來合成花朵圖案。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: Experiment with different combinations to get even more patterns!
translation: 您不妨多方嘗試各種組合，製作出更多不同圖案！

source_string: A Banner can also have multiple layers, allowing you to have more than one pattern on your Banner. If you don't like the last pattern you put on a Banner, you can wash the last layer off in a Cauldron.
translation: 另外，旗幟可以有多個圖層，讓您能夠在旗幟上加入一種以上的圖案。如果您對最後加上的圖案不滿意，可以用鍋釜來洗掉最後一個圖層。

source_string: If you want to copy a Banner, put it on the Crafting Table with a blank Banner.
translation: 如要複製旗幟，請將您要複製的旗幟和一面空白旗幟放到精製台上。

source_string: Active Beacons project a bright beam of light into the sky.
translation: 啟用中的燈塔會向天空投射出耀眼的光束。

source_string: They are crafted with Glass, Obsidian, and Nether Stars (which is obtained by defeating the Wither).
translation: 您可以用玻璃、黑曜石和地獄星 (可於擊敗凋靈後取得) 來製作燈塔。

source_string: Beacons need to be on top of a Pyramid of Iron, Gold, Emerald, Diamond, or Netherite blocks with an unobstructed view of the sky.
translation: 燈塔必須位於鐵金字塔、黃金金字塔、翡翠金字塔、鑽石金字塔或地獄方塊的頂端，並能一覽無餘地看到天空。

source_string: The material that the Beacon is placed on has no effect on the power of the Beacon.
translation: 把燈塔放置在不同材料上，並不會對燈塔的效果造成影響。

source_string: In the Beacon menu you can select one primary power for your Beacon. The more tiers your pyramid has the more powers you can have.
translation: 您可以在燈塔選單中，為燈塔選取 1 種主要效果。金字塔越多層，可供選擇的效果越多。

source_string: To set the powers of your Beacon you must use a Netherite Ingot, Emerald, Diamond, Gold Ingot, or Iron Ingot in the payment slot.
translation: 你必須在付費欄位奉上翡翠、鑽石、黃金錠塊或鐵錠塊，才能設定燈塔的效果。

source_string: Once set, the powers will emanate from the Beacon indefinitely. Powers are granted to all nearby players.
translation: 設定後，燈塔就會無限期散發效果。燈塔附近的所有玩家都會受到效果護佑。

source_string: To change the color of the beam, place a stained glass block in its path.
translation: 如要變更光束顏色，請在光束的路徑上放置彩繪玻璃方塊。

source_string: Sleeping in a Bed passes the night and sets your spawn point.
translation: 只要在床舖上睡覺，就能度過夜晚並設定生成點。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: on a Bed to go to sleep. This can only be done at night.
translation: 在床舖上按 :_input_key.use: 即可睡覺。您只能在晚上睡覺。

source_string: Tap a Bed to go to sleep. This can only be done at night.
translation: 輕觸床舖即可睡覺。您只能在晚上睡覺。

source_string: If you are playing Multiplayer, everyone in the world must be in a Bed at the same time to pass the night.
translation: 進行多人遊戲時，世界中的所有人必須同時睡在床舖上才能度過夜晚。

source_string: If your Bed is broken you will return to where you first spawned into the world.
translation: 如果您的床舖壞了，您就會回到最初進入世界的起始點。

source_string: Be careful when using a Bed in the Nether, it's usually too hot to sleep.
translation: 在地獄使用床舖時務必要小心謹慎，通常會熱得睡不著。

source_string: A soft bed lets you sleep through the night. You'll need wool to craft one, as well as a safe spot to place it.
translation: 柔軟的床舖讓你一覺到天亮。你需要羊毛才能合成床舖，還要一個可以安全放置的地方。

source_string: Sleeping in a bed will also set your §espawn point§f, meaning that if you die, you'll reappear right back home!
translation: 在床舖上睡覺也會設置你的§e重生點§f，這代表著如果你死了，你將會重生回到家裡！

source_string: You can only fall asleep when it's cozy, like when it's nighttime or during a thunderstorm.
translation: 你只能在舒適的時候才能入睡，像是夜晚或是下雷雨時。

source_string: The world of Minecraft is made from millions of blocks. Each one is breakable, collectable, and placeable. There are almost no limits to what you can build!
translation: Minecraft 的世界是由數百萬個方塊所構築而成的。您可以任意破壞、收集和放置任何方塊，讓您盡情建造屬於自己的世界！

source_string: Most blocks you will have to find in the world, but some can only be crafted such as combining other blocks on a crafting table like a Redstone Block or smelted in a furnace like Glass.
translation: 您可以在世界中找到大多數的方塊，但某些方塊只有透過製造才能取得。舉例來說，在精製台上結合其他方塊可以製作出紅石方塊，而在熔爐中熔煉則能取得玻璃。

source_string: Most blocks are not affected by gravity and can float in mid air, but some like Sand and Gravel, will fall if there is no block underneath them.
translation: 大多數的方塊都不會受到地心引力影響，可以漂浮在半空中。但沙子和礫石等方塊只能放置在其他方塊的表層，否則就會落下。

source_string: Here are some examples of the more interesting blocks in Minecraft:
translation: 以下範例會介紹 Minecraft 中的一些比較有趣的方塊：

source_string: §eGlass§f - This is a transparent block that is made by smelting Sand in a Furnace.
translation: §e玻璃§f：在熔爐中熔煉沙子後，即可獲得這種透明方塊。

source_string: §eConcrete§f - This is made by dropping a Concrete Powder block into water.
translation: §e混凝土§f：將混凝土粉末方塊丟入水中即可製造此方塊。

source_string: §eTerracotta§f - This is found naturally in Badlands biomes or can be crafted and dyed from Clay that is found underwater. Terracotta can be made into Glazed Terracotta by smelting it in a Furnace.
translation: §e陶瓦§f：此方塊出產於破碎裂谷生態域，也可以用水下黏土合成和染色。將陶瓦放進熔爐熔煉後，就能製作出帶釉陶瓦。

source_string: §eMagma Block§f - This is found naturally in the Nether, it gives off a little light and will burn whoever steps on it.
translation: §e熔岩§f：天然出產自地獄，發著微光，只要有人踩到就會灼傷。

source_string: §eCoarse Dirt§f - This is almost like a normal Dirt block but Grass can't grow on it. It can be found in Windswept Savanna and Old Growth Taiga biomes.
translation: §e粗泥§f：此方塊與一般的泥土方塊幾乎一樣，但它不會長草。你可以在刮風的疏林草原和古老的針葉林地生態域找到這種方塊。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: The Book and Quill lets you record your adventures. Tell your story by entering text into the pages. You can even change the title and the author! Sign the Book and Quill to finalize your work. The Book and Quill will be editable until it is signed.
translation: 用「書本和羽毛筆」來記錄你的冒險。在頁面中輸入文字來講述你的故事。你甚至可以更改書名和作者！簽署「書本和羽毛筆」來完成你的作品。在簽署之前，「書本和羽毛筆」都可以編輯。

source_string: Brewing potions requires a Brewing Stand. Every potion starts off with a bottle of water, which is made by filling a Glass Bottle with water from a Cauldron or water source.
translation: 您必須在釀製台上才能釀製藥水。在鍋釜或水源地用水把玻璃瓶裝滿後，您就能用水瓶來釀製藥水。

source_string: A Brewing Stand has three slots for creating different potions. One ingredient can be used over all three bottles, so always brew three potions at the same time to best use your resources.
translation: 釀製台有三個空格來製作不同藥水。一種原料可以同時用於三個瓶子，因此建議您同時釀製三瓶藥水，以妥善利用寶貴資源。

source_string: Putting Nether Wart in the top position of the Brewing Stand will give you an Awkward Potion. This doesn't have any effect by itself, but creates a base potion that can be used to create more advanced potions.
translation: 將地獄結節放到釀製台最上方的位置，將會製作出粗劣藥水。此藥水沒有任何效果，但可以用來當做基底藥水，讓你釀製出更進階的藥水。

source_string: There are many potion effects to discover, experiment with different ingredients and combinations to become a true alchemist.
translation: 有許多藥水效果等著您來發掘，您不妨多方嘗試不同原料和組合，成為一名煉金達人。

source_string: How to Play: Building a Shelter
When danger comes lurking, a sturdy §eshelter§f can protect you from the threats outside.
translation: 當危機四伏，堅固的§e庇護所§f可以保護你免受外面的威脅。

source_string: Building a shelter is critical to surviving your first night, and it doesn't have to be hard.
translation: 建造一個庇護所對於度過第一個晚上非常重要，而且並不困難。

source_string: You can build one with anything from dirt to stone, or even close up a cave for a makeshift lodging!
translation: 你可以用泥土、石頭等任何東西來建造，或者甚至關閉洞穴作為臨時小屋！

source_string: The Cauldron is a container that can hold buckets or bottles of liquid.
translation: 鍋釜是一種容器，您可將裝有液體的桶子或瓶子倒入鍋釜。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: on a Cauldron while holding a Bucket of Water or a Potion to fill the Cauldron with its contents.
translation: 手持裝滿水的桶子或藥水時，在鍋釜上按 :_input_key.use: 即可將該容器的內容物倒進鍋釜。

source_string: Tap a Cauldron while holding a Bucket of Water or a Potion to fill the Cauldron with its contents.
translation: 手持裝滿水的桶子或藥水時，輕觸鍋釜即可將該容器的內容物倒進鍋釜。

source_string: A Potion will only partially fill a Cauldron so you will have to use multiple Potions to fill it up completely.
translation: 藥水的份量太少，您必須倒入多瓶藥水才能將鍋釜裝滿。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: on a Cauldron with your Arrow in hand to create all kinds of different arrows!
translation: 手持箭時，在鍋釜上按 :_input_key.use: 即可製作各種不同的箭！

source_string: Tap a Cauldron with your Arrow in hand to create all kinds of different arrows!
translation: 手持箭時，輕觸鍋釜即可製作各種不同的箭！

source_string: To dye Leather Armor or Leather Horse Armor, press :_input_key.use: on a Cauldron filled with water while holding the desired dye. This will change the color of the water inside of the Cauldron. Then dip your armor into the Cauldron by pressing :_input_key.use: with armor in your hand.
translation: 如要為皮甲或皮馬鎧染色，請在手持染料時，在裝滿水的鍋釜上按 :_input_key.use:，這麼做將會改變鍋釜中的水的顏色。接著請在手持盔甲時，按 :_input_key.use: 將盔甲浸入鍋釜中。

source_string: To dye Leather Armor or Leather Horse Armor, tap a Cauldron filled with water while holding the desired dye. This will change the color of the water inside of the Cauldron. Then dip your armor into the Cauldron by tapping the Cauldron with the armor in your hand.
translation: 如要為皮甲或皮馬鎧染色，請在手持染料時輕觸裝滿水的鍋釜，這麼做將會改變鍋釜中的水的顏色。接著請在手持盔甲時輕觸鍋釜，將盔甲浸入鍋釜中。

source_string: If you want to wash the dye off, dip the dyed item into a Cauldron of undyed Water.
translation: 如果想要將染料洗掉，請將已染色的物品浸入裝滿無染料清水的鍋釜中。

source_string: Press :_input_key.chat: to open Chat. Type your message and press ENTER.
translation: 按 :_input_key.chat: 即可開啟聊天視窗，輸入訊息後請按 ENTER 鍵送出訊息。

source_string: Press :_input_key.chat: to open Chat. Type your message and press the send button.
translation: 按 :_input_key.chat: 即可開啟聊天視窗。輸入訊息後請按「傳送」按鈕來送出訊息。

source_string: Tap the chat button to open Chat. Type your message and tap the send button.
translation: 輕觸「聊天」按鈕即可開啟聊天視窗。輸入訊息後請輕觸「傳送」按鈕來送出訊息。

source_string: Once you have crafted a Chest, you can place it in the world and then open it with :_input_key.use: to store items from your inventory.
translation: 製作箱子後，您即可將它放置在世界中。只要按 :_input_key.use: 就能打開箱子，方便您將物品欄中的物品存放到箱內。

source_string: Once you have crafted a Chest, you can place it in the world and then tap to open it and store items from your inventory.
translation: 製作箱子後，您即可將它放置在世界中。只要輕觸就能打開箱子，方便您將物品欄中的物品存放到箱內。

source_string: Items in the Chest will be stored there for you to put into your inventory later.
translation: 箱子中的物品會一直保存著，您日後可以再放回物品欄中。

source_string: Two Chests placed next to each other will be combined to form a Large Chest.
translation: 將兩個箱子放在一起，就會結合成一個大容量箱子。

source_string: Command Blocks are a powerful tool for map creators. They store and execute commands upon receiving a Redstone signal.
translation: 指令方塊是地圖創造者專用的強大工具，不但可以儲存指令，還能在接收到紅石訊號時執行指令。

source_string: To get a command block you must use /give.
translation: 輸入 /give 即可取得指令方塊。

source_string: When a Command Block has either executed or failed to execute its stored command, it sends a Redstone signal from the side where the arrow is pointing.
translation: 無論指令方塊是否成功執行其中儲存的指令，都會向箭號指向的方向傳送紅石信號。

source_string: You can set the name of the Command Block in the Hover Note field.
translation: 您可以在 [暫留註解] 欄位中設定指令方塊的名稱。

source_string: §eBlock Type§f - There are three types of Command Blocks, each with their own color and behavior:
translation: §e方塊類型§f：指令方塊有三種類型，每種都有各自的顏色和行為模式：

source_string: §eImpulse§f - Only executes the stored command when the block receives a redstone signal.
translation: §e脈衝§f：僅在方塊收到紅石信號時執行儲存的指令。

source_string: §eChain§f - Executes the stored command when the Command Block behind it has or has not executed its command.
translation: §e連鎖§f：在後方的指令方塊已執行或未執行其指令時，執行儲存的指令。

source_string: §eRepeat§f - Once activated, this Command Block will continue executing its stored command as long as it exists.
translation: §e重複§f：啟用後，此指令方塊只要存在，就會持續執行儲存的指令。

source_string: §eCondition§f - There are two conditions, each will affect the behavior of the Command Block:
translation: §e條件§f：以下兩項條件皆會影響指令方塊的行為模式：

source_string: §eUnconditional§f - Executes the stored command even if the Command Block behind it failed to execute its command.
translation: §e無條件§f：即使後方的指令方塊無法執行其指令，依然執行儲存的指令。

source_string: §eConditional§f - Only executes the stored command if the Command Block behind it succeeded in executing its command.
translation: §e有條件§f：僅在後方的指令方塊順利執行其指令時，才執行儲存的指令。

source_string: §eRedstone§f - There are two redstone settings, each will affect the behavior of the Command Block:
translation: §e紅石§f：有兩個紅石設定，每個設定都會影響指令方塊的行為：

source_string: §eNeeds Redstone§f - Requires a redstone signal to activate.
translation: §e需要紅石§f：需要紅石信號才能啟用。

source_string: §eAlways Active§f - Does not require a redstone signal to activate.
translation: §e一律啟用§f：不需紅石信號即可啟用。

source_string: A Command Block will also show you its previous output. This will help you figure out if a Command Block failed to execute its command and why.
translation: 指令方塊也會顯示先前的輸出紀錄，方便您瞭解指令方塊是否未順利執行其指令，以及無法執行的原因。

source_string: Commands can be executed from Chat. Type / before you type the command.
translation: 您可以在聊天視窗中執行指令。請在指令前方輸入「/」符號。

source_string: There are multitudes of commands that will allow you to do amazing things. There are many sources out there that will provide you with all of the info that you'll ever need.
translation: 您可以透過大量的指令來達成許多有趣的目標。歡迎參考以下來源，了解所有可能會派上用場的相關資訊。

source_string: An active Conduit gives you powers when you are underwater and when it rains.
translation: 您在水底和下雨時，啟用的導管能讓您獲得力量。

source_string: A Conduit is crafted with Nautilus Shells and a Heart of the Sea. The Conduit draws power from Prismarine and Sea Lanterns.
translation: 導管是以鸚鵡螺殼和海洋之心製造而成。導管可以收集海磷石和海燈籠的力量。

source_string: Once activated, a Conduit will grant Conduit Power to anything nearby.
translation: 啟用後，導管就會賦予任何在附近的東西導管力量。

source_string: The more power it draws in, the further its abilities reach.
translation: 汲取的力量越多，能力的範圍就越廣。

source_string: How to Play: Crafting a Tool
translation: 遊戲說明：合成一件工具

source_string: §eTools§f help you get things done faster. Some, like the §epickaxe§f:wood_pickaxe: , let you mine stone and various ores. Others, like the §esword§f:wood_sword: , help you keep enemies at bay.
translation: §e工具§f可以幫助你更快地完成任務。有些工具，例如§e十字鎬§f :wood_pickaxe:，能讓你挖掘各種石頭和礦石。其他，像是§e劍§f :wood_sword:，可幫助你抵禦敵人。

source_string: To craft a tool, open up your §ecrafting table§f:crafting_table: by walking up to it and right-clicking it. You can craft a basic version of most tools using two sticks and a few planks - your §erecipe book§f will tell you how!
translation: 若要合成工具，請走過去並按一下右鍵，打開§e精製台§f:crafting_table:。你可以使用兩根木棍和幾塊木材合成大部分的基本工具。§e配方書§f會教你怎麼做！

source_string: To craft a tool, open up your §ecrafting table§f:crafting_table: by walking up to it and pressing :_input_key.use:. You can craft a basic version of most tools using two sticks and a few planks - your §erecipe book§f will tell you how!
translation: 若要合成工具，請打開你§e精製台§f :crafting_table: 走過去並按一下 :_input_key.use:。你可以使用兩根木棍和幾塊木材合成大部分的基本工具。§e配方書§f會教你怎麼做！

source_string: To craft a tool, open up your §ecrafting table§f:crafting_table: by walking up to it and tapping it. You can craft a basic version of most tools using two sticks and a few planks - your §erecipe book§f will tell you how!
translation: 若要合成工具，請打開你§e精製台§f :crafting_table: 走過去並按一下。你可以使用兩根木棍和幾塊木材合成大部分的基本工具。§e配方書§f會教你怎麼做！

source_string: To place or use certain Minecraft Education blocks or items, a player must possess a special ability called 'World Builder'.
translation: 若要放置或使用特定《Minecraft Education》方塊或物品，玩家必須有稱為「創世者」的特殊能力。

source_string: With cheats activated, the host can enable or disable the World Builder ability for any players in the world.
translation: 啟用密技後，主持人可以啟用或停用世界中任何玩家的「創世者」能力。

source_string: To grant World Builder ability to all players in the world, run the following command:
translation: 若要授予「創世者」的能力給世界中所有玩家，請執行以下指令：

source_string: To quickly toggle your own World Builder ability, run either of the following commands:
translation: 若要快速切換您自己的「創世者」能力，請選擇執行以下任一指令：

source_string: To query your World Builder ability, run the following command:
translation: 若要查詢您的「創世者」能力，請執行以下指令：

source_string: Minecraft Education features several special blocks that make it easier for teachers to create and employ lessons. Only players with World Builder ability can place and destroy these blocks. Only players without World Builder ability are subject to the restrictions imposed by these blocks.
translation: Minecraft Education 具有幾個特殊模組，讓教師更容易建立和進行課程。擁有「創世者」能力的玩家才能放置和摧毀這些方塊，沒有「創世者」能力的玩家才會受到這些方塊的限制。

source_string: Allow and Deny blocks control where players can build in a world.
translation: 允許和拒絕方塊可控制玩家可於世界中建造的位置。

source_string: Players can place or destroy blocks above Allow blocks. Players cannot place or destroy blocks above Deny blocks.
translation: 玩家可以放置或摧毀允許方塊上方的方塊，無法在拒絕方塊上方放置或摧毀方塊。

source_string: Allow and Deny blocks do not affect the area below them.
translation: 允許和拒絕方塊不會影響其下方的區域。

source_string: An Allow block with a Deny block somewhere below it prevents players from building in the space between the two blocks. Above the Allow block, players can place and destroy blocks.
translation: 允許方塊的下方某處會有拒絕方塊，可阻止玩家在兩個方塊之間的空間中進行建築。在允許方塊上方，玩家可以放置和摧毀方塊。

source_string: Border blocks provide a force field that extends infinitely upward and downward, regardless of the presence of other blocks. Players cannot move through, over, or under a Border block. Players cannot place or destroy blocks that are above or below a Border block.
translation: 邊框方塊提供了一個無限向上和向下延伸的力場，不管是否有其他方塊存在。玩家不能在邊框方塊之間、上方或下方移動。玩家無法放置或銷毀位於邊框方塊上方或下方的方塊。

source_string: Minecraft is a §emultiplayer§f game by default.
translation: 預設情況下，Minecraft 是§e多人遊戲§f。

source_string: Every new world you create starts with multiplayer enabled. If you want to make it §eprivate§f, go to World Settings to turn off multiplayer.
translation: 你建立的每個新世界一開始都會啟用多人遊戲選項。如果你想要將其設定為§p私人§f，請前往「世界設定」關閉多人遊戲。

source_string: To play with others, go to the §eFriends tab§f to see all available Realms, Friends, and LAN games. Just select any game to join it.
translation: 若要與其他人一起玩，請前往 §e[好友] 標籤§f，查看所有可用的 Realms、好友和區域網路遊戲。只要選擇任何遊戲即可加入。

source_string: When you start or join an online game, your friends can see this in their Friends tab. If they join, it'll be visible to their friends as well.
translation: 開始或加入線上遊戲後，你的好友就可以在 [好友] 標籤中看到此遊戲。如果他們加入遊戲，他們的好友也能看到此遊戲。

source_string: You need to be signed in to a §eMicrosoft account§f with an active internet connection to play multiplayer.
translation: 你必須連上網際網路並登入 §eMicrosoft 帳戶§f才能遊玩多人遊戲。

source_string: Realms - The best way to play together
It's easy to play with friends using §eRealms§f.
translation: 使用 §eRealms§f 與朋友一起玩遊戲很簡單。

source_string: You and up to 10 friends get 24/7 access to a world that's always online. Explore, get creative, or try curated content from Marketplace.
translation: 你可以和最多 10 位好友隨時進入永遠上線的世界，一起探索、發揮創意，或嘗試市集裡的精選內容。

source_string: All you need is a paid Realms subscription. Why not try a free 30-day trial?
translation: 你只需要 Realms 付費訂閱。何不試試 30 天免費試用版呢？

source_string: You decide what people can do in your world by changing §eplayer permissions§f.
translation: 你可以透過變更§f玩家權限§f來決定每個人在你的世界中可以做什麼。

source_string: Open the game menu to see a list of players currently in your world, then select the permissions icon to adjust that player's permissions.
translation: 開啟遊戲功能表，查看你世界中目前的玩家清單，然後選擇權限圖示以調整玩家權限。

source_string: Chalkboards are used to display text in the world. Chalkboards display more text than Signs, can be edited after they have been placed, and come in three sizes: Slate, Poster, and Board. The lock toggle allows you to prevent non-World Builders from destroying or editing your chalkboards. Press :_input_key.use: on an existing chalkboard to edit it.
translation: 黑板可用於在世界中顯示文字。黑板能顯示的文字比標誌更多，放置後也可以進行編輯，並且有三種尺寸：石板、海報和板子。鎖定切換能讓你阻止非「創世者」破壞或編輯你的黑板。在現有的黑板上按下 :_input_key.use: 進行編輯。

source_string: Chalkboards are used to display text in the world. Chalkboards display more text than Signs, can be edited after they have been placed, and come in three sizes: Slate, Poster, and Board. The lock toggle allows you to prevent non-World Builders from destroying or editing your chalkboards. Tap an existing chalkboard to edit it.
translation: 黑板可用於在世界中顯示文字。黑板能顯示的文字比標誌更多，放置後也可以進行編輯，並且有三種尺寸：石板、海報和黑板。鎖定切換能讓你阻止非「世界構建者」破壞或編輯您的黑板。在現有的黑板上進行編輯。

source_string: Students can simulate real world chemistry by using the Chemistry Equipment blocks. Build any of the 118 different elements by adjusting the sliders in the Element Constructor or view the composition of elements by placing them in the Element Constructor. Combine elements in the Compound Creator to produce chemical compounds. Put elements and compounds into the Lab Table to create Minecraft items. Reduce blocks to their component elements with the Material Reducer.
translation: 學生可以使用化學設備方塊，模擬現實世界中的化學。透過「元素建構器」中的滑桿，構築 118 種不同元素中的任一個，或將其放置在「元素建構器」中，查看元素的組成。在「元素建構器」中組合元素以生成化合物。將元素和化合物放入實驗桌，建立 Minecraft 物品。使用「材料分解器」將方塊分解成方塊的組合元素。

source_string: Download the Chemistry Journal from the Minecraft Education website for a comprehensive guide to chemistry in Minecraft.
translation: 從《Minecraft Education》網站下載「化學期刊」(Chemistry Journal) 以獲得完整的 Minecraft 化學指南。

source_string: NPCs are non-player characters that can provide additional lesson information, hints, or instructions.
translation: NPC 即為非玩家角色，可提供額外的課程資訊、提示或說明。

source_string: Only World Builders can place, delete, name, or edit NPCs. NPCs can execute commands and link to websites. Commands can be assigned to buttons in the NPC's dialog window; website links will always have a button.
translation: 只有「創世者」可以放置、刪除、命名或編輯 NPC。NPC 可以執行命令並連結到網站。可以將指令分配至 NPC 對話框視窗中的按鈕；永遠都會有一個網站連結的按鈕。

source_string: NPCs have a variety of skins to choose from and are immobile.
translation: NPC 有多種不同的外觀可選，而且無法移動。

source_string: The Camera allows players to take pictures in the world.
translation: 相機可以讓玩家在世界中拍攝照片。

source_string: To take a picture from your point of view, press :_input_key.use:.
translation: 若要以您的視角拍照，請按 :_input_key.use:。

source_string: To take a picture from your point of view, tap and hold, then release.
translation: 若要以您的視角拍照，請輕觸並按住，然後放開。

source_string: To take a selfie, place a camera and press :_input_key.use: on it.
translation: 若要自拍，請放置相機然後在相機上按 :_input_key.use:。

source_string: To take a selfie, place a camera and tap the Take Picture button.
translation: 若要自拍，請放置相機然後輕觸「拍照」按鈕。

source_string: Pictures can be viewed in the Portfolio or inserted into the Book and Quill.
translation: 你可以在相簿內檢視照片，或將照片插入「書本和羽毛筆」中。

source_string: Pictures you have taken appear in the Portfolio. Press :_input_key.use: to view the Portfolio. When viewing the Portfolio, you can add captions to pictures, delete pictures, and export pictures as a PDF.
translation: 您已經拍攝的照片會顯示在相簿中。按 :_input_key.use: 即可檢視相簿。檢視相簿時，您可以新增照片的標題、刪除圖片，以及將圖片匯出為 PDF。

source_string: Pictures you have taken appear in the Portfolio. Tap and hold to view the Portfolio. When viewing the Portfolio, you can add captions to pictures, delete pictures, and export pictures as a PDF.
translation: 您已經拍攝的照片會顯示在相簿中。輕觸並按住即可檢視相簿。檢視相簿時，您可以新增照片的標題、刪除圖片，以及將圖片匯出為 PDF。

source_string: Classroom Mode is an external application that provides educators with features designed to facilitate interaction with students. You can download Classroom Mode from the Minecraft Education website.
translation: 「課堂模式」是一個外部應用程式，能為教育人士提供能夠促進學生互動的功能。你可以從 Minecraft Education 網站下載「課堂模式」。

source_string: As the host of a world, use the command /classroommode to launch the Classroom Mode app and connect it to Minecraft Education.
translation: 世界主持人可以使用指令 /classroommode 來啟用「課堂模式」應用程式，然後連接至《Minecraft Education》。
遊戲說明：程式碼生成器
