source_string: Code Builder allows players to explore, create, and play in Minecraft by writing code using familiar learn-to-code platforms.
translation: 程式碼生成器可讓玩家在透過使用熟悉的學習撰寫程式碼平台撰寫程式碼，藉以在 Minecraft 中探索、建立和玩遊戲。

source_string: Launch Code Builder by pressing :_input_key.codeBuilder: or by using the command /code.
translation: 按 :_input_key.codeBuilder: 或使用指令 /code 即可啟用程式碼生成器。

source_string: Launch Code Builder by tapping :code_builder_button: or by using the command /code.
translation: 輕觸 :code_builder_button: 或使用指令 /code 即可啟用程式碼生成器。

source_string: The Crafting Table will let you craft more complicated recipes.
translation: 精製台可讓您製作更複雜的配方。

source_string: Place it in the world, then press :_input_key.use: on the Crafting Table to use it.
translation: 請先將精製台放到世界中。在精製台上按 :_input_key.use: 即可使用精製台。

source_string: Place it in the world, then tap the Crafting Table to use it.
translation: 請先將精製台放到世界中。輕觸即可使用精製台。

source_string: Creative Mode is there so you can build the land of your dreams mob free!
translation: 在創造模式中，您可以盡情打造全無生物的夢想大地！

source_string: The creative mode interface allows any item in the game to be moved into the player's inventory without the need for mining or crafting the item. The items in the player's inventory will not be removed when they are placed or used in the world, and this allows the player to focus on building rather than resource gathering.
translation: 創造模式介面可將遊戲中的任何物品直接移到玩家的物品欄中，省下採礦或製作物品的麻煩。玩家物品欄中的物品不會因為放置到世界中或使用而消失，讓玩家可以專心建構自己的世界，而不必費心收集資源。

source_string: If you create, load, or save a world in Creative Mode, that world will have achievements and leaderboard updates disabled, even if it is then loaded in Survival Mode.
translation: 如果您在創造模式中建立、載入或儲存世界，該世界的成就及排行榜更新功能將無法使用，即使您之後以生存模式載入該世界，也無法改變這種狀況。

source_string: To fly when in Creative Mode, press :_input_key.jump: twice quickly. To exit flying, repeat the action. To fly faster, push :_input_key.forward: twice in rapid succession or press :_input_key.sprint: while flying. When in flying mode, you can hold down :_input_key.jump: to move up and :_input_key.sneak: to move down.
translation: 如要在創造模式中飛行，請快速按 :_input_key.jump: 兩次；如要結束飛行，請重複相同的動作。要加快飛行速度，請在飛行過程中快速連按 :_input_key.forward: 兩次，或按 :_input_key.sprint:。在飛行模式中，按住 :_input_key.jump: 可向上移動，按住 :_input_key.sneak: 則能向下移動。

source_string: To fly when in Creative Mode, press :_input_key.jump: twice quickly. To exit flying, repeat the action. To fly faster, push :_gamepad_stick_left: forward twice in rapid succession while flying. When in flying mode, you can hold down :_input_key.jump: to move up and :_input_key.sneak: to move down.
translation: 如要在創造模式中飛行，請快速按 :_input_key.jump: 兩次；如要結束飛行，請重複相同的動作。要加快飛行速度，請在飛行過程中快速往前推動 :_gamepad_stick_left: 兩次。在飛行模式中，按住 :_input_key.jump:  可向上移動，按住 :_input_key.sneak: 則能向下移動。

source_string: To fly tap :tip_virtual_button_jump: twice quickly, and to stop flying tap :tip_virtual_button_fly_down: twice quickly.
translation: 如要飛行，請快速點擊 :tip_virtual_button_jump: 兩次，若要停止飛行，請快速點擊 :tip_virtual_button_fly_down: 兩次。

source_string: Tap :tip_virtual_button_sprint: to fly faster. To fly up tap and hold :tip_virtual_button_fly_up:, and to fly down tap and hold :tip_virtual_button_fly_down:.
translation: 點擊 :tip_virtual_button_sprint: 來飛快點。如要向上飛，點擊並按住 :tip_virtual_button_fly_up:，要向下飛，點擊並按住 :tip_virtual_button_fly_down:。

source_string: To fly tap :touch_jump: twice quickly, and to stop flying tap :touch_stop_flying: twice quickly.
translation: 如要飛行，請快速點擊 :touch_jump: 兩次，如要停止飛行，請快速點擊 :touch_stop_flying: 兩次。

source_string: Tap :touch_forward: twice quickly to fly faster. To fly up tap and hold :touch_fly_up:, and to fly down tap and hold :touch_fly_down:.
translation: 快速點擊 :touch_forward: 兩次來飛得更快。要向上飛行，請點擊並按住 :touch_fly_up:，要向下飛行，請點擊並按住 :touch_fly_down:。

source_string: How to Play: Death and Respawn
Enemies appear every night, and even the best of us can be caught off guard. If your §ehealth bar§f:heart: runs out, you'll die - and then respawn right where you started!
translation: 敵人每晚都會出現，甚至是我們最優秀的人也會措手不及。如果§e生命條§f :heart: 耗盡，你就會死亡，然後在你開始的地方重生！

source_string: You have unlimited lives, but you drop all items in your inventory when you die. If you're quick enough, you can pick your items back up right where you dropped them.
translation: 你有無限的生命，但當你死亡後，你在物品欄中的所有物品將全數掉落。如果你回去的速度夠快，就能將你掉落的物品撿回來。

source_string: Minecraft has varying levels of difficulty so you can tailor the game to your level.
translation: Minecraft 為分為多種困難度，讓您能夠打造符合自身程度的遊戲體驗。

source_string: No hostile mobs will spawn except for shulkers and the Ender Dragon, but they won't do any damage to you.
translation: 除了界伏蚌和終界龍以外不會生成任何敵對生物，而且牠們也不會對您造成任何傷害。

source_string: Hostile mobs spawn but deal less damage. Hunger bar depletes and drains health down to 5 hearts.
translation: 會生成敵對生物，但造成的傷害較低。飢餓值會耗盡，生命值降至 5 顆心。

source_string: Hostile mobs will do normal damage, and if your hunger level drops to zero your health will begin to drop, but you won't die.
translation: 敵對生物造成的傷害一般。如果飢餓等級降到零，您的生命值就會開始下降，但你不會因此而死。

source_string: Hostile mobs will do more damage, zombies will break through doors, and if your hunger level drops to zero, your health will drop and you could die.
translation: 敵對生物造成的傷害較高、殭屍會破門而入。如果飢餓等級降到零，您的生命值就會開始下降，可能會導致死亡。

source_string: Dispensers are used to shoot out items. You will need to power each Dispenser with a redstone signal (for example, with a lever) to trigger it.
translation: 發射器可以用來發射物品。您必須用紅石信號 (例如拉桿) 為各個發射器充能，才能啟動發射器。

source_string: To fill a Dispenser with items, press :_input_key.use: on the Dispenser, then move the items that you want to dispense from your inventory to the Dispenser.
translation: 如要將物品裝入發射器，請在發射器上按 :_input_key.use:，然後將您要發射的物品從物品欄移到發射器中。

source_string: To fill a Dispenser, tap the Dispenser, then move the items that you want to dispense from your inventory into the Dispenser.
translation: 如要將物品裝入發射器，請輕觸發射器，然後將您要發射的物品從物品欄移到發射器中。

source_string: Whenever you power a Dispenser, an item will shoot out.
translation: 每當您為發射器充能時，物品就會射擊而出。

source_string: Dispensers can also be used to place items as well, such as Pumpkins on Iron Golems and equipment on Armor Stands.
translation: 發射器也能用來放置物品，例如把南瓜放到鐵魔像上或將裝備放到盔甲座上。

source_string: When powered by Redstone, Droppers will drop a single random item contained within. Press :_input_key.use: on the Dropper to open it and then you can load it with items from your inventory.
translation: 使用紅石充能時，投擲器會掉落一個其中所含的隨機物品。按投擲器上的 :_input_key.use: 即可打開它，並將物品欄中的物品裝載進投擲器。

source_string: When powered by Redstone, Droppers will drop a single random item contained within. Tap the Dropper to open it and then you can load it with items from your inventory.
translation: 使用紅石充能時，投擲器會掉落一個其中所含的隨機物品。輕碰投擲器即可打開它，並將物品欄中的物品裝載進投擲器。

source_string: If a Dropper is facing a Chest or another type of container, the item will be placed into that instead. Long chains of Droppers can be constructed to transport items over a distance.
translation: 如果投擲器正對箱子或其他類型的容器，物品會自動改為放入該容器中。您可以建造一連串的投擲器在遙遠的兩地之間輸送物品。

source_string: Dye is used to change the color of many things in Minecraft.
translation: 染料可用來在 Minecraft 中改變多種物品的顏色。

source_string: Some Dye materials are harder to find than others. Most Dyes can be crafted from flowers, like §eRed Dye§f from a Poppy, but some Dyes are found or created in more obscure ways such as:
translation: 有的染色材料會比較其他材料更難找。雖然大多數的染料都可以使用花朵合成 (例如使用罌粟製成紅色染料)，但部分染料卻只能以較為艱難的方式尋找或製造，例如：

source_string: §eBlue Dye§f - Mining Lapis Lazuli deep underground
translation: §e藍色染料§f：在地下深處挖掘青金石

source_string: §eBlack Dye§f - Collecting Ink Sacs from Squids
§eBrown Dye§f - Harvesting Cocoa Beans in the Jungle
translation: §e棕色染料§f：收穫叢林中的可可豆
§e綠色染料§f：使用仙人掌熔煉取得

source_string: Elytra are an item that can be equipped to allow gliding. Elytra are equipped in the chest armor slot.
translation: 只要配備鞘翅，您就能自在滑翔。鞘翅必須配備在胸甲的物品槽。

source_string: Elytra cannot be crafted, but are found in Item Frames in rare End Ships, guarded by fearsome Shulkers.
translation: 鞘翅無法透過製作而得，但在由界伏蚌嚴密守衛的稀有終界船之中，您可以在物品框架裡找到此物品。

source_string: When equipped with Elytra, a player can press :_input_key.jump: while falling to start gliding. Note that you need to be quite high to really get the full effect!
translation: 配備鞘翅時，玩家只要在落下途中按 :_input_key.jump:，即可開始滑翔。請注意，您必須要從夠高的地方落下，才能發揮完全效果。

source_string: When equipped with Elytra, tap :touch_jump: or :tip_virtual_button_fly_up: while falling to start gliding. Make sure you're high up to get the full effect!
translation: 配備鞘翅後，在墜落時點擊 :touch_jump: 或 :tip_virtual_button_fly_up: 開始滑翔。確保你在高處才能獲得完整的效果！

source_string: While gliding, you can steer by looking around. If you look downwards, you'll move faster - but you'll also hit the ground sooner. If you look upwards, you'll gain some height - but do it for too long and you'll stall, falling instead of rising!
translation: 滑翔過程中，您可以透過環顧四周來轉向。如果往下看，移動速度就會加快，但也會更快撞到地面。如果往上看，就能向上爬升。但可別往上飛得太久，一旦速度降低，您不但飛不起來，還會直接摔到地上！

source_string: You can steer while gliding by looking around. If you look downwards, you'll gain some speed, but you'll also hit the ground faster. If you look upward, you'll gain some height, but do it for too long and you'll stall - which means you'll start falling.
translation: 你可以在滑翔時可用四處觀看來進行操控。如果向下看時會加速，也會讓你更快落地。如果向上看時會爬升，但看的時間太久就會失速，這代表你會開始下降。

source_string: Your Elytra will slowly lose durability while flying, and if they break mid-flight you'll fall. You can repair them by combining them with Phantom Membrane at an Anvil.
translation: 你的鞘翅在飛行時會慢慢失去耐久度，如果在飛行中斷裂，你就會墜落。可以利用鐵砧將它們與幻影薄膜結合來修復它們。

source_string: Firework Rockets that have no effects can be used to extend Elytra flight. You will be damaged if you use a Firework Rocket that has effects to extend flight.
translation: 不具任何特效的煙火火箭可以增加鞘翅的飛行距離，但如果您在飛行時使用此類煙火火箭，將會受到傷害。

source_string: The Experience Points collected by picking up Experience Orbs can be used to enchant Weapons, Armor, Tools, and Books.
translation: 只要收集經驗球，就能獲得經驗點數，供您為武器、盔甲、工具和書本附魔。

source_string: When an enchantable item is placed in the slot below the book in the Enchanting Table, the three buttons to the right of the slot will display some enchantments with their Experience Level cost and Lapis Lazuli cost.
translation: 當可供附魔的物品放在附魔台上的書本下方槽位時，右方的三個按鈕上分別會顯示所需的經驗等級和青金石費用。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: The actual enchantment applied is randomly selected based on the cost displayed.
translation: 實際的附魔效果會根據顯示的費用而隨機套用到物品上。

source_string: If the Enchanting Table is surrounded by Bookshelves (up to a maximum of 15), with a one block gap between the Bookshelf and the Enchanting Table, arcane glyphs will be seen going to the book on the Enchanting Table and the potency of the enchantments will be increased.
translation: 如果附魔台四周被書架圍繞著 (最多 15 個)，並且在彼此之間保留一個方塊的間隔，附魔台上的書本就會導入奧術符文，而且附魔的效果也會增加。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: Enchanted Books are used at the Anvil to apply enchantments to items. This gives you more control over which enchantments you would like on your items.
translation: 附魔書可以透過鐵砧來為其他物品附魔，方便您進一步控制要在物品上套用哪些附魔效果。

source_string: After killing the Ender Dragon, an End Gateway will appear. Throwing an Ender Pearl into the portal will teleport you to the outer islands.
translation: 擊殺終界龍後，終界閘口就會出現。只要將終界珍珠投到傳送門裡面，您就會傳送到外圍群島。

source_string: This alien new landscape must hide something interesting, and maybe something to bring back with you.
translation: 這個奇異的全新地區肯定暗藏了某些有趣的東西，或許還有些能帶回去的戰利品。

source_string: All Ender Chests in a world are linked. Items placed into an Ender Chest are accessible in any other Ender Chest. However, the contents of the Ender Chests are specific for each player. This allows players to store items in any Ender Chest, and retrieve them from other Ender Chests in different positions in the world.
translation: 世界中所有終界箱都連在一起，放在這種箱子裡的物品，也可以在其他終界箱中取用。不過，每個玩家在終界箱裡看到的物品都會不同。這能讓玩家在世界中任何終界箱存放物品並在其他地點的終界箱取得存放物。

context: How To Play help text header. {MaxLength="80"}

source_string: Eyes of Ender are mysteriously connected to the End and will behave strangely when used.
translation: 終界之眼與終界有著神秘未知的關聯，使用時會發生奇怪的效果。

source_string: Rumor has it that they can lead you to open another dimension.
translation: 謠傳它可以帶您通往另一個向度。

source_string: There are a variety of different crops that you can farm in Minecraft. Farming, while challenging, can provide an infinite food source.
translation: 您在 Minecraft 中可以種植多種不同的作物。在冒險途中抽空農耕，可以為您帶來取之不盡的食物來源。

source_string: Crops require light, water, and farmland to grow. You need a hoe, a water source, and seeds to farm.
translation: 作物需要光線、水和農地才能生長，您則需要鋤頭和水源才能種植種子。

source_string: The Blocks next to the water need to be converted to farmland, do this with the hoe. Water will saturate up to four block away.
translation: 水旁邊的方塊必須用鋤頭開墾才能轉換成農地，水份會滲入最多四個位於周遭的方塊。

source_string: Now you can plant your seeds. Make sure your crops are protected as they can easily die from being trampled or lack of water or light.
translation: 您現在可以開始種植種子了。請務必悉心照顧您的作物，因為如果缺乏水分或光線照射，作物就會枯萎。

source_string: Fences can help protect your crops from hungry rabbits or trampling toes!
translation: 柵欄可以防止作物被貪嘴的兔子吃掉，也能防止被生物踩壞！

source_string: When the crops are fully grown they change in appearance and can be harvested.
translation: 作物成熟時的外觀會改變，此時您就能收穫了。

source_string: Some plants like pumpkins and melons grow on stalks. Be careful not to harvest the stalks!
translation: 部分作物 (如南瓜和西瓜) 會生長在莖蔓上，收穫時小心別傷到莖蔓了！

source_string: Fireworks are a fun way to create your own unique celebration in Minecraft!
translation: 煙火可讓您在 Minecraft 中打造獨一無二的歡喜慶典！

source_string: Fireworks have two components, the Firework Rocket and the Firework Star.
translation: 煙火分為兩個元件，分別是煙火火箭和煙火星。

source_string: To use a Firework, press :_input_key.use: on a block to send the Firework shooting into the sky.
translation: 如要施放煙火，請在方塊上按 :_input_key.use:，如此就能將煙火送上雲霄。

source_string: To use a Firework, tap on a block to send the Firework shooting into the sky.
translation: 如要施放煙火，請輕觸方塊，如此就能將煙火送上雲霄。

source_string: Fireworks have no effect other than shooting up into the air.
translation: 煙火除了可朝天空施放之外，並無任何其他效果。

source_string: Firework Stars can be added to during the crafting of the Firework Rocket to give it many different colors and effects.
translation: 您可在煙火火箭的合成過程中加入煙火星，增添多種不同色彩和炫目特效。

source_string: Firework Stars are made from gunpowder and various other items:
translation: 煙火星的原料是火藥和其他各類物品：

source_string: §eColor§f - Adding dye of any color will make an explosion of that color.
translation: §e顏色§f：加入任何顏色的染料可讓煙火的爆炸效果變為該顏色。

source_string: §eTwinkle§f - Adding Glowstone Dust will make the explosion twinkle.
translation: §e閃爍§f：加入閃石塵可為煙火增添閃爍的爆炸效果。

source_string: §eCreeper Shaped§f - Adding a Head will make a creeper pattern in the sky.
translation: §e苦力怕形狀§f：加入一顆頭顱可讓煙火在天空呈現出苦力怕的形狀。

source_string: §eBurst§f - Adding a feather will give the explosion a burst effect.
translation: §e爆裂物§f：加入羽毛可為煙火增添爆裂的爆炸效果。

source_string: §eTrail§f - Adding a Diamond will give the explosion trails.
translation: §e軌跡§f：加入鑽石可為爆炸特效加上軌跡。

source_string: §eStar Shaped§f - Adding a Gold Nugget will make a star pattern in the sky.
translation: §e星形§f：加入金塊可讓煙火在天空呈現星星的形狀。

source_string: Fireworks can be fired from a dispenser. This will shoot the Firework in the direction that the dispenser is facing.
translation: 您可以用發射器來施放煙火。煙火會朝向發射器面向的方位射出。

source_string: Fishing must be done with a Fishing Rod and is an excellent way to catch some fish or other cool items from the sea!
translation: 您必須使用釣魚竿才能釣魚。您可以透過釣魚，從大海中獲得一些魚類和其他實用的物品！

source_string: Aim at a block of water and press :_input_key.use: while holding a fishing rod to cast the lure into the water.
translation: 視野朝向水方塊，然後在手持釣魚竿時按 :_input_key.use: 按鈕，即可將魚餌拋入水中。

source_string: Look at a block of water and tap the Fish button while holding a Fishing Rod to cast the lure into the water.
translation: 視野朝向水方塊，然後在手持釣魚竿時輕觸 [釣魚] 按鈕，即可將魚餌拋入水中。

source_string: Wait until you start to see a trail of bubbles coming for the lure.
translation: 繼續等待，直到您看見一連串的泡泡飄向魚餌為止。

source_string: When the bubbles touch the lure, it will bob up and down. Press :_input_key.use: to reel in the lure. Be careful not to let your fish get away!
translation: 當氣泡碰到魚餌時，魚餌會上下震動，此時按 :_input_key.use: 即可拉起魚餌。小心可別讓魚溜掉了！

source_string: When the bubbles touch the lure, it will bob up and down. Tap the Fish button again to reel in the lure. Be careful not to let your fish get away!
translation: 當氣泡碰到魚餌時，魚餌會上下震動，此時按 [釣魚] 按鈕即可拉起魚餌。小心可別讓魚溜掉了！

source_string: You'll slowly get hungry during your adventures - fortunately the Overworld is full of food! You can gather apples from trees, meat from animals, or why not grow your own crops using a hoe?
translation: 在冒險過程中，你會慢慢感到飢餓。幸好主世界到處都是食物！你可以從樹上摘蘋果、從動物身上取得肉，或者何不自己用鋤頭種植作物呢？

source_string: To eat a food, select it in your hotbar, then click and hold the right mouse button. Keep the §ehunger bar§f:shank: full to regain health when you take damage.
translation: 若要吃食物，請在快捷欄中選擇食物，然後按住滑鼠右鍵不放。保持§e飢餓條§f:shank: 滿格，以在你受到傷害時恢復生命值。

source_string: To eat a food, select it in your hotbar, then press and hold :_input_key.use:. Keep the §ehunger bar§f:shank: full to regain health when you take damage.
translation: 若要吃食物，請在快捷欄中選擇食物，然後按住 :_input_key.use :。保持§e飢餓條§f :shank: 滿格 ，以在你受到傷害時恢復生命值。

source_string: To eat a food, select it in your hotbar, then tap the screen and hold. Keep the §ehunger bar§f:shank: full to regain health when you take damage.
translation: 若要吃食物，請在快捷欄中選擇食物，然後按住螢幕後不放。保持§e飢餓條§f:shank: 滿格，以在你受到傷害時恢復生命值。

source_string: Some raw foods are better when cooked first on a campfire or in a furnace - your tummy will thank you!
translation: 有些生食在營火或熔爐先煮熟比較好，你的肚子會感謝你的！

source_string: A Furnace allows you to cook or smelt items. For example, you can smelt Iron Ore into Iron Ingots.
translation: 熔爐可讓您烹煮或熔煉物品，例如將鐵礦石熔煉成鐵錠塊。

source_string: Place the Furnace in the world and press :_input_key.use: to use it.
translation: 將熔爐放置到世界中，然後按 :_input_key.use: 即可使用。

source_string: Place the Furnace in the world and tap to use it.
translation: 將熔爐放置到世界中，然後輕觸即可使用。

source_string: You need to put some fuel into the bottom of the Furnace, and the item that you want smelted in the top. The Furnace will then fire up and start working. Lots of things can be used as fuel; try experimenting with anything burnable!
translation: 你必須把一些燃料放入熔爐底部，然後把你想要冶煉的物品放在頂部。然後熔爐將啟動並開始運作。很多東西都能作為燃料使用；快嘗試任何可燃物品！

source_string: When creating a world, you have many options. Below are the various settings that can be used to fine tune your experience. Don't worry if you didn't set them when you created the world, they can be changed at any time.
translation: 創造世界時，您可以調整許多選項。您可以利用以下各項設定來改善遊戲體驗。別擔心，就算您並未在創造世界時設定這些選項，日後仍然可以隨時變更。

source_string: §eWorld Name§f: This is where you can name your world.
translation: §e世界名稱§f：你可以在此處變更世界的名稱。

source_string: §eDefault Game Mode§f: This is the gamemode that all new players to the world will start with. You can have players start in either survival or creative mode. Selecting creative mode will turn cheats on.
translation: §e預設遊戲模式§f：此設定是所有新玩家進入世界時的起始遊戲模式。你可以讓玩家進入生存模式或創造模式。選擇創造模式將會一併啟用密技。

source_string: §eDifficulty§f: This setting affects how difficult the world will be. You can choose Peaceful, Easy, Normal, or Hard.
translation: §e難易度§f：此設定決定了世界的難易度，你可以選擇 [和平]、[簡單]、[普通] 或 [困難]。

source_string: §eStarting Map§f: If this setting is turned on, every player will start with a map in their hotbar.
translation: §e起始地圖§f：啟用此設定時，所有玩家在開始遊戲時，快捷欄中都會有一張地圖。

source_string: §eBonus Chest§f: If this setting is turned on, there will be a chest with some starting loot near your initial spawn location.
translation: §e贈品箱§f：啟用此設定時，你的起始位置附近會出現裝著一些初期戰利品的箱子。

source_string: §eWorld Type§f: This setting controls the way the world is created. Select Infinite or Flat from the drop down menu to change the world type.
translation: §e世界類型§f：此設定控制了世界的創造方式。你可以在下拉式選單中選擇 [無限]、[平地] 來變更世界類型。

source_string: §eInfinite worlds§f go on and on forever.
§eFlat worlds§f do not have any hills or trees, just an infinite flat area to fill with your creations.
translation: §e平地§f 世界沒有任何山丘或樹木，而是一片完全平坦的區域，讓你能自由放置你的作品。

source_string: §eSeed§f: This is a unique number for the world. By entering a seed when you make a new world, you can control how it is created. You can also use a word or phrase for the seed and the game will convert it to a number for you.
translation: §e種子§f：這是世界的獨特代碼。在創造新世界時輸入種子碼，就能控制世界的創造方式。你也可以輸入一個單字或單詞，遊戲會自動為你轉換為代碼。

source_string: §eActivate Cheats§f: This setting allows players to use commands. When a world is created with this setting on, all achievements are disabled.
translation: §e啟用密技§f：此設定可讓玩家使用指令。如果在啟用此設定的情況下創造世界，所有成就都將會停用。

source_string: Below are gamerules, cheats must be turned on to use them:
translation: 以下為遊戲規則，密技必須啟用後才能使用：

source_string: §eAlways Day§f: Night will never fall when this setting is turned on.
translation: §e永為白晝§f：啟用此設定後，夜晚就不會降臨。

source_string: §eDaylight Cycle§f: The time will not advance when this setting is turned off.
translation: §e畫夜交替§f：停用此設定後，時間就會停止流動。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: §eKeep Inventory§f: This setting allows players to keep their inventory when they die.
translation: §e保留物品欄§f：此設定可讓玩家在死亡後保留他們的物品欄。

source_string: §eMob Spawning§f: This prevents all mobs from spawning when this setting is off.
translation: §e生物生成§f：停用此設定能防止所有生物生成。

source_string: §eMob Griefing§f: Prevents mobs from destroying the world.
translation: §e生物惡意破壞§f：防止怪物破壞世界。

source_string: §eEntities Drop Loot§f: Controls whether things like minecarts and armor stands will drop themselves when they are broken.
translation: §e實體掉落戰利品§f：控制像礦車和護甲架這類實體在被摧毀時是否會掉落自身物品。

source_string: §eWeather Cycle§f: The weather will not change when this setting is turned off.
translation: §e天氣循環§f：停用此設定時，天氣將不會改變。

source_string: Hoppers are used to automatically move items. Hoppers can be attached to some other items like containers such as Chests or Jukeboxes.
translation: 漏斗可以用來自動移動物品。您可以將漏斗附加到其他物品上，例如箱子或點唱機等等。

source_string: Hoppers will continuously remove items out of a container placed above them and move them into the container they are pointing to.
translation: 漏斗會持續將放置在漏斗上的容器中的物品移出，並且移入它所指向的容器中。

source_string: To make a Hopper point to a particular block, place the Hopper against that block while sneaking.
translation: 若要讓漏斗指向特定方塊，請在潛行時將漏斗放在該方塊的旁邊即可。

source_string: If a Hopper is powered by Redstone, it will become inactive and stop moving items.
translation: 然而，如果是用紅石發電，漏斗就會停用，失去效用並停止移動物品。

source_string: When playing with cheats on, host options will allow you to teleport yourself or friends, change the weather, set the time of day, and change the entry point or world spawn of your game. Once cheats have been enabled, you can find these options in the chat window by pressing the [/] button next to the chat bar.
translation: 進行啟用密技的遊戲時，您可以利用主持人選項來傳送自己或好友、改變天氣、設定一天中的時間，以及變更遊戲中的進入點和世界起始點。密技啟用後，只要按聊天長條旁的 [/] 按鈕就能在聊天視窗中找到這些選項。

source_string: When playing with cheats on, host options will allow you to teleport yourself or friends, change the weather, set the time of day, and change the entry point or world spawn of your game. Once cheats have been enabled, you can find these options in the chat window by tapping the chat button.
translation: 進行啟用密技的遊戲時，您可以利用主持人選項來傳送自己或好友、改變天氣、設定一天中的時間，以及遊戲中的進入點和世界起始點。密技啟用後，只要輕觸聊天按鈕就能在聊天視窗中設定相關選項。

source_string: Use your tools a lot and they'll eventually break. As you gather new materials, such as stone, you'll be able to craft better tools.
translation: 經常使用工具最終會使其毀壞。收集新的材料後，如石頭，你就能合成更好的工具。

source_string: Tools of higher tiers are more durable, more efficient, and able to gather more valuable resources. Go out into the world and find out for yourself!
translation: 更高等級的工具更耐用、更有效率，且能收集更多珍貴的資源。走進這個世界，親自去發現吧！

source_string: Your hotbar will fill up as you gather more resources. Press :_input_key.inventory: to access your §einventory§f, where you'll have more space for everything you've collected.
translation: 收集到更多資源時，你的快捷列就會填滿。按下 :_input_key.inventory: 即可存取§e物品欄§f，在這裡你將有更多空間存放收集到的物品。

source_string: Your hotbar will fill up as you gather more resources. Tap :tip_touch_inventory: to access your §einventory§f, where you'll have more space for everything you've collected.
translation: 收集到更多資源時，你的快捷列就會填滿。輕觸 :tip_touch_inventory: 進入§e物品欄§f，在那裡你會有更多空間來存放收集來的物品。

source_string: Your hotbar will fill up as you gather more resources. Press :rift_B: to access your §einventory§f, where you'll have more space for everything you've collected.
translation: 收集到更多資源時，你的快捷列就會填滿。按下 :rift_B: 即可存取§e物品欄§f，在這裡你將有更多空間存放收集到的物品。

source_string: Your hotbar will fill up as you gather more resources. Press :windowsmr_left_grab: to access your §einventory§f, where you'll have more space for everything you've collected.
translation: 收集到更多資源時，你的快捷列就會填滿。按下 :windowsmr_left_grab: 即可存取§e物品欄§f，在這裡你將有更多空間存放收集到的物品。

source_string: Want to move something between your §ehotbar§f and your inventory? Open your inventory, click the item of your choice, then drag it to the empty item slot you'd like to move it to.
translation: 想在§e快捷欄§f與物品欄之間移動物品嗎？開啟物品欄，按一下所選的物品，然後將其拖曳到你想移動的空物品槽中。

source_string: Want to move something between your §ehotbar§f and your inventory? Use the cursor to select an item and press :_gamepad_face_button_down:. Then, move your cursor to an empty item slot and press again to drop the item.
translation: 想在§e快捷欄§f與物品欄之間移動物品？使用游標選擇物品並按下:_gamepad_face_button_down:。接著移動游標至空物品槽，再按一下將物品放進去。

source_string: Want to move something between your §ehotbar§f and your inventory? Tap the item of your choice, then tap the empty item slot that you'd like to move it to.
translation: 想在§e快捷欄§f和物品欄之間移動一些物品嗎？輕按你想選擇的物品，然後輕按想移動的空白物品欄位即可。

source_string: Want to move something between your §ehotbar§f and your inventory? Use the cursor to select an item and press :_input_key.use:. Then, move your cursor to an empty item slot and press again to drop the item.
translation: 想在§e快捷欄§f和物品欄之間移動一些物品嗎？用滑鼠游標選擇物品，然後按下 :_input_key.use:。接著將滑鼠游標移動到空白物品欄位，然後再按一次放下物品。

source_string: Jigsaw Blocks give creators the ability to generate large structures in the world by connecting multiple structure templates.
translation: 拼圖方塊能讓創作者在世界中連接多個結構範本，建立大型結構。

source_string: To get a Jigsaw Block you must use the /give slash command. To use a Jigsaw Block, you must have Operator permissions.
translation: 要取得拼圖方塊，你必須使用 /give 斜線指令。要使用拼圖方塊，你必須擁有操作者權限。

source_string: Jigsaw Blocks have multiple settings that control how they join together to form a larger structure.
translation: 拼圖方塊有多個設定，可以控制它們如何連接在一起形成更大的結構。

source_string: §eTarget Pool§f - The path of the template pool to search for a connecting structure template. The template pool should contain at least one structure that matches the Jigsaw's "Target Name" field.
translation: §e目標池§f - 搜尋連接結構範本的範本池路徑。範本池應至少包含一個與拼圖方塊的「目標名稱」欄位相符的結構。

source_string: §eName§f - The name of the Jigsaw. This is used when connecting from Jigsaws with a matching "Target Name".
translation: §e名稱§f - 拼圖方塊的名稱。當從具有匹配「目標名稱」的拼圖方塊連接時使用。

source_string: §eTurns Into§f - The type of block the Jigsaw Block will turn into when placed in the world during structure generation.
translation: §e轉換為§f - 在結構生成期間放置在世界中時，拼圖方塊將轉換成的方塊類型。

source_string: §eSelection Priority§f - When the parent piece is being processed for connections, this is the order in which this Jigsaw block attempts to connect to its target piece. Jigsaws will be processed in descending priority with random ordering breaking ties.
translation: §e選擇優先順序§f - 當處理父方塊的連接時，這是此拼圖方塊嘗試連接到其目標方塊的順序。拼圖方塊將按照降冪優先順序處理，隨機排序打破平局。

source_string: §ePlacement Priority§f - When this Jigsaw block connects to a piece, this is the order in which that piece is processed for connections in the wider structure. Pieces will be processed in descending priority with insertion order breaking ties.
translation: §e放置優先順序§f - 當此拼圖方塊連接到一個方塊時，這是該方塊在更廣泛結構中處理連接的順序。方塊將按照降冪優先順序處理，插入順序打破平局。

source_string: §eJoint Type§f - A joint can be either Rollable (default) or Aligned. If the joint type is Rollable, the target structure will be rotated randomly around the source Jigsaw Block. If the joint type is Aligned, the target structure will be placed such that the rotation of the target Jigsaw Block aligns with the rotation of the source Jigsaw Block. Note that this only applies when the Jigsaw Block is placed facing up or down.
translation: §e連接類型§f - 連接可以是可滾動 (預設) 或對齊。如果連接類型為可滾動，目標結構將圍繞來源拼圖方塊隨機旋轉。如果連接類型為對齊，目標結構將被放置，使得目標拼圖方塊的旋轉與來源拼圖方塊的旋轉對齊。請注意，這僅適用於拼圖方塊面朝上或面朝下放置時。

source_string: The Jukebox will play Music Discs that you have found.
translation: 點唱機可以播放您收集的唱片。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: on a Jukebox with a Music Disc in your hand to play it. Press :_input_key.use: the Jukebox again to eject the Music Disc.
translation: 在手持唱片時在點唱機上按 :_input_key.use: 即可播放唱片，在點唱機上再次按 :_input_key.use: 則能取出唱片。

source_string: Tap a Jukebox with a Music Disc in your hand to play it. Tap the Jukebox again to eject the Music Disc.
translation: 在手持唱片時輕觸點唱機即可播放唱片，再次輕觸點唱機則能取出唱片。

source_string: When a Jukebox is playing a Music Disc, it will power Redstone Dust.
translation: 用點唱機播放唱片時，可以為紅石塵充能。

source_string: Try different Music Discs for a different power level.
translation: 您可以嘗試播放不同唱片，來達成不同的充能等級。

source_string: See what happens when you let it play to the end.
translation: 您不妨看看將唱片播完後會發生什麼情況。

source_string: A Hopper can put a Music Disc in for you, and take it out when it's done playing.
translation: 您可利用漏斗自動放入唱片，並在播放結束時自動取出唱片。

source_string: There are a couple of Music Discs that can be found in Chests around the world.
translation: 世界各地的箱子中藏著許多不為人知的唱片。

source_string: Others are more difficult to come by, Creepers secretly appreciate music.
translation: 有些唱片比其他唱片更難找到。聽說苦力怕私底下有欣賞音樂的嗜好。

source_string: The Loom is a fast and efficient way to apply patterns to Banners. The Loom only uses one Dye to apply a pattern. It can also use Loom patterns to apply special patterns.
translation: 要在旗幟上套用樣式，使用織布機是快速又有效率的方式。織布機只會使用一種染料來套用樣式。您也可以使用織布機樣式來套用特殊樣式。

source_string: By placing a Banner into the Loom's first slot, and any color dye into the second slot, patterns can be added to the Banner. Once a pattern is selected, take it from the output slot on the right and move it to your inventory.
translation: 將旗幟放入織布機的第一個欄位中，然後將任意顏色染料放入第二個欄位中，就可以將樣式加到旗幟上。選好樣式後，從右邊的輸出槽取出，然後移至您的物品欄。

source_string: A Banner can have multiple layers allowing you to experiment with many different banner possibilities. Up to 6 patterns can be applied to a Banner to create a unique design.
translation: 旗幟可以有多個層次，因此您可以嘗試多種不同的旗幟風格。旗幟上最多可以套用 6 種樣式，打造出獨特的設計感。

source_string: Adding a Loom Pattern to the Loom's third slot will allow the crafting of special patterns like a creeper face or a flower pattern. You will not lose your Loom Patterns when you apply these patterns to your Banners.
translation: 將「織布機圖案」加入「織布機」的第三個欄位，你就可以合成苦力怕面孔或花朵圖案等特殊的圖案。當你套用這些圖案至旗幟上時，「織布機圖案」仍會保留。

source_string: Explore thrilling themed worlds, parceled up with matching skins, textures and more!
translation: 探索驚心動魄的主題世界，換上匹配的外觀套件、材質，以及更多內容！

source_string: Explore a world of possibility with Minecoins: Minecraft's in-game currency! Minecoins let you add variety to your gameplat across supported Minecraft games.
translation: 使用 Minecoin，Minecraft 的遊戲內貨幣，來探索一個充滿可能性的世界！Minecoin 讓你在支援的 Minecraft 遊戲中增加遊戲玩法多樣性。

source_string: Once redeemed, your Minecoins are linked to your Microsoft account, so you can access your coins and purchases on other supported devices, too!
translation: 一旦兌換之後，您的 Minecoin 將連結到您的 Microsoft 帳戶，因此您也可以在其他支援的裝置上存取您的硬幣和所購買項目！

source_string: *Minecoins require a version of Minecraft: Bedrock Edition with Minecraft Marketplace. Minecoins are not compatible on PlayStation®. For compatibility information see minecraft.net/minecoins
translation: *Minecoin 需要具有 Minecraft 市集的 Minecraft：基岩版才能使用。Minecoin 與 PlayStation® 不相容。有關相容性資訊，請參閱 minecraft.net/minecoins
context: CertRequirement: [PlayStation®]

source_string: Not all crafting materials are on the surface - some may require you to dig underground or into a mountain.
translation: 並非所有的合成材料都在地面上，有些可能需要你在地下或山中挖掘。

source_string: A §epickaxe§f:wood_pickaxe: helps you uncover all sorts of materials, such as stone, coal, iron, and precious ore - though you may need extra sturdy tools for some rarer materials!
translation: §e十字鎬§f:wood_pickaxe:幫助你挖掘各式各樣的材料，如石頭、煤塊、鐵和珍貴的礦石：儘管你可能需要特別堅固的工具來挖掘稀有的材料！

source_string: Some raw metals will need to be smelted using a §efurnace§f:furnace: . Place a fuel like coal or wood logs in the fuel slot, then add raw ore to smelt it into something useful.
translation: 有些金屬原料會需要§e熔爐§f:furnace:熔煉。在燃料槽中放入如煤或原木之類的燃料，然後加入礦石原料，將其熔煉成有用的物品。

source_string: A player can ride any adult §eHorse§f, §eDonkey§f, §eMule§f, or §eCamel§f. Only Horses can be armored.
translation: 玩家可以騎任何成年的§e馬§f、§e驢子§f、§e騾子§f、或§e駱駝§f。只有馬才能披上護甲。

source_string: Mules and Donkeys may be equipped with saddlebags (for transporting items) by attaching a Chest. These saddlebags can then be accessed whilst riding or sneaking.
translation: 只要將騾和驢與箱子相連接，就能配備鞍囊。您可以在騎乘或潛行時使用鞍囊。

source_string: Horses, Donkeys, and Mules must be §etamed§f before they can be used. A player can tame a horse by riding it and staying on while it tries to buck them off. Press :_input_key.use: with an empty hand to attempt to tame Horses, Donkeys, and Mules.
translation: 馬、驢子和騾子必須馴服後才能使用。馴服馬時玩家要騎上馬，並在馬試圖擺脫時停留在馬背上。按一下:_input_key.use:以徒手馴服馬、驢子和騾子。

source_string: Horses, Donkeys, and Mules must be §etamed§f before they can be used. A player can tame a horse by riding it and staying on while it tries to buck them off. Tap the Mount button that appears when near a horse  to attempt to tame Horses, Donkeys, and Mules.
translation: 馬、驢子和騾子必須馴服後才能使用。馴服馬時玩家要騎上馬，並在馬試圖擺脫時停留在馬背上。靠近馬時會出現「騎乘」按鈕，輕觸該鈕以徒手馴服馬、驢子和騾子。

source_string: When Hearts appear around the horse, it has been tamed and will no longer attempt to throw the player off.
translation: 馬的周圍出現愛心時，表示牠已經成功被您馴服，日後不會再試圖在玩家騎乘時掙脫。

source_string: To steer horses and camels, the player must equip it with a §eSaddle§f.
translation: 要駕馭馬和駱駝，玩家必須在其身上配備§e鞍座§f。

source_string: Saddles can be bought from villagers, found inside Chests hidden in the world, or acquired by fishing. While riding a horse, open your inventory and put a saddle in the horse's saddle slot.
translation: 你可以從村民那裡買到鞍座，在隱藏於世界中的箱子裡找到，也能透過釣魚來獲得。當你騎上馬時，打開物品欄，在馬鞍槽裡放置鞍座。

source_string: A camel can carry two players at the same time.
translation: 一隻駱駝可以同時讓兩名玩家騎乘。

source_string: Horses and Donkeys can be bred like other animals using Golden Apples or Golden Carrots.
translation: 使用金蘋果或金色胡蘿蔔餵食馬和驢即可繁殖牠們，就像繁殖其他動物一樣。

source_string: Foals will grow into adult horses over time, although feeding them Wheat or Hay will speed this up.
translation: 小馬經過一段時間後就會成長為成馬，餵食小麥和乾草可以加快成長的速度。

source_string: Llamas are another ridable mob which can be tamed and used to transport large shipments of items.
translation: 羊駝是另一種可騎乘的生物，只要經過馴服，就能用來運輸大量物品。

source_string: Llamas can be tamed the same as horses. However, even when tamed, the player can't control their movements when riding them.
translation: 羊駝的馴服方式與馬相同，但即使經過馴服，您仍然無法在騎乘羊駝時控制牠們的移動方向。

source_string: A lead can be attached to one, and when this happens, surrounding llamas (both tamed and un-tamed) will follow, making a caravan.
translation: 繩索可以連結到羊駝身上。連結繩索後，羊駝無論是否經過馴服，都會跟隨繩索前進而形成商隊。

source_string: Llamas can be equipped with chests, giving it 3-15 slots of inventory space depending on the strength of the Llama. They can also be equipped with carpets. Each carpet color yields a different pattern.
translation: 羊駝可以配備箱子，提供 3 至 15 格的物品欄空間 (視羊駝的力量而定)。您也能在羊駝身上配備地毯，每個地毯顏色都能搭配不同的圖案。

source_string: Pigs can be ridden as well, although they won't go where you want without a little incentive.
translation: 您也可以騎乘豬，但您必須給予一些激勵才能控制牠們的移動方向。

source_string: Equip a pig with a Saddle and point a Carrot on a Stick in the direction you want to go.
translation: 為豬配備鞍座，並用胡蘿蔔釣竿指向您要前往的方向，就能讓豬朝該方向移動。

source_string: When using the D-Pad control scheme, tap :touch_jump: to dismount an animal.
translation: 使用方向鍵控制方案時，點擊 :touch_jump: 從坐騎上下來。

source_string: When using a Joystick control scheme, tap :tip_virtual_button_dismount: to dismount an animal.
translation: 使用搖桿控制方案時，點擊 :tip_virtual_button_dismount: 從坐騎上下來。

source_string: Welcome to the Overworld, a blocky world full of adventure and possibility!
translation: 歡迎來到主世界，這裡是充滿冒險和可能性的方塊世界！

source_string: Look around by touching and dragging the screen.
translation: 觸碰並拖曳畫面以環顧四周。
使用 :_input_key.forward: :_input_key.left: :_input_key.back: :_input_key.right: 在世界中到處移動。
使用 :_gamepad_stick_left: 在世界中到處移動。

source_string: Move around the world using the on-screen joystick:tip_virtual_joystick: .
translation: 使用螢幕上的搖桿 :tip_virtual_joystick: 在世界中到處移動。

source_string: Move around the world using the on-screen buttons.
translation: 使用螢幕上的按鈕在世界中四處走動。

source_string: Move around the world using the on-screen joystick:tip_virtual_joystick: .
translation: 使用螢幕上的搖桿 :tip_virtual_joystick: 在世界中四處走動。
使用 :rift_left_stick: 在世界中到處移動。
使用 :windowsmr_left_stick: 在世界中到處移動。

source_string: The world is full of resources, including §ebuilding blocks§f, §ecrafting materials§f, and §efood§f.
translation: 世界充滿了資源，包括§e建築方塊§f、§e合成材料§f、以及§e食物§f。

source_string: You can §ebreak blocks§f with your bare hands to gather resources like dirt and wood. Aim at a block, then §epress and hold§f :_input_key.attack:  until it breaks and the resources drop.
translation: 您可以徒手§e破壞方塊§f來收集泥土和木材等資源。瞄準一個方塊，然後§e按住§f :_input_key.attack:直到它破裂並且掉出資源。

source_string: You can §ebreak blocks§f with your bare hands to gather resources like dirt and wood. §eTouch and hold§f on the block until it breaks and the resources drop.
translation: 您可以徒手§e破壞方塊§f來收集泥土和木材等資源。§e觸碰並按住§f直到它破裂並且掉出資源。

source_string: You can §ebreak blocks§f with your bare hands to gather resources like dirt and wood. Aim at a block, then §etouch and hold§f :tip_virtual_button_action_attack_or_destroy:  until it breaks and the resources drop.
translation: 您可以徒手§e破壞方塊§f來收集泥土和木材等資源。瞄準一個方塊，然後§e觸碰並按住§f :tip_virtual_button_action_attack_or_destroy:直到它破裂並且掉出資源。

source_string: You can §ebreak blocks§f with your bare hands to gather resources like dirt and wood. Aim at a block, then §eclick and hold§f :_input_key.attack:  until it breaks and the resources drop.
translation: 您可以徒手§e破壞方塊§f來收集泥土和木材等資源。瞄準一個方塊，然後§e點擊並按住§f :_input_key.attack:直到它破裂並且掉出資源。

source_string: Pick up any dropped resources by walking over the floating icons.
translation: 透過走到浮動圖示上來撿起任何掉落的資源。

source_string: Resources you pick up will appear in your §ehotbar§f, which you'll find at the bottom of the screen.
translation: 你撿起的資源將出現在§e快捷欄§f中，快捷欄位於畫面下方。

source_string: To hold an item in your hand, scroll the mouse wheel to select the item. You can also use a number key: 1 is the first hotbar slot and 9 is the last.
translation: 若要將某個物品握在手中，請捲動滑鼠滾輪即可選擇該物品。您也可以使用數字鍵：1 是第一個快捷欄，而 9 是最後一個。

source_string: To hold an item in your hand, use :_input_key.cycleItemLeft: and :_input_key.cycleItemRight: to select the item.
translation: 若要將某個物品握在手中，使用 :_input_key.cycleItemLeft: 和 :_input_key.cycleItemRight: 來選擇物品。

source_string: To hold an item in your hand, simply tap it in the hotbar.
translation: 若要將某個物品握在手中，只需要在物品欄中按一下即可。

source_string: To hold an item in your hand, use :rift_left_trigger: and :rift_left_grab: to select the item.
translation: 若要將某個物品握在手中，使用 :rift_left_trigger: 和 :rift_left_grab: 來選擇物品。

source_string: To hold an item in your hand, use :windowsmr_left_touchpad_horizontal: to select the item.
translation: 若要將某個物品握在手中，使用 :windowsmr_left_touchpad_horizontal: 來選擇物品。

source_string: Some items, like buckets, fishing rods, and bows, can be used by tapping the build/use button :_input_key.use:.
translation: 桶子、釣魚竿和弓等部分物品可透過按下建造/使用按鈕 :_input_key.use: 來使用。

source_string: Some items, like buckets, fishing rods, and bows, can be used by touching and holding anywhere on the screen.
translation: 有些物品，例如桶子、釣魚竿和弓箭，可以透過觸控和按住螢幕上的任何位置來使用。

source_string: Some items, like buckets, fishing rods, and bows, can be used by tapping the build/use button :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use:.
translation: 有些物品、例如桶子、釣魚竿和弓箭，可以透過輕按建造/使用按鈕 :tip_virtual_button_action_use_or_use: 來使用。

source_string: Any block you've picked up can placed back into the world. This way you can build a cozy §eshelter§f or anything else you can imagine!
translation: 你撿起的任何方塊都可以放回世界中。這樣你就可以建造舒適的§e庇護所§f或是任何你可以想像到的東西！

source_string: Choose a block in your hotbar, then press :_input_key.use: to place it.
translation: 在快捷欄中選擇一個方塊，然後按下 :_input_key.use: 來放置它。

source_string: Tap a block in your hotbar to select it, then tap somewhere in the world to place it.
translation: 輕觸快捷欄中的方塊即可選取該方塊，然後點擊世界中的任意處以放置它。

source_string: Tap a block in your hotbar to select it, then tap :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use: to place it.
translation: 輕觸快捷欄中的方塊選擇該方塊，然後輕按 :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use: 來放置它。

source_string: Don't worry if you place something in the wrong spot - simply break it again, then pick it back up!
translation: 別擔心，如果你放錯地方，只要再打破方塊一次，然後把它撿起來就可以了！

source_string: Navigation is an important skill that you will learn in Minecraft as it's not always easy to find your way home.
translation: 導航是您會在 Minecraft 中學到的一項重要技能，因為有時您可能連回家的路都找不到。

source_string: First of all, there are some basic tools that you should know about.
translation: 首先向您介紹一些基本工具。

source_string: A Compass will point in the direction of the first place you spawned into the world, an easy way to find where you started.
translation: 羅盤會一律指向您初次進入世界的起始點，讓您能輕鬆找到來時路。

source_string: A Map lets you see the area you've explored. Put it in your offhand slot to use it like a mini-map. You can increase its size by adding more paper to the edges in a Crafting Table.
translation: 地圖可讓您查看自己曾探索過的區域。將地圖放在副手物品欄就能當作小地圖來使用。您可以利用精製台為地圖銜接更多紙張，擴大地圖的涵蓋範圍。

source_string: A Locator Map will show you where you are and what direction you are facing in relation to the Locator Map's origin. It will also show you the location of other players in the same world.
translation: 定位地圖會顯示您的所在位置和所朝向的方位 (根據定位地圖來源的相對位置)，此外也會顯示同一個世界中其他玩家的位置。

source_string: A Cartography Table can help you create, expand, copy and even name maps.
translation: 製圖台可協助您製作、擴大、複製，甚至是命名地圖。

source_string: Place paper into the first slot to craft a Map. If you add a compass into the second slot you can craft a Locator Map. Adding Paper or a blank Map will let you expand or copy your Map.
translation: 將紙張放入第一個插槽中以製作地圖。如果將羅盤加入第二個插槽中，則可以製作「定位器地圖」。加入「紙張」或「空白地圖」，你就能展開或複製地圖。

source_string: Try to watch for landmarks as you explore. The more you play on a world, the more you will be able to remember where you are. Another good trick is to place Torches as you go so that you may find your way back home.
translation: 探索時不妨仔細觀察周圍的地標。您在世界中探索的範圍越大，就越能記住自己身在何方。另一個小技巧是在移動過程中放置火把，如此一來您或許就能找到回家的路。

source_string: The sun can also tell you what direction you are facing. Remember: the sun rises in the east and sets in the west!
translation: 您也能透過太陽來判斷自己面向的方位。可別忘了，太陽從東邊升起、在西邊落下！

source_string: There are several places for you to explore. Find a village and look for a Cartographer. He will trade you Explorer Maps that will lead you to strange places very far away.
translation: 世界中有許多地點等著您來探索。您可以在村莊中找到製圖師，他所交易的探險家地圖可以引領您一探路途遙遠的異鄉。

source_string: A Nether Portal allows you to travel to a different dimension.
translation: 地獄傳送門會帶您前往不同的向度。

source_string: If constructed correctly the Nether Portal can be lit and activated.
translation: 如果建造方式正確無誤，您就能啟動並打開地獄傳送門。

source_string: Example of a portal construction shown here:
translation: 傳送門建造的範例在此：

source_string: In Minecraft, the sun rises and sets as you adventure in your world. As the sun sets, you must take precautions. There are many dangers at night!
translation: 在您的 Minecraft 冒險旅途中，晝夜也會隨之交替。太陽一旦下山，您就得保持警覺，因為入夜後裡無處不是危險！

source_string: If you have not already, you will need a place to take shelter from the dark and what lurks within it. This can be as simple as a hole in the side of a hill or a small cabin in the forest.
translation: 如果您什麼都還沒準備，請先找個地方歇歇腳，如此才能遠離黑暗和潛伏在其中的危險。就算只是山邊洞穴或林中小屋這般簡陋的地方也無所謂。

source_string: Be sure to block off all entrances, you may want to use a door so you can go in and out. If you have made a bed this is a good place to put it along with your Crafting Table and Furnace.
translation: 請務必阻隔住所有出傳送門，但記得幫自己留一扇門，方便進出。如果您製作了床舖，不妨將它和精製台及熔爐放在一起。

source_string: Also be sure to light up the area with torches, it may save your life.
translation: 另外，一定要用火把照亮四周區域，此舉或許能保住您的小命。

source_string: When the sun starts to set, it's time to get ready.
translation: 太陽開始下山後，就該做好準備了。

source_string: At night, the Overworld is home to zombies, spiders, skeletons, and other dangerous creatures we call §ehostile mobs§f.
translation: 在夜晚，主世界是殭屍、蜘蛛、骷髏和其他危險生物的家，我們稱之為§e敵對生物§f。

source_string: Crafting some §etorches§f can help you see in the dark, while also keeping mobs from spawning too close.
translation: 合成一些§e火把§f能幫助你在黑暗中看清楚，同時也會阻止生物生成得太靠近你。

source_string: While holding a torch, place it into the world by right-clicking a nearby free surface.
translation: 在手持火把時，在附近的空地按一下右鍵就可以把它放上去。

source_string: While holding a torch, place it into the world by pressing :_input_key.use:.
translation: 在手持火把時，按下 :_input_key.use: 就可以把它放上去。

source_string: While holding a torch, place it into the world by tapping a nearby free surface.
translation: 在手持火把時，輕觸附近的空地就可以把它放上去。

source_string: While holding a torch, place it into the world by aiming at a nearby block and tapping :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use:.
translation: 在手持火把時，瞄準附近的方塊並輕觸 :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use:，即可將其放上去。

source_string: There are several mobs in Minecraft that you can tame and make your pet. Each can be tamed by giving them an item that they like. Once tamed you can have them stay by pressing :_input_key.use: while looking at them.
translation: 您可以在 Minecraft 中馴服多種生物，並將他們收為寵物。只要給予一件該生物喜歡的物品，就能馴服牠們。馴服生物後，在望向牠時按 :_input_key.use: 即可將其收為寵物。

source_string: There are several mobs in Minecraft that you can tame and make your pet. Each can be tamed by giving them an item that they like. Once tamed you can have them stay by tapping the Sit Button.
translation: 您可以在 Minecraft 中馴服多種生物，並將他們收為寵物。只要給予該生物喜歡的物品，就能馴服牠們。馴服生物後，輕觸 [坐下] 按鈕即可將其收為寵物。

source_string: Wolves are a neutral mob that hunt in the colder climates. They will attack Rabbits, Skeletons, and Sheep but run away from Llamas. They won't attack you unless you provoke them. You can tame them by giving them Bones.
translation: 狼是在寒冷氣候下狩獵的中立生物。牠們會攻擊兔子、骷髏和綿羊，但與羊駝保持距離。除非您先發動攻擊，否則狼不會主動攻擊您。只要給予骨頭就能馴服牠們。

source_string: Cats are a neutral mob that can be found in villages. They will attack Rabbits and Baby Turtles. They will also keep Phantoms and Creepers away. They will try to run from you so taming them can be tough. They like fish so give them Raw Cod or Salmon to tame them.
translation: 貓是可以在村莊中找到的中立生物。牠們會攻擊兔子和小海龜。牠們也會趕跑幻影和苦力怕。貓會試圖逃離您的身邊，因此馴服牠們可能不大容易。牠們喜歡魚類，因此給予生鱈魚或生鮭魚即可馴服。

source_string: Parrots are a passive mob that live in the Jungle. They will imitate any other mob in the area. Seeds are their favorite, give them a few to tame them. Parrots will also sit on your shoulder... Yes, you can have more than one up there.
translation: 鸚鵡是棲息在叢林中的被動生物。牠們會模仿該地區的其他生物。種子是鸚鵡的最愛，只要給予一些種子就能馴服牠們。鸚鵡也會駐留在您的肩上... 沒錯，您可以同時讓一隻以上的鸚鵡停在您的肩膀上。

source_string: While exploring the world you may encounter a Pillager encampment or patrol. Pillagers are always looking for villages to raid. Taking their Banners will get their attention, and they may choose to attack a nearby village.
translation: 在探索世界時，你可能會遇到掠奪者營地或巡邏。掠奪者總是在尋找村莊進行襲擊。拿著他們的旗幟會引起他們的注意，他們可能會選擇攻擊附近的村莊。

source_string: Be sure to defend your village, the attack will stop if you defeat all the raiders.
translation: 記得要防衛您的村莊，如果您打敗所有突襲者，攻擊就會停止。

source_string: Villagers will most likely be very grateful that you have saved them from the raiders. Be sure to check back with them, you might get a good deal.
translation: 村民們很可能會非常感激你把他們從掠奪者手中救了出來。請務必回頭聯繫他們，你可能會得到不錯的東西。

source_string: In Minecraft, you can have your own ranch filled with livestock! Ranching provides lots of resources such as wool, eggs, and raw meat.
translation: 在 Minecraft 中，您可以在自家農場中養滿家畜！畜牧可為您帶來大量資源，例如羊毛、蛋和生肉等等。

source_string: In order to keep your livestock growing, you have to make baby animals. Adult animals must enter Love Mode for this to happen. Feed the animals their preferred food to get them to enter Love Mode.
translation: 為了確保家畜興盛，您必須讓成年動物必須進入發情模式，好讓牠們繁衍下一代。只要餵食動物各自喜好的食物，就能讓他們進入發情模式。

source_string: When two like animals are nearby and in Love Mode, they will kiss for a moment and then a baby animal will appear! The baby animal will stay with their parents until they grow into an adult. After having a baby, adult animals must wait 1 minute before entering Love Mode.
translation: 當兩隻靠近的動物都處於發情模式時，牠們會先親吻一下對方，然後小動物就誕生了！小動物會先待在父母身邊，直到成年為止。小動物誕生後，成年動物必須等候 1 分鐘才能再次進入發情模式。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: Cows, mooshrooms, and sheep all eat Wheat. Pigs can eat Carrots or Beetroot. Chickens love Seeds of any kinds. Rabbits will eat Carrots, Golden Carrots, or Dandelions. Ocelots enjoy Raw Cod or Salmon. Wolves like to eat any kind of meat.
translation: 乳牛、哞菇和綿羊喜歡吃小麥、豬喜歡吃胡蘿蔔和甜菜根、雞喜歡吃各類種子、兔子喜歡吃胡蘿蔔、金色胡蘿蔔和蒲公英、豹貓喜歡吃生鱈魚和生鮭魚，狼則是所有肉類都吃。

source_string: Animals will follow you when you hold their desired food item. This will help you lead them to your ranch or another animal.
translation: 當您拿著動物喜好的食物時，牠們就會尾隨著您。您可以藉此技巧帶牠們前往牧場，以便靠近其他動物。

source_string: Don't worry, you don't need to remember every recipe by heart. The §erecipe book§f in your inventory keeps track of blocks and items you can craft - simply click a recipe to see what you need to craft it.
translation: 別擔心，你不必在心裡記住每個配方。物品欄裡的§e配方書§f會隨時記錄你可以製作的方塊和物品。只要按一下配方，就能查看合成物品所需的材料。

source_string: Don't worry, you don't need to remember every recipe by heart. The §erecipe book§f in your inventory keeps track of blocks and items you can craft - simply select a recipe to see what you need to craft it.
translation: 別擔心，你不必在心裡記住每個配方。物品欄裡的§e配方書§f會隨時記錄你可以製作的方塊和物品。只要選取配方，就能查看合成物品所需的原料。

source_string: Don't worry, you don't need to remember every recipe by heart. The §erecipe book§f in your inventory keeps track of blocks and items you can craft - simply tap a recipe to see what you need to craft it.
translation: 別擔心，你不必在心裡記住每個配方。物品欄裡的§e配方書§f會隨時記錄你可以製作的方塊和物品。只要輕觸配方，就能查看合成物品所需的材料。

source_string: Once you've gathered the required crafting ingredients, click the recipe once more, then move it from the output slot to your hotbar or inventory.
translation: 收集所需的合成原料後，再按一下配方，然後將其從輸出槽移到快捷欄或物品欄。

source_string: Once you've gathered the required crafting ingredients, select the recipe once more, then move it from the output slot to your hotbar or inventory.
translation: 收集完所需的合成材料後，再次選擇配方，然後把它從產出欄移動到快捷欄或物品欄中。

source_string: Once you've gathered the required crafting ingredients, tap the recipe once more, then move it from the output slot to your hotbar or inventory.
translation: 收集所需的合成原料後，再點一下配方，然後將其從輸出槽移到快捷欄或物品欄。

source_string: Redstone Dust comes from Redstone Ore. This dust transmits an electrical signal. When it has power it lights up and transmits its signal to other Redstone items that are next to it.
translation: 紅石塵來自紅石礦石，會傳送電子訊號。蘊含能量時，紅石塵就會發光並傳送訊號至旁邊的其他紅石物品。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: In order for one of these items to be powered, it needs a power source such as a Lever, Button, or Pressure Plate. Experiment to find them all!
translation: 如要讓這些物品獲得能量，您必須使用拉桿、按鈕、壓板來供電。您不妨多方嘗試各種組合！

source_string: Place some Redstone Dust next to a power source and turn it on to power it.
translation: 將一些紅石塵放在能量來源旁，就能激發功效來為其充能。

source_string: There are many items that use a Redstone signal to do something, such as a Hopper or a Piston.
translation: 許多物品都會利用紅石信號的功效，例如漏斗和活塞。

source_string: Redstone allows for endless possibilities! Try creating something useful for yourself like an automatic farm!
translation: 紅石帶來無限可能！試著自行製作一些實用的東西，比方說一座自動化農場！

source_string: A social hub for you and all the members of the Realm. Share your adventures and creations by posting stories to the Story Feed, like and comment to celebrate stories posted by other members.
translation: 一個你和 Realm 所有成員的社交中心。藉由在故事動態發布即時動態來分享你的冒險和創作，點讚及留言來慶祝其他成員發布的即時動態。

source_string: Clicking the ADD STORY button on the Story Feed will let you write a story of your own. You can choose to include a screenshot or text (or both!). Clicking the POST button will post your text/screenshot to the Story Feed for all the Realm's members to enjoy. If you don't have any screenshots to post, use the §ecamera§f:camera: on the game menu to capture the moment.
translation: 按下故事動態上的「新增故事」按鈕，寫下自己的故事吧。您可以選擇附上螢幕擷取畫面或文字 (或兩者都附上！)。按下「發布」按鈕將文字/螢幕擷取畫面發布到故事動態中，讓所有 Realm 成員觀看。如果你沒有任何可發布的螢幕擷取畫面，請使用遊戲功能表上的§e相機§f:camera:來拍下這個時刻。

source_string: Whenever there is a new story in the Feed that you haven't read yet, a number will appear on the REALMS STORIES button. You'll always know when there is something new to read from your Realm's community. If you like what someone shared, go ahead and leave them a like or comment on their story!
translation: 每當動態中出現你尚未閱讀的新即時動態時，REALMS 故事按鈕上就會出現數字。你總是能知道 Realm 社群中什麼時候有新的東西可以看。如果你喜歡某人分享的內容，點讚或在他們的故事上留言吧！

source_string: See who's playing and when in the Timeline. Scroll through the members of the Realm to see when they played last and who they played with. Use this information to set up times when you can all play together.
translation: 在時間線中查看誰在那些時候遊玩。捲動 Realm 成員，看看他們上次遊玩的時間以及和誰一起玩。使用此資訊來安排你們一起遊玩的時間。

source_string: Know who is on the Realm

Get to know who is part of the Realm by using the Members tab. It's a list of all the players who can play here. You can see who the Realm owner is, who the operators are, and who has joined Realms Stories for this Realm. There are search, sort, and filter options to help you find exactly who you're looking for.
translation: 使用「成員」標籤來得知誰是 Realm 的一份子。這是所有可以在這裡遊玩的玩家清單。你可以看到誰是 Realm 擁有者、誰是操作者，以及誰加入了這個 Realm 的 Realms Stories。搜尋、排序以及篩選可幫助你準確地找到你要尋找的人。

source_string: Realms Stories is available in the game menu when you're playing in the Realm and on the Realms Tab. You can keep up to date and tell your story from anywhere you are, even when you aren't playing. From your console, computer, and mobile device, Realms Stories is available everywhere.
translation: 在 Realm 中遊玩，或在 Realm 標籤上時，你可以在遊戲功能表中選擇 Realms Stories。就算在你沒玩遊戲的時候，你也能隨時隨地瞭解最新狀況並說出自己的故事。在你的遊戲主機、電腦和行動裝置，Realms Stories 隨處皆可使用。

source_string: Scaffolding can help you create huge structures safely! You can walk inside scaffolding and stand on it. If you have a column of scaffolding you can go upward by standing in the scaffolding and pressing :_input_key.jump:. If you want to travel downward you can press :_input_key.sneak:.
translation: 支架可以協助您安全建造巨大建築！您可以走入支架中，還可以站在支架上。如果您有一根支架的柱子，您可以站在支架中然後按 :_input_key.jump: 以向上搭建。如果要向下搭建，您可以按 :_input_key.sneak:。

source_string: Scaffolding can help you create huge structures safely! You can walk inside scaffolding and stand on it. If you have a column of scaffolding you can go upward by standing in the scaffolding and pressing :_input_key.jump:. If you want to travel downward you can press and hold :_input_key.sneak:.
translation: 支架可以協助您安全建造巨型建築！您可以走入支架並站在支架上。如果您有一根支架的柱子，即可站在支架中，然後按 :_input_key.jump: 以向上搭建。如果要向下搭建，您可以按住 :_input_key.sneak:。

source_string: Scaffolding can help with building large structures by offering a way to reach higher places and safely descend without taking fall damage.
translation: 支架可以協助建造大型設施，能讓你到達更高處，並安全地下降，免於受到落下傷害。

source_string: When using the D-Pad control scheme, tap :touch_jump: to climb up a column of scaffolding. Tap :touch_fly_down: to climb down.
translation: 使用方向鍵控制方案時，點擊 :touch_jump: 爬上一列支架。點擊 :touch_fly_down: 來往下爬。

source_string: When using a Joystick control scheme, press :tip_virtual_button_jump: to climb up a column of scaffolding. Tap :tip_virtual_button_sneak: to climb down.
translation: 使用搖桿控制方案時，按 :tip_virtual_button_jump: 來爬上一列支架。點擊 :tip_virtual_button_sneak: 來往下爬。

source_string: Scaffolding can help you create huge structures safely! You can walk inside scaffolding and stand on it. If you have a column of scaffolding you can go upward by standing in the scaffolding and pressing :rift_A:. If you want to travel downward you can press and hold :rift_X:.
translation: 支架可以協助你安全建造巨型建築！你可以走入支架並站在支架上。如果你有一根支架的柱子，即可站在支架中，然後按 :rift_A: 以向上搭建。如果要向下搭建，你可以按住 :rift_X:。

source_string: Scaffolding can help you create huge structures safely! You can walk inside scaffolding and stand on it. If you have a column of scaffolding you can go upward by standing in the scaffolding and pressing :windowsmr_right_touchpad:. If you want to travel downward you can press and hold :windowsmr_right_stick:.
translation: 支架可以協助你安全建造巨型建築！你可以走入支架並站在支架上。如果你有一根支架的柱子，即可站在支架中，然後按 :windowsmr_right_touchpad: 以向上搭建。如果要向下搭建，你可以按住 :windowsmr_right_stick:。

source_string: Scaffolding needs support. You can only place so many scaffolding horizontally without touching a different block. When you attempt to place too many scaffolding blocks without proper support, it will fall. Scaffolding can be placed like normal blocks, but it can also be placed on its own foundation to quickly build a tall tower.
translation: 支架需要支撐。在同一個方塊裡，您只能水平放置特定數量的支架。如果放置太多支架方塊，沒有支撐的話支架就會垮下來。支架可以和一般方塊一樣放置，也可以放在其地基上以快速建造高塔。

source_string: When Scaffolding is broken it will also break every Scaffolding block that was being supported by it. This will let you quickly clean up your scaffolding by breaking the supporting blocks!
translation: 如果破壞支架，每一個被支撐的支架方塊也會遭到破壞。這樣您就可以利用破壞支撐方塊的方式快速清掉支架！

source_string: Put on some fresh pixels and express yourself with a huge variety of inspired looks.
translation: 換上新穎的像素圖案，利用各種受靈感啟發的造型來表現自己。

source_string: Structure Blocks give creators the ability to copy and save out sections of their world into structures. Saved structures can then be pasted back into the world.
translation: 結構方塊可讓創作者複製並儲存其世界的部分，然後在結構中使用。然後已儲存的結構可以貼回至世界中。

source_string: To get a Structure Block you must use the /give slash command. To use a Structure Block, you must have Operator permissions.
translation: 若要取得結構方塊，您必須使用 /give 的斜線指令。若要使用結構方塊，您必須有操作者權限。

source_string: Structure Blocks have 4 modes that can be switched between with the Mode dropdown: Save, Load, Corner, and 3D Export.
translation: 結構方塊有 4 個可在「模式」下拉式選單中切換的模式：儲存、載入和 3D 匯出。

source_string: Save mode saves an area of the world as a structure. ##
translation: 儲存模式可將世界的某個區域儲存為結構。

source_string: Load mode loads a structure into the world. Only structures saved to the world or included in a behavior pack that is applied to the world can be loaded. ##
translation: 載入模式可在世界中載入結構。只有在世界中儲存或在行為模式包中隨附且已套用至世界的結構可以載入。

source_string: Corner mode is used with save mode's detect button to automatically set the area you want to save. See the Corner Mode section below for more details.  ##
translation: 角落模式與儲存模式的偵測按鈕一起使用，以自動設定要儲存的區域。有關詳細資料，請參閱下方的「角落模式」章節。

source_string: 3D Export exports a 3D model file on supported platforms.  ##
translation: 「3D 匯出」可在支援的平台中匯出 3D 模型。

source_string: On the right side of the Structure Block screen, a preview of the area you have selected or the structure to load will appear depending on the mode the block is in.
translation: 在結構方塊畫面的右邊，視方塊所處的模式而定，所選區域或要載入的結構預覽會顯示。

source_string: Press :_input_key.attack: and drag, to rotate the 3D preview.
translation: 按 :_input_key.attack: 並拖曳，即可旋轉 3D 預覽。
使用 :_gamepad_stick_right: 可旋轉 3D 預覽。

source_string: Touch and drag on the preview to rotate the 3D preview.
translation: 輕觸並拖曳預覽可旋轉 3D 預覽。

source_string: Redstone can be used to activate a Structure Block. This will cause it to either save a structure out or load a structure into the world, depending on the mode of the block and its settings.
translation: 紅石可用來啟動結構方塊。視方塊及其設定而定，此將導致方塊儲存結構或在世界中載入結構。

source_string: You can change how much of a structure is loaded in by changing the values for Integrity and Seed.
translation: 您可以變更「整合與種子」的值來變更結構載入的量。

source_string: Integrity - the percentage of blocks to load in from the structure, accepted values are 0 to 100. Blocks will be chosen randomly if a Seed is not specified. ##
translation: 整合 - 從結構中載入的方塊百分比，接受的值為 0 至 100。如果沒有指定「種子」，系統將隨機選擇方塊。

source_string: Seed - the value entered here will determine which blocks to remove when using Integrity. Leave this field blank if you want the blocks to be chosen randomly. ##
translation: 種子 - 在此輸入的值將決定使用「整合」時要移除哪些方塊。如果要系統隨機選擇方塊，此欄請保留空白。

source_string: When a structure with Structure Void blocks is loaded into the world, any block that would have been removed where the structure void block is loading into, will instead stay in the world.
translation: 當世界中載入有結構空位方塊的結構時，所有在結構空位方塊載入位置會移除的方塊都會改為在世界中保留。

source_string: Example: loading an empty shipwreck into the bottom of the ocean will normally copy air over the water blocks. If the shipwreck was filled with structure void, then the water will stay, and you will have a shipwreck filled with water.  ##
translation: 範例：通常在海洋底部載入空的沉船會在水方塊上複製空氣。如果沉船中裝滿結構空位，那麼水就會保留，因此沉船裡就會充滿水。

source_string: To automatically select the area you want to save, you can place Corner Mode blocks around your structure and name them with the same name as the structure you want to save.  ##
translation: 若要自動選取要儲存的區域，您可以在結構周圍放置「角落模式」方塊，並使用要儲存的結構名稱命名。

source_string: Pressing the Detect button in Save mode will find all of the Corner Blocks with the same name and create a selection area so that it will save everything inside of the volume those Corner Blocks make. ##
translation: 在 [儲存模式] 下按下 [檢測] 按鈕將會尋找具有相同名稱的所有 [角落方塊]，並建立一個選取區域，以便儲存磁碟區中 [角落方塊] 製作的所有內容。

source_string: Combine two Shulker Shells with a Chest to create a Shulker Box. Shulker Shells are dropped by Shulkers found in End Cities. Unlike other containers, Shulker Boxes keep their items when broken. Shulker Boxes will break and drop as an item if pushed by Pistons, and can be placed using Dispensers.
translation: 將兩個界伏蚌殼和一個箱子結合就能製作界伏蚌盒。終界城市中的界伏蚌會掉落界伏蚌殼。與其他容器不同，界伏蚌盒損壞時仍會保留物品。被活塞推動的界伏蚌盒會損壞並以物品的形式掉落。您可使用發射器來放置界伏蚌盒。

source_string: How to Play: The Crafting Table
Ready to take your crafting to the next level? Place four planks in a square in your crafting grid, and you'll get a §ecrafting table§f :crafting_table: - a whole new way to craft.
translation: 準備好讓你的合成進入全新境界了嗎？在合成格中放置四塊木材，你將獲得§e精製台§f :crafting_table: 這種全新合成方式。

source_string: Place your crafting table in the world, then right-click it to open it. The larger crafting grid will let you make bigger and better things, including tools, beds, and doors.
translation: 把精製台放在世界中，接著按一下右鍵就能開啟。合成格愈大，能合成的物品就愈大愈好，包括工具、床舖和門。

source_string: Place your crafting table in the world, then walk up to it and press :_input_key.use: to open it. The larger crafting grid will let you make bigger and better things, including tools, beds, and doors.
translation: 把精製台放在世界中，接著按一下:_input_key.use:就能開啟。合成格愈大，能合成的物品就愈大愈好，包括工具、床舖和門。

source_string: Place your crafting table in the world, then tap it to open it. The larger crafting grid will let you make bigger and better things, including tools, beds, and doors.
translation: 把精製台放在世界中，接著輕觸它就能開啟。合成格愈大，能合成的物品就愈大愈好，包括工具、床舖和門。

source_string: The End is another dimension which can be accessed through an active End Portal. The End Portal can be found in a Stronghold, which is deep underground in the Overworld.
translation: 終界是您能造訪的另一個向度，只要穿越開啟中的終界傳送門就能抵達。您可以在主世界的深邃地底要塞中找到終界傳送門。

source_string: Every End Portal Frame block is missing something mysterious to bring out the power within.
translation: 所有終界傳送門框架的方塊都缺少了某個神秘的部件，使得內部的力量無法施展。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: Once the portal is active, jump into it to go to The End.
translation: 啟動傳送門後，只要穿越此門就會前往終界。

source_string: The End is home to the dreaded Ender Dragon. She is a fierce and powerful enemy and seems to draw power from strange crystals. Her breath and fireball attacks leave lingering acid across the battlefield. Bring some friends to ensure your victory!
translation: 終界是駭人的終界龍的居所。牠是性情暴烈又威力強大的敵人，似乎正從奇怪的水晶中吸取能量。牠的吐息和火球攻擊在戰場上留下了一股揮之不去的酸腐氣味。要想獲得勝利，可別忘了多帶幾位好友，才能與之抗衡！

source_string: If once wasn't enough, add four End Crystals to the exit portal corners to reawaken the Ender Dragon.
translation: 如果覺得一次還不過癮，只要將四顆終界晶體放在出口終界的角落上，就能再次喚醒終界龍。
context: How To Play help text. {MaxLength="500"}

source_string: Texture packs visually transform the game's appearance, applying a fresh coat of paint to your Minecraft world.
translation: 材質套件改變了遊戲的視覺外觀，為你的 Minecraft 世界換上新鮮色彩吧。

source_string: There are many tools in Minecraft that will allow you mine blocks faster than your fist. Tools can be crafted from Wood, Stone, Iron, Gold, Diamond, or Netherite.
translation: Minecraft 中有許多工具能夠挖礦挖得比拳頭還快。這些工具可以用木頭、石頭、鐵、黃金、鑽石或獄髓錠合成。

source_string: Using the right tool for the job will not only mine that block faster, but will also lose less durability. More complex tools must be created in order to mine rarer resources.
translation: 合適的工具不但能讓開採方塊的速度更快，耗損的耐久度也會更低。如果要開採較稀有的資源，您必須製作更複雜的工具。

source_string: The Pickaxe is good at breaking hard blocks like Cobblestone, Iron, or Furnaces.
translation: 鎬很適合用來擊碎堅硬的方塊，例如鵝卵石、鐵或熔爐。

source_string: The Axe is good at breaking wooden blocks like Logs, Planks, or Crafting Tables.
translation: 斧頭適合用來破壞木質方塊，例如：木頭、木材或精製台。

source_string: The Shovel is good at breaking loose blocks like Dirt, Sand, and Gravel. Shovels can also create a path by pressing :_input_key.use: on grass blocks.
translation: 鏟子適合用來破壞鬆散的方塊，例如泥土、沙子和礫石。您也可以在青草方塊上按 :_input_key.use: 來用鏟子開路。

source_string: The Shovel is good at breaking loose blocks like Dirt, Sand, and Gravel. Shovels can also create a path by tapping on grass blocks.
translation: 鏟子適合用來破壞鬆散的方塊，例如泥土、沙子和礫石。您也可以輕觸青草方塊來用鏟子開路。

source_string: The Hoe is required for tilling Dirt to plant crops. Press :_input_key.use: on Dirt or Grass blocks to turn them into Farmland.
translation: 必須要用鋤頭犁地以種植作物。在泥土或青草方塊上按一下:_input_key.use:將其轉變成農地。

source_string: The Hoe is required for tilling Dirt to plant crops. Tap Dirt or Grass blocks to turn them into Farmland.
translation: 必須要用鋤頭犁地以種植作物。輕觸泥土或青草方塊，將其轉變成農地。

source_string: All of these tools can accept enchantments, either from the Enchanting Table or Anvil.
translation: 以上所有工具都能接受附魔，無論是用附魔台還是鐵砧都可以。

source_string: There are even more tools to aid you on your adventure:
translation: 在您的冒險旅途中，還有更多工具能夠派上用場：

source_string: A Bucket will allow you to collect things like Water, Milk, Lava, and even Fish.
translation: 您可以利用桶子來收集水、牛奶、甚至是熔岩等物品。

source_string: Flint & Steel allows you to light fires... be careful in densely wooded areas!
translation: 打火鐮可讓您點燃火苗... 在森林茂密的地方可得多加留心！

source_string: A Fishing Rod lets you catch fish and other loot from water blocks. It can also be used to pull other players and mobs. Fishing Rods can also be enchanted!
translation: 釣魚竿可讓您從水方塊中捕魚和獲得其他戰利品，而且還能將其他玩家和生物勾來身邊。您也可以釣魚竿附魔！

source_string: Shears are very handy for collecting items like Wool, Leaves, and Cobwebs.
translation: 用大剪刀來收集羊毛、樹葉和蜘蛛網等物品非常方便。

source_string: Trading can be done in villages. Each villager has a profession; they can be Farmers, Butchers, Blacksmiths, Cartographers, Librarians, or Priests. Some professions will trade for items that other professions cannot. Explore and trade with many villagers to find all the trades.
translation: 您可以在村莊裡完成交易。每位村民都有各自的職業，包括農夫、肉販、鐵匠、製圖師、圖書館員或祭司，這決定了他們能與您交易的物品類型。探索並與許多村民交易以找到所有交易。

source_string: You can find out what a villager is offering as trade by interacting with them. A villager may adjust the price of a trade whenever a player trades with it. A villager may run out of stock, temporarily disabling the trade if it is used too frequently. Trades usually involve buying or selling items for emeralds.
translation: 您可以與村民互動，找出他們提供交易的物品。玩家與村民交易時，村民的交易物品可能會異動或增加。如果交易次數過多，村民交易的物品可能會沒有庫存或交易功能可能會暫時停用。交易通常需要使用翡翠購買或販售物品。

source_string: As you trade with villagers, they will get better at their profession and start to offer better and more valuable trades.
translation: 當你與村民進行交易時，他們的職業水準將會提升，並開始提供更好、更有價值的交易。

source_string: Take care of your villagers, they need to rest, work, and eat to thrive.
translation: 好好照顧您的村民，他們需要休息、工作和吃飯才能生生不息。

source_string: There are many ways to get around other than walking or riding a mount or flying.
translation: 除了步行、騎乘坐騎和飛行之外，您還能透過多種方式來移動。

source_string: Minecarts are ridable carts that roll on Rails. You can make the Rails go wherever you want by placing them next to each other. Place a Minecart on the Rails and you are ready to ride.
translation: 您可以搭乘礦車在軌道上行駛。只要依序放置連續的軌道，就能讓軌道通往任何地方。準備好搭乘時請將一輛礦車放置在軌道上。

source_string: Minecarts are ridable carts that roll on Rails, which you can build to go anywhere. Just place multiple Rails next to each other, place a Minecart on it, and you're ready to ride.
translation: 礦車是在軌道上行駛的可乘坐小車，你可以搭乘一台礦車去任何地方。只要把軌道擺在一起，把礦車放上去，你就能搭乘了。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: while looking at a Minecart to hop in and ride. Press :_input_key.forward: to roll forward. Press :_input_key.jump: or :_input_key.sneak: to get out.
translation: 在望向礦車時按 :_input_key.use:，即可進入並搭乘礦車。按 :_input_key.forward: 可往前行駛，按 :_input_key.jump: 或 :_input_key.sneak: 則能離開礦車。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: while looking at a Minecart to hop in and ride. Push :_gamepad_stick_left: forward to roll forward. Press :_input_key.jump: or :_input_key.sneak: to get out.
translation: 在望向礦車時按 :_input_key.use:，即可進入並搭乘礦車。向前推動 :_gamepad_stick_left: 可往前行駛，按 :_input_key.jump: 或 :_input_key.sneak: 則能離開礦車。

source_string: Look at a Minecart and tap "Ride" to hop in.
translation: 看著礦車，再點擊「搭乘」跳進去。

source_string: When using the D-Pad control scheme, tap and hold :touch_forward: to start moving forward and build momentum, and tap :touch_jump: to get out.
translation: 使用方向鍵控制時，點下並按住 :touch_forward: 向前移動並加速，點下 :touch_jump: 離開。

source_string: When using a Joystick control scheme, drag :tip_virtual_joystick: up to start moving forward and build momentum, and tap :tip_virtual_button_dismount: to get out.
translation: 使用手把時，按住方向鍵「上」:tip_virtual_joystick: 向前移動並加速，然後點下 :tip_virtual_button_dismount: 離開。

source_string: Boats let you travel across water. Place one on a water block and you are ready to go.
translation: 搭乘船隻就能在水上航行。將船隻放在水方塊上，就可以出發了。

source_string: Boats let you travel across water. Just place one on a water block and you're ready to go.
translation: 船隻可讓你在水上航行。只要將船隻放在水方塊上，就可以出發了。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: while looking at a Boat to board it. Press :_input_key.left: or :_input_key.right: to turn left or right. Press :_input_key.forward: to move forward. Press :_input_key.jump: or :_input_key.sneak: to get out.
translation: 在望向小船時按 :_input_key.use: 即可上船。按 :_input_key.left: 或 :_input_key.right: 可向左或向右轉。按 :_input_key.forward: 可往前移動。按 :_input_key.jump: 或 :_input_key.sneak: 就能下船。

source_string: Press :_input_key.use: while looking at a Boat to board it. Push :_gamepad_stick_left: left or right to turn. Push :_gamepad_stick_left: forward to move forward. Press :_input_key.jump: or :_input_key.sneak: to get out.
translation: 在視野朝向小船時按 :_input_key.use: 即可上船。往左或往右推動 :_gamepad_stick_left: 轉向，往前推動 :_gamepad_stick_left: 則可前進。按 :_input_key.jump: 或 :_input_key.sneak: 即可下船。

source_string: Look at a Boat and tap "Board" to board it.
translation: 看著船，然後點下「上船」就能搭船了。

source_string: When using the D-Pad control scheme, tap :touch_left: or :touch_right: to turn left or right, or tap and hold both to move forward. Tap "Leave Boat" to get out.
translation: 使用方向鍵控制時，點下 :touch_left: 或 :touch_right: 來向左或向右轉，或兩個同時點下並按住來向前移動。點下「離開船」離開。

source_string: When using a Joystick control scheme, drag :tip_virtual_joystick: up to move forward and tap :tip_virtual_button_dismount: to get out.
translation: 使用手把時，按住方向鍵上 :tip_virtual_joystick: 向前移動，然後點下 :tip_virtual_button_dismount: 離開。

source_string: The Sword is the primary melee weapon in Minecraft. It can be made from Wood, Stone, Iron, Gold, Diamond, or Netherite. Jump attacks do critical damage!
translation: 劍是 Minecraft 中主要的近戰武器。可用木頭、石頭、鐵、黃金、鑽石或獄髓錠合成。跳躍攻擊可造成爆擊傷害！

source_string: Press :_input_key.attack: with a Sword in your hand to attack.
translation: 持劍時按 :_input_key.attack: 即可攻擊。

source_string: The Bow is the primary ranged weapon in Minecraft. Press and hold :_input_key.use: to draw the bow back. Release :_input_key.use: to fire an arrow. The bow requires arrows to fire.
translation: 弓箭是 Minecraft 中的主要遠程武器。按住 :_input_key.use: 拉弓，放開 :_input_key.use: 即可射出箭矢。弓需要箭才能射擊。

source_string: The Bow is the primary ranged weapon in Minecraft. Press and hold the Screen to draw the bow back. Release the press to fire an arrow. The bow requires arrows to fire.
translation: 弓箭是 Minecraft 中的主要遠程武器。按住畫面拉弓，放開後即可射出箭矢。弓需要箭才能射擊。

source_string: Bows do more damage the further they are pulled back, make sure to pull it all the way back.
translation: 弓拉得越緊，造成的傷害越高，因此請務必將弓拉到最底。

source_string: The Crossbow is an alternate ranged weapon. Press and hold :_input_key.use: to load the crossbow. Once the Crossbow is loaded, it will stay loaded until it is fired. Press :_input_key.use: to fire an arrow. The Crossbow requires arrows to load.
translation: 十字弓是另一種遠程武器。按住 :_input_key.use: 可裝載十字弓。十字弓裝載後就會保持裝載，直到發射為止。按 :_input_key.use: 可射出箭矢。十字弓需要箭矢才能裝載。

source_string: The crossbow is a ranged weapon which requires an arrow to be loaded. Tap and hold anywhere on the screen to load the crossbow with an arrow.
translation: 十字弓是遠程武器，需要裝箭。點下並按住螢幕上的任何位置，將箭裝入十字弓。

source_string: Once you've loaded the crossbow it'll stay loaded until fired, even when you put it in your inventory.
translation: 裝填十字弓後，它會持續保持裝填狀態直到射擊，即使你把它放在物品欄內。

source_string: Tap anywhere on the screen to fire a loaded crossbow.
translation: 輕點螢幕上的任何位置來發射已裝填的十字弓。

source_string: If you're using Action Buttons, tap :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use: to fire a loaded crossbow.
translation: 如果你使用動作按鈕，請點下 :tip_virtual_button_action_build_or_use: 發射已裝填的十字弓。

source_string: The Trident is a dual-purpose melee and ranged weapon. Press :_input_key.attack: to attack. Press and hold :_input_key.use: to draw the trident back. Release :_input_key.use: to throw the trident. The Trident is the best weapon underwater.
translation: 三叉戟同是近程和遠程武器。按 :_input_key.attack: 攻擊。按住 :_input_key.use: 將三叉戟向後拉。放開 :_input_key.use: 丟出三叉戟。三叉戟是在水底的時候最好的武器。

source_string: The Trident is a dual-purpose melee and ranged weapon. Tap mobs to attack them. Press and hold the Screen to draw the trident back. Release the press to throw the trident. The Trident is the best weapon underwater.
translation: 三叉戟同是近程和遠程武器。輕觸生物以攻擊牠們。按住畫面將三叉戟向後拉。放開即丟出三叉戟。三叉戟是在水底的時候最好的武器。

source_string: The Sword, Bow, Crossbow, and Trident have specific enchantments that you can get from the Enchanting Table or Anvil that will improve damage, durability and even light mobs on fire!
translation: 您可以利用附魔台或鐵砧來為劍、弓、十字弓和三叉戟加上專屬附魔，藉此提高傷害、耐久度，甚至還能讓生物著火！

source_string: Worlds in the Minecraft Marketplace Minecraft levels where our partners have altered the terrain and placed new blocks to create amazing structures and terrain for you to explore and enjoy.
translation: Minecraft 市集中的的世界，Minecraft 關卡是我們的合作夥伴改變了地形並放置了新的方塊，創造出美麗的結構與地形供您探索和享受。

source_string: Worlds can also include new items, mobs, blocks and even custom gameplay.
translation: 世界還可以包含全新物品、生物、方塊，甚至自訂遊戲玩法。

source_string: All of the content in the Marketplace is created by our professional commiunity creators.
translation: 市集中的所有內容均由我們專業的社區創作者所創造。

source_string: Worlds can do so much, we've created several Sub-Categories to help describe what they can do:
translation: 能在世界裡做的事很多，我們建立了幾個子類別來幫助說明能在世界裡做什麼：

source_string: Mini-Games are smaller worlds that include new game mechanics, challenges, or rules.
translation: 小遊戲是包含新遊戲機制、挑戰或規則的較小世界。

source_string: These games are made with multiplayer in mind, letting you test your skills and have fun with your friends.
translation: 這些遊戲在製作時考慮到了多人遊戲，讓您可以測試自己的技能，也能與朋友一起玩樂。

source_string: Survival Spawns let you start playing in a custom-built world, while still enjoying the classic survival mechanics of Minecraft.
translation: 生存起始點讓您開始在自訂世界中玩遊戲的同時，仍然能享受 Minecraft 的經典生存機制。

source_string: Just like in Survival mode you will have health and hunger, and need to fight dangerous mobs.
translation: 就像在生存模式中一樣，您將擁有生命值和饑餓度，並且需要對抗危險生物。

source_string: Adventure Maps let you use Minecraft to play a totally different kind of game.
translation: 冒險地圖讓你用 Minecraft 來玩一個完全不同的遊戲。

source_string: You can not break blocks or place new blocks in these worlds.
translation: 你不能在這些世界中打破方塊或放置新的方塊。

source_string: Dynamic Worlds allow you to explore the creative designs of our marketplace creators in a randomly generated map.
translation: 動態世界允許您在隨機生成的地圖中探索我們市集創作者的創意設計。

source_string: Worlds can have new biomes, customized structures (randomly generated buildings), new blocks, textures, and mobs.
translation: 世界可具有新的生態域、自訂結構 (隨機生成的建築物)、新的方塊、材質和生物。

source_string: How to Play: Your First Craft
translation: 遊戲說明：你的第一次合成

source_string: Many blocks, like wood, can be turned into useful items by crafting. To do this, you'll find a simple §ecrafting grid§f on the right-hand side of your inventory screen.
translation: 許多方塊，如木頭，可以透過合成將其轉變成有用的物品。要這樣做，你在物品欄畫面右手邊能找到一個簡單的§e合成格§f。

source_string: For example, put a single wood log anywhere on the crafting grid, and several planks will appear in the §eoutput slot§f.
translation: 例如，在合成格的任何地方放置一份原木，接著就會有幾塊木材出現在§e產出欄§f中。

source_string: Simply tap your shiny new planks and they will appear in your hotbar. Now you're ready to place them into the world!
translation: 只要輕觸閃亮的新木材，它們就會出現在快捷欄中。現在你準備好把它們放入世界了！

source_string: Simply drag your shiny new planks to your hotbar. Now you're ready to place them into the world!
translation: 只要將閃亮的新木材拖曳至快捷欄中就行了。現在你準備好把它們放入世界了！

source_string: Simply select your shiny new planks and they will appear in your hotbar. Now you're ready to place them into the world!
translation: 只要選擇閃亮的新木材，它們就會出現在快捷欄中。現在你準備好把它們放入世界了！

source_string: Some items require you to place your crafting ingredients in a certain shape - also called a §erecipe§f.
translation: 某些物品需要你將合成原料以特定形狀放置，也就是所謂§e配方§f。

source_string: Try placing two planks above each other to create some sticks. Useful for all sorts of things!
translation: 試著將兩塊木材放在一起，以製成一些木棍。此為萬用物品！

source_string: There was a problem connecting to Immersive Reader.
translation: 連接至沈浸式閱讀程式時發生問題。

source_string: There was a problem connecting to Immersive Reader. Please restart Minecraft Education and try again.
translation: 連接至沈浸式閱讀程式時發生問題。請重新啟動《Minecraft Education》並再試一次。

source_string: World import failed: Unsupported file format
translation: 世界匯入失敗：檔案格式不支援

source_string: Project import failed: Unsupported file format
translation: 專案匯入失敗：不支援的檔案格式
邀請好友加入您的遊戲

source_string: Invite Members to your Realm Server
translation: 邀請成員加入您的 Realm 伺服器

source_string: Some of your invites may have failed to send.
translation: 您可能有一些邀請傳送失敗。

source_string: You haven't added anyone to your friend's list!
translation: 您還沒有將任何人加入好友名單！

source_string: You haven't added anyone to your Realm!
translation: 你還沒有將任何人加入 Realm！

source_string: Something went wrong. We couldn't load your friends list.
translation: 發生問題，我們無法載入你的好友清單。

source_string: Something went wrong. We couldn't load some of your friends details.
translation: 發生問題，我們無法載入你的部分好友詳細資訊。

source_string: Double tap the invite at the top of the screen to accept
translation: 點選螢幕上方的邀請兩次以接受
