source_string: This item is not lost on death
translation: 此物品不會因死亡而丟失

source_string: :hollow_star: Can't Drop Items can't be: dropped, removed, crafted with
translation: :hollow_star: 無法丟棄物品不能: 丟棄、移動、用於合成

source_string: :solid_star: Can't Move Items can't be: moved, dropped, removed, crafted with
translation: :solid_star: 無法移動物品不能: 丟棄、移動、用於合成

source_string: You need Creative + Operator to spawn an NPC
translation: 你需要創造 + 操作員來生成一個 NPC
莉娜雷恩 - 創作者 (音樂盒)
亞倫切羅夫 - 懸崖峭壁
苦力怕頭形狀旗幟樣式

source_string: You need Creative + Operator to place this block
translation: 您需要創造 + 操作員來放置此方塊

source_string: Can hold a mixed stack of items
translation: 可以容納混合堆疊的物品

context: Example: Apple join code button

translation: %3 加入代碼輸入 %1 (共 %2 種)
context: Example: Apple join code entry 2 of 5

source_string: The join code you entered does not match any worlds that are currently available.
translation: 您輸入的加入代碼與目前可用的任何世界都不相符。

source_string: There was a problem connecting to the join code service. Please try again.
translation: 連接至加入代碼服務時發生問題。請再試一次。

source_string: Join codes are not available right now. Ask your host for their IP Address to join their game.
translation: 加入代碼目前無法使用。請詢問您的主持人以取得他們的 IP 位址以加入他們的遊戲。

source_string: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Is this the world you were trying to join?
translation: 這是您嘗試加入的世界嗎？

source_string: To find the IP Address, ask the host to pause their game. The IP Address and Port number can be found on the multiplayer tab of the Game menu.
translation: 若要尋找 IP 位址，請主持人暫停他們的遊戲。您可以在遊戲選單的多人遊戲標籤中找到 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

source_string: To find the Port number, ask the host to pause their game. The IP Address and Port number can be found on the multiplayer tab of the Game menu.
translation: 若要尋找連接埠號碼，請主持人暫停他們的遊戲。您可以在遊戲選單的多人遊戲標籤中找到 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

source_string: Generating a new code will not interrupt your multiplayer session.
translation: 產生新的代碼不會中斷您的多人遊戲。

source_string: We want to collect information about your machine to help improve Minecraft by knowing what we can support and where the biggest problems are. translation: 成就僅在設定為作弊的生存模式世界中可用。如果繼續，即使你在遊玩前切換回來，也沒有人能在這個世界上再次贏得成就。

source_string: Here’s what you need to know about Hardcore mode:
translation: 這是關於硬核模式你應該要知道的事情：

source_string: 1. When you die, you will not respawn — game over!
translation: 1. 當你死亡時，你將不會重生 - 遊戲結束！

source_string: 2. Hardcore mode can’t be turned off after the world is created.
translation: 2. 硬核模式無法在建立世界後關閉。

source_string: 3. After you die, you can see but not interact with this world.
translation: 3. 在你死亡後，你可以觀看，但無法與這個世界互動。

source_string: Achievements cannot be earned in this world.
translation: 在此世界無法獲得成就。

source_string: If you start playing with these settings, achievements will no longer be earnable in this world.
translation: 若您開始以這些設定玩遊戲，即無法在此世界中再贏得成就。

source_string: Achievements can be earned in this world, but you must sign in to a Microsoft account to earn them.
translation: 在此世界中雖可得到成就，但你必須登入 Microsoft 帳戶方能取得。
是否關閉跨平台多人遊戲？

source_string: The content that you are trying to use is not allowed in cross-platform multiplayer games. If you continue you will not be able to play cross-platform multiplayer games.
translation: 你嘗試使用的內容不允許在跨平台多人遊玩中使用。如果繼續，你將無法加入跨平台多人遊玩。

source_string: A pack already on the stack can't be applied with other packs. %s
translation: 堆疊中已有的套件無法以其他套件套用。%s

source_string: The pack you are trying to apply can't be applied with other packs. %s
translation: 您嘗試套用的套件無法以其他套件套用。%s

source_string: Continuing will remove all current packs and then add the pack you are trying to apply. This will remove all behavior packs from the world which can break the world and cause you to lose what you created.
translation: 如果繼續，所有目前的套件都將移除，然後加入您嘗試套用的套件。此操作將從世界移除所有行為套件，因而可能破壞世界並導致您失去已經創造的內容。

source_string: Continuing will remove all current packs and then add the pack you are trying to apply.
translation: 如果繼續，所有目前的套件都將移除，然後加入您嘗試套用的套件。

source_string: Content active in this world cannot be used in cross-platform multiplayer.
translation: 此世界中啟用的內容無法在跨平台多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: Content active in this world cannot be used in multiplayer.
translation: 此世界中啟用的內容無法在多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: The skin you're using cannot be used in cross-platform multiplayer.
translation: 你使用的外觀無法在跨平台多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: The skin you're using cannot be used in multiplayer.
translation: 你使用的外觀無法在多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: This world uses a resource pack or template that cannot be used in cross-platform multiplayer.
translation: 這個世界使用的資源套件或範本無法在跨平台多人遊戲中使用。

source_string: This world uses features that are still under development. It might crash, break, or stop working at any time.
translation: 這個世界使用的功能仍在開發中，可能會崩潰、中斷或隨時停止運作。

source_string: This update makes your world higher and deeper. It adds more blocks and caves under your current world, so there's more to explore underground.
translation: 此更新能增加世界的高度和深度。本次更新在目前的世界中增加了更多的方塊和洞穴，將有更多的地下內容可供探索。

source_string: Be careful! You're about to create a copy of your world with Experiments turned on. This new world might crash, break, or not work with future updates.
translation: 小心！您即將在開啟測試版的情況下為您的世界創建一個副本。這個新的世界可能會當機、中斷或無法與未來的更新配合使用。

source_string: Be careful! You're activating features that are still under development. Your world might crash, break, or not work with future updates.
translation: 小心！您正在啟用仍在開發的功能。您的世界可能會當機、中斷或無法與未來的更新配合使用。

source_string: Enables Fancy Bubble Columns. Fancy Bubble Columns may lower performance on some devices.
translation: 啟用花式泡泡柱。在部分裝置中花式泡泡柱可能會降低效能。
是否捨棄創作者的設定？

source_string: The experience that the creator of this template wants you to have might be broken if you unlock these settings. You might not be able to return to that intended experience if you continue.
translation: 如果你解鎖這些設定，則此範本的建立者希望你擁有的體驗可能會中斷。如果繼續，你可能無法回到預期的體驗。

source_string: Template World Options are locked to the values set by this template's Creator. Unlock to change them.
translation: 範本世界選項已鎖定，以保留此範本創作者設定的數值。解鎖即可變更設定。

source_string: Unlock Template World Options from Game Settings to change the packs for this world.
translation: 在遊戲設定中解鎖範本世界選項，即可變更此世界使用的套件。

source_string: Unlock Template World Options from Game Settings to be able to change permissions.
translation: 在遊戲設定中解鎖範本世界選項，即可變更權限。

source_string: Enables Education Edition chemistry features. Education gameplay may break your world. If you continue we will make a copy of your world starting with [EDU].
translation: 啟用《Education Edition》化學功能。教育版遊戲可能破壞您的世界。如果繼續，我們將在此功能啟用時複製您的世界，並以 [EDU] 為開頭命名您的世界。

source_string: Enables Education Edition chemistry features. This cannot be disabled after your world is created. Please note these features are best experienced on desktop devices with moderate to high memory.
translation: 啟用《Education Edition》化學功能。如果您的世界已經建立，就無法停用此功能。請注意，這些功能在使用有中高記憶體的桌上型裝置，才能獲得最佳體驗。
無論如何還是載入世界

source_string: Make a backup copy of my world
translation: 製作我的世界備份副本

source_string: To manage privacy settings, please visit https://account.xbox.com/Settings in any web browser.##disable_3rd_party_console_resource_pack_check
translation: 若要管理隱私權設定，請使用任何網路瀏覽器造訪 https://account.xbox.com/Settings。
取消連結 Microsoft 帳戶

source_string: Use Remote Connect for Microsoft account Sign In (requires restart)
translation: 使用遙控器連線至 Microsoft 帳戶登入 (需要重新啟動)

source_string: Want to try our new design?
translation: 想試試我們的新設計嗎？

source_string: §7Try out the upcoming redesign of this page. You can always switch back to the old experience.
translation: §7 試試這即將重新設計的頁面。你隨時可以切換回舊版體驗。

source_string: You'll have to start over if you go back to the new design. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation: 如果回到新設計，就必須要重新開始。是否確定要繼續？

source_string: Go to new design without saving
translation: 不儲存直接進入新設計

source_string: Editor Mode adds powerful tools for editing worlds. Intended for experienced creators on devices with a Mouse & Keyboard.
translation: 編輯器模式加入了強大的工具可編輯世界。適用於使用滑鼠和鍵盤的熟練創作者。

source_string: Editor Mode adds powerful tools for editing worlds. Intended for experienced creators.
translation: 編輯器模式加入了強大的工具可編輯世界，適合熟練的創作者使用。

source_string: Minecraft is currently in Editor Mode.
translation: Minecraft 目前處於編輯器模式。

source_string: Minecraft is not currently in Editor Mode.
translation: Minecraft 目前未處於編輯器模式。

source_string: Achievements cannot be earned in this project.

translation: 中斷與網際網路的連線

source_string: Oops! Something went wrong. Maybe check your internet connection?
translation: 糟糕！發生點問題。或許你應該檢查你的網際網路連線？

source_string: We fixed a few bugs in this release. We'll send you new patch notes when we have more to report.
translation: 我們修復了此版本中的一些錯誤。有更多需要回報的內容時，我們會發送新的發佈版本通知。

source_string: This device is no longer supported.

Our ability to support this device is coming to an end. You will continue to receive updates until March of 2025, when you will receive your final update for this device.%sAfter you receive the final update, you will still be able to play on your worlds, and access Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins). Realms managed with this device will continue to work for 6 months unless they are updated by the Realm owner on a different device.%sTo cancel your Realm subscription, you will need to do so in the Settings menu for Subscriptions on the device the Realm was created with.%sYou will no longer receive the latest updates and will be unable to play multiplayer with devices or Realms which are continuing to receive updates. You will also not be able to connect to certain servers.%sClick on the button for more information.
translation: 我們即將結束支援此裝置。你將持續收到更新，直到 2025 年 3 月為止，屆時你將收到此裝置的最後更新。%s收到最後更新後，你仍然可以在你的世界中遊戲，並存取市集購買項目 (包括 Minecoins)。使用此裝置管理的 Realm 將持續運作 6 個月，除非 Realm 擁有者在其他裝置上更新。%s若要取消 Realm 訂閱，你必須在 Realm 建立裝置上的「訂閱設定」功能表中進行取消。%s你也將無法連線到某些伺服器。%s按一下按鈕以取得更多資訊。

source_string: Our ability to support this device has come to an end. You will no longer receive updates as of March of 2025, and this is your final update for this device.%sYou will still be able to play on your worlds, and access Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins). Realms managed with this device will continue to work for 6 months from March of 2025 unless they are updated by the Realm owner on a different device.%sTo cancel your Realm subscription, you will need to do so in the Settings menu for Subscriptions on the device the Realm was created with.%sYou will no longer receive the latest updates and will be unable to play multiplayer with devices or Realms which are continuing to receive updates. You will also not be able to connect to certain servers.%sClick on the button for more information.
translation: 我們對此裝置的支援已經結束。從 2025 年 3 月開始，你將不會再收到更新，而這是此裝置的最後一次更新。%s你仍然可以在你的世界中遊玩，並存取在市集購買的內容 (包括 Minecoin)。從 2025 年 3 月起，使用此裝置管理的 Realms 將繼續運作 6 個月，除非 Realms 的擁有者在其他裝置上進行更新。%s如要取消 Realms 訂閱，你必須在建立 Realm 的裝置上，在「訂閱」的「設定」功能表中取消訂閱。你可以在任何支援的裝置或能登入你帳號的電腦上存取你的 Amazon 帳戶。%s你將不再收到最新的更新，並且無法與繼續接收更新的裝置或 Realms 進行多人遊戲。你也將無法連線到某些伺服器%s按一下按鈕以取得更多資訊。

source_string: Our ability to support this VR/MR graphic device has come to an end. This device will no longer be supported in updates after March of 2025, when you will receive your final update supporting this device.%sAfter you receive the final update, you will still receive updates on your PC and be able to play without a VR/MR device. From this point on you can keep building in your worlds, and your Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins) will continue to be available on a non-VR/MR graphics devices such as a computer monitor. You will no longer be able to use your VR/MR device with Minecraft as it will no longer be supported in the latest updates.%sClick on the button for more information.
translation: 我們對此 VR/MR 圖形裝置的支援即將結束。在 2025 年 3 月之後，此裝置將不再支援更新，屆時你將收到支援此裝置的最終更新。%s在收到最終更新後，你的電腦仍將繼續收到更新，並且你將能夠在不使用 VR/MR 裝置的情況下繼續遊戲。從此以後，你可以繼續在你的世界中建造，並且你在市集購買的內容 (包括 Minecoin) 將繼續在非 VR/MR 圖形裝置 (例如電腦螢幕) 上可用。由於 VR/MR 裝置將不再受最新更新支援，你將無法再將其與 Minecraft 搭配使用。%s按一下按鈕以取得更多資訊

source_string: Our ability to support this VR/MR graphic device has come to an end. This VR/MR device is no longer supported. You have received the final update supporting this graphics device, and you will still receive updates on your PC and be able to play without a VR/MR device. From this point on you can keep building in your worlds, and your Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins) will continue to be available on a non-VR/MR graphics devices such as a computer monitor. You will no longer be able to use your VR/MR device with Minecraft as it will no longer be supported in the latest updates.%sClick on the button for more information. We know this is an inconvenience, and deeply appreciate the time you spent with our game, and your support.
translation: 我們對此 VR/MR 圖形裝置的支援已經結束。此 VR/MR 裝置已不再受支援。你已收到支援此圖形裝置的最終更新，並且你的電腦仍將繼續收到更新，你將能夠在不使用 VR/MR 裝置的情況下繼續遊戲。從此以後，你可以繼續在你的世界中建造，並且你在市集購買的內容 (包括 Minecoins) 將繼續在非 VR/MR 圖形裝置 (例如電腦螢幕) 上可用。由於 VR/MR 裝置將不再受最新更新支援，你將無法再將其與 Minecraft 搭配使用。%s按一下按鈕以獲取更多資訊。我們知道這會造成不便，並衷心感謝你花時間玩我們的遊戲以及你的支持。

All Realms have been updated. You need to update your game to continue playing Realms.
translation: 所有 Realms 皆已更新。您需要更新遊戲，以繼續玩 Realms。

translation: 我們此刻無法連線到 Realms，不久會再試一次。

translation: 無法擷取舊版世界。清理額外的儲存空間以管理舊版世界。

source_string: The skin that you have equipped is from a content pack that is not allowed in cross-platform multiplayer. Continuing will disable cross-platform multiplayer for this world.
translation: 你所裝備的外觀來自內容套件，但這不可於跨平台多人遊戲中使用。如果繼續，將停用此世界的跨平台多人遊戲。

source_string: The skin that you have equipped is from a content pack that is not allowed in multiplayer. Continuing will disable multiplayer for this world.
translation: 你所裝備的外觀來自內容套件，不可於多人遊戲中使用。如果繼續，將停用此世界的多人遊戲。

source_string: Are you sure you want to delete the selected old world? This world will be lost forever! (A long time!)
translation: 確定要刪除所選舊版世界嗎？這個世界會永遠消失 (非常久)！

source_string: You cannot add friends because of how your Microsoft account is set up. Please ensure your online safety settings allow adding friends. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp.
translation: 由於你的 Microsoft 帳戶的設定方式，你無法新增好友。請確保你的線上安全設定允許新增好友。請參閱 aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp，了解變更這些設定的說明。

source_string: You cannot play on Realms because of how your Microsoft account is set up. Please ensure your online safety settings allow Multiplayer. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp.
translation: 由於 Microsoft 帳號的設定方式，你無法在 Realms 中進行遊戲。請確認你的線上安全設定可進行多人遊戲。詳情請參閱 aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp 中的變更設定說明。

source_string: You cannot chat with other players because of how your Microsoft account is set up. Please ensure your privacy settings allow communicating with others. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp.
translation: 由於你的 Microsoft 帳戶的設定方式，你無法與其他玩家聊天。請確保你的隱私權設定允許與其他玩家通訊。請參閱 aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp，了解變更這些設定的說明。

source_string: You will not be able to add new friends to play on your realm with you because of how your Xbox account is set up. This can be changed in your privacy & online safety settings on Xbox.com. Do you want to continue?
translation: 由於你的 Xbox 帳戶設定方式，你將無法新增朋友和你一起遊玩 realm。這可以在 Xbox.com 的隱私和線上安全設定中進行變更。是否要繼續？

source_string: You cannot save your worlds to your Xbox profile because of how your account is set up. This can be changed in your privacy & online safety settings on Xbox.com.##disable_3rd_party_console_resource_pack_check
translation: 由於你的帳戶設定方式，你無法將世界保存到 Xbox 設定檔中。這可以在 Xbox.com 的隱私和線上安全設定中變更。

source_string: You cannot play on Realms because of how your Microsoft account is set up. Please ensure your online safety settings allow Multiplayer and you have an active Xbox Live Gold subscription. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp.##disable_3rd_party_console_resource_pack_check
translation: 由於 Microsoft 帳號的設定方式，你無法在 Realms 中進行遊戲。請確認你的線上安全設定可進行多人遊戲，以及是否已有啟動的 Xbox Live 黃金訂閱服務。詳情請參閱 aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp 中的變更設定說明。

source_string: You cannot play on Realms because of how your Microsoft account is set up.##disable_3rd_party_console_resource_pack_check
translation: 由於 Microsoft 帳戶的設定方式，因此你無法在 Realms 上遊玩。

source_string: They will no longer have Operator level permissions by lowering their permission level.
translation: 降低他們的權限等級，他們將不再擁有操作者等級權限。

source_string: Visitors can freely explore your world, but cannot interact with blocks, items, or entities. Trust Players Off.
translation: 訪客可自由探索您的世界，但無法與方塊、物品或實體互動。[信任玩家] 已關閉。

source_string: Members are active players in your world who can break and create blocks, and attack mobs and other players.
translation: 成員為在您世界中的活躍玩家，可以破壞與創建方塊，以及攻擊生物和其他玩家。

source_string: Operators are members who can set player permissions and use commands to have more control over your world.
translation: 管理員為可以設定玩家權限，並使用指令控制世界的成員。

source_string: Certain commands like teleport are only available with cheats ON. Cheats can also be turned on through the Game menu under Game Settings. If you choose to turn cheats on, achievements will be disabled in this world.
translation: 某些指令 (如傳送) 僅在作弊功能開啟時可用。作弊功能也可以透過「遊戲設定」下的遊戲選單開啟。如果你選擇開啟作弊功能，在這個世界中將停用成就功能。

source_string: Certain commands like teleport are only available with cheats ON. Cheats can also be turned on through the Game menu under Game Settings.
translation: 某些指令 (如傳送) 僅在作弊功能開啟時可用。作弊功能也可以透過「遊戲設定」下的遊戲選單開啟。
在密技設為「開啟」時設定 OP
在密技設為「關閉」時設定 OP

source_string: You will no longer have Operator level permissions by lowering your permission level.
translation: 降低您的權限等級，您將不再有管理員等級權限。

translation: 主持人已將您從此工作階段中踢出。

translation: 確定要將 %s 踢出這個世界嗎？他們將無法再次加入此工作階段。

source_string: Are you sure you want to kick %s from the world?
translation: 你確定要將 %s 踢出此世界？

source_string: You have been banned from the session by the host.
translation: 主持人已將您從此工作階段中封鎖。

source_string: Are you sure you want to ban %s from the world? They will not be able to rejoin.
translation: 確定要將 %s 從這個世界封鎖嗎？他們將無法再次加入此工作階段。

source_string: You cannot access the Realms Feed because you do not have access to Clubs. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCClubsHelp.
translation: 由於您無法進入俱樂部，因此無法進入 Realms Feed。詳情請參閱 aka.ms/MCClubsHelp 中的變更設定說明。

source_string: You cannot post to the Realms Feed because you do not have access to Clubs. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCClubsHelp.
translation: 由於您無法進入俱樂部，因此無法在 Realms Feed 中貼文。詳情請參閱 aka.ms/MCClubsHelp 中的變更設定說明。

source_string: You have been removed from the session by the host.
translation: 主持人已將您從遊戲中移除。

source_string: Are you sure you want to remove this player from the world? When you remove this player a new join code will be generated so that they will not be able to rejoin.
translation: 您是否確定要從世界中移除此玩家？移除此玩家時，系統會產生一組新的加入代碼，這樣他們就無法重新加入。

source_string: You currently have no photos in your portfolio. Photos taken with the camera will show up here. You can also use the button below to add some.
translation: 您的相簿中目前沒有照片。用相機拍攝的照片將顯示在這裡。您也可以使用下方的按鈕新增照片。

source_string: Photos you take with the camera will show up here.
translation: 您使用相機拍攝的相片將在此顯示。

source_string: You do not have any photos in your inventory. Try using the camera to take a picture.
translation: 您的物品欄中沒有任何照片。試著使用相機拍攝照片。

source_string: Splash Potion of the Turtle Master
Lingering Potion of the Turtle Master
Differences between Character Creator and Classic Skins
translation: 自訂角色和經典外觀之間的差異

source_string: You make a custom character in Minecraft item by item.
translation: 你可以在 Minecraft 中分項目打造專屬角色。

source_string: Create a custom character in Minecraft piece by piece. Personalize your character's body, eyes, mouth, hairstyles, clothing, and more!
translation: 在 Minecraft 中分部位打造專屬角色。個人化你角色的身體、眼睛、嘴唇、髮型、服裝等！

source_string: A full body skin that is placed on the character. Classic skins cannot be modified piece by piece. You can also import your own full body skin that you created or downloaded.
translation: 裝備在角色身上的全身外觀。經典外觀不能分部位修改。也可以匯入自己建立或下載的全身外觀。

source_string: A whole-body skin texture that is placed onto a character.
translation: 可穿戴在角色身上的全身外觀材質。

source_string: You save %s minecoins with your Marketplace Pass subscription!
translation: 您的 Marketplace Pass 訂閱可以節省 %s Minecoin！

source_string: Unable to connect to the world. Please check your connection to the internet and try again.
translation: 無法連線至世界。請檢查你與網際網路的連線，然後重試一次。

translation: 載入外觀需要較長時間。繼續進行世界生成...

source_string: This may take a few minutes.
Please do not exit the game. Exiting might corrupt the export.
translation: 請勿退出遊戲。退出可能導致匯出資料損毀。

source_string: This may take a few moments
This may take a few moments...

source_string: World upload failed. Would you like to try again?
translation: 世界上傳失敗。是否要再試一次？
正在儲存世界資源套件

source_string: Invalid world file. Please reopen your world, save, then try again.
translation: 無效的世界檔案。請重新打開您的世界、保存，然後重試。

source_string: Your game is being saved. Please do not turn off your device.
translation: 您的遊戲正在儲存中，請勿關閉裝置電源。

source_string: This may take a few moments
We couldn't confirm if your world uploaded properly. Please join your Realm to check, then try again if it hasn't been updated to the new world.
translation: 我們無法確認您的世界是否上傳正確。如果尚未更新至新的世界，請加入您的 Realm 進行檢查，然後重試一次。

source_string: Failed to find a place to upload your world. Maybe check your internet connection?
translation: 找不到上傳世界的地方。是否要檢查您的網際網路連線？

source_string: It looks like you do not own the Marketplace template this world is based on. You can purchase it from Minecraft Marketplace.
translation: 您似乎沒有此世界的市集範本基礎。您可在 Minecraft 市集中購買。

source_string: We couldn't pack your world file for upload. Maybe your hard drive is full?
translation: 我們無法將您的世界檔打包上傳。或許是因為您的硬碟滿了？

source_string: Something went wrong while preparing to upload your world. If this keeps happening, restarting your device may help.
translation: 上傳您的世界時發生問題。如果這種情況持續發生，重新啟動裝置可能會有助於解決。

source_string: This world can't be opened because of a directory issue in the pack.
translation: 由於套件中的目錄問題，無法打開此世界。

source_string: You do not own one or more of the applied packs
translation: 您沒有一個或多個適用的套件
正在載入分割畫面外觀...
分割畫面外觀載入完成。

source_string: The world name contains words that others may find offensive and cannot be used.
translation: 世界名稱包含其他人可能會認為冒犯的詞語，因此無法使用。

source_string: You're playing in a world with Add-Ons! This will add new features to your Minecraft world.
translation: 你正在含有追加內容的世界中遊玩！你的 Minecraft 世界將會增加新的功能。

source_string: Don't stop with just one! You can load multiple Add-Ons onto a single world at once.
translation: 別再一次一個慢慢加了！你可以一次將多個追加內容載入一個世界中。

source_string: Advanced Tip: A Resource Pack can change the textures of different blocks and entities.
translation: 進階提示：資源套件可以變更不同方塊和實體的材質。

source_string: Advanced Tip: A Behavior Pack can change how different items, entities, or blocks work.
translation: 進階提示：行為套件可以變更不同物品、實體或方塊的行為模式。

source_string: Advanced Tip: An Add-On includes both a Behavior Pack and a Resource Pack. Make sure both packs are activated to ensure the Add-On works!
translation: 進階提示：一個包含行為套件和資源套件的追加內容。請確認已啟用該兩個套件，以確保追加內容能夠正常執行！

source_string: Add-Ons add new blocks, items, or mobs to your worlds.
translation: 追加內容增加新的方塊、物品或生物至你的世界。

source_string: Worlds and Add-ons are complex! While some work great together, you might get funky results with others.
translation: 世界和追加內容非常複雜！雖然有些很合適一起使用，但有些可能會造成奇怪的結果。

source_string: More Add-Ons mean more fun, but the game might take longer to load.
translation: 更多追加內容代表著更多樂趣，但可能會需要較長的時間來載入遊戲。
無法同步處理世界資料
正在同步處理世界資料

source_string: Some optional resource packs applied to this world include ray tracing. Your device is not compatible with advanced lighting and texture features so you will see the world without these advanced effects.
translation: 這個世界套用了一些可選的資源套件，其中包含光線追蹤。你的裝置不支援進階光影和材質功能，所以你會看到沒有這些進階效果的世界。

source_string: Some optional and required resource packs applied to this world include ray tracing. Your device is not compatible with advanced lighting and texture features so you will see the world without these advanced effects.
translation: 這個世界套用了一些可選和必備的資源套件，其中包含光線追蹤。你的裝置不支援進階光影和材質功能，所以你會看到沒有這些進階效果的世界。

source_string: Some required resource packs applied to this world include ray tracing. Your device is not compatible with advanced lighting and texture features so you will see the world without these advanced effects.
translation: 這個世界套用了一些必備的資源套件，其中包含光線追蹤。你的裝置不支援進階光影和材質功能，所以你會看到沒有這些進階效果的世界。

source_string: This world has optional Resource Packs applied to it. Would you like to download them before you join?
translation: 這個世界套用了一些可選的資源套件。你要在加入前下載它們嗎？

source_string: This world has optional Resource Packs and required Resource Packs from Add-Ons applied to it. Would you like to download all packs or only the ones required to join?
translation: 這個世界套用了一些來自追加內容的可選資源套件和必備資源套件。你想下載所有資源套件，還是只下載加入所需的資源套件？

source_string: This world has required Resource Packs from Add-Ons applied to it. Would you like to download them and join?
translation: 這個世界套用了來自追加內容的必備資源套件。你想下載它們並加入嗎？

source_string: The owner of this world requires players to download all Resource Packs applied to it. Would you like to download them and join?
translation: 這個世界的擁有者要求玩家下載所有套用到它的資源套件。你想下載它們並加入嗎？

source_string: Could not sync your world data. Would you like to try again?
translation: 無法同步至你的世界資料。是否要重試？

source_string: The world is not fully synced or has been corrupted. Try playing the world on a console where it's in a good state and try migrating it again.
translation: 世界沒有完全同步，或已經毀壞。請嘗試使用良好的主機進行世界遊戲，並再次嘗試遷移。

source_string: Local save successful but cloud sync failed due to quota. Free cloud space by deleting worlds from the settings menu.
translation: 本地儲存成功，但由於配額原因，雲端同步失敗。從設定功能表中刪除世界來釋放雲端空間。

source_string: Not enough local free space to support cloud sync.
translation: 本地可用空間不足，無法支援雲端同步。

source_string: The world has been corrupted. Please report this at bugs.mojang.com
translation: 世界已經毀損。請至 bugs.mojang.com 回報此問題

source_string: Syncing this world is taking a long time. Would you like to continue waiting?
translation: 同步這個世界需要很長的時間。是否要繼續等待？

source_string: This project has Resource Packs applied to it. Would you like to download them before you join?
translation: 該專案已套用資源套件，您要在加入前先下載嗎？

source_string: This project has Resource Packs applied to it that you must download to join. Would you like to download them and join?
translation: 該專案已套用資源套件，您必須下載套件才能加入。要下載並加入嗎？

source_string: Converting project to world and making a copy of your project...
translation: 正在將您的專案轉換為世界並製作專案複本…
正在將世界轉換為專案…

source_string: You are not currently connected to wifi. Mobile data charges might apply.
translation: 您目前未連接到無線網路。可能會收取行動數據費用。

source_string: The quiz will open in a new window. You may return to Minecraft after you have completed the quiz.
translation: 測驗將於新視窗開啟。您可以在完成測驗後返回 Minecraft。

source_string: There was a Realm Event. Check out the Story Feed in Minecraft to see what happened.
translation: 有一個 Realm 事件。請查看 Minecraft 中的故事動態來看看發生了什麼。

source_string: There are no available packs on this device.
translation: 此裝置沒有可用的套件。

source_string: Your packs are currently in use.
A pack has errors that will make it not function
translation: 一個套件發生錯誤，無法正常運作

source_string: A pack has warnings that might cause odd behavior
translation: 一個套件有警告，可能導致出現怪異行為
（請將資源套件檔案置於此處）

source_string: You cannot change Resource Packs while playing in a world.
translation: 您無法在世界中遊玩時變更資源套件。

source_string: You cannot change Behavior Packs while playing in a world.
translation: 您無法在世界中遊玩時變更行為套件。

source_string: This Realm contains resource or behavior packs that have expired from Realms Plus. You will need to either deactivate these packs or purchase them from the marketplace in order to play on the Realm.
translation: 此 Realm 包含已在 Realms Plus 中過期的資源或行為套件。您將必須停用這些套件或在市集中購買，然後才能在此 Realm 中玩遊戲。

source_string: Low memory. Textures will have reduced level of detail.
translation: 記憶體不足。材質將降低細節等級。

source_string: Resource packs are applied bottom to top. This means any asset that is in two packs will be overridden by the higher pack.
translation: 資源套件由下往上套用，換句話說，同在兩個資源套件中的資源會被較高的資源套件覆寫。

source_string: You can edit these in Settings.
translation: 您可在 [設定] 中加以編輯。

source_string: Resource packs are applied bottom to top. This means any asset that is in two packs will be overridden by the higher pack. Packs in your worlds will apply on top of these global packs. These resources are just for you. No one else will see the resources you set here. Resource Packs in your worlds or worlds you join will apply on top of these global resources.
translation: 資源套件由下往上套用，換句話說，同在兩個資源套件中的資源會被較高的資源套件覆寫。您世界中的資源套件會套用在這些全球資源套件的上方。這些資源專為您提供。其他人不會看見您在此設定的資源。您的世界或您所加入世界內的資源套件會套用在這些全球資源的上方。

source_string: Behavior Packs are applied bottom to top. That means anything that is in two Behavior Packs will be overridden by the higher one.
translation: 行為套件由下往上套用，換句話說，同在兩個行為套件中的內容會被較高的覆寫。

source_string: Resource packs are applied bottom to top. This means any asset that is in two packs will be overridden by the higher pack. These packs in your world apply on top of your global pack(s).
translation: 資源套件由下往上套用，換句話說，同在兩個資源套件中的資源會被較高的資源套件覆寫。您世界中的資源套件會套用在全球資源套件的上方。

source_string: Active Behavior Packs apply to all players.
translation: 啟用的行為套件適用於所有玩家。

source_string: Require players to download optional resource packs to join
translation: 需要玩家下載選用資源包才能加入

source_string: This world may not look or behave in the same way as non-modified worlds. You should save a copy of your world before continuing.
translation: 這個世界的外觀或行為模式可能與未修改的世界不同。你應該在繼續遊戲之前另存你的世界。

source_string: There was a problem loading pack %s. Restarting your game or redownloading the pack might solve the issue.
translation: 載入套件 %s 時發生問題。請重新啟動遊戲或重新下載套件，這樣可能可以解決問題。

source_string: There was a problem loading packs %s. Restarting your game or redownloading the packs might solve the issue.
translation: 載入套件 %s 時發生問題。請重新啟動遊戲或重新下載套件，這樣可能可以解決問題。

source_string: Stacking multiple Add-Ons may result in unpredictable experiences. World loading times could vary, and Add-Ons might behave unexpectedly.
translation: 堆疊多個附加內容可能會導致無法預測的體驗。世界載入時間可能有所不同，且附加內容的套用效果可能會與預期不同。

source_string: Removing packs from previously played worlds may result in permanent data loss. We strongly recommend making a copy of your world first!
translation: 從之前玩過的世界中移除封包可能會導致永久資料遺失。強烈建議您先複製您的世界！

source_string: This pack is a required dependency of another pack that is currently applied.
translation: 此套件是目前套用中另一套件的必要相依性。

source_string: This pack is missing one or more dependencies. Would you like to apply it anyway?
translation: 此套件缺少一個或多個相依性。是否仍要套用？

source_string: You are about to delete %s forever. Are you sure?
translation: 您即將永遠刪除 %s。是否確定？

source_string: This pack is currently selected! You are about to delete %s forever. Are you sure?
translation: 您目前選擇了這個套件！您即將永遠刪除 %s。是否確定？

source_string: You are going to delete the following packs forever:%sAre you sure?
translation: 您即將永遠刪除以下套件：%s。是否確定？

source_string: This account does not own this resource pack.
translation: 此帳號尚未擁有此資源套件。

source_string: This pack has a dependency (%s) that is incompatible with your device
translation: 此套件擁有與裝置不相容的相依性 (%s)

source_string: This pack has a dependency (%s) that is incompatible with your device because your device doesn't have enough memory.
translation: 此套件包含與裝置不相容的相依性 (%s)，因為裝置缺乏充足的記憶體。

source_string: This pack has a dependency (%s) that is incompatible with your device because your device doesn't have compatible hardware to support ray tracing
translation: 此套件擁有與裝置不相容的相依性 (%s)，因為您的裝置沒有相容硬體可支援光線追蹤

source_string: This pack is incompatible with your device.
translation: 此套件與您的裝置不相容。

source_string: This resolution is incompatible with your device because your device doesn't have enough memory.
translation: 此解析度與您的裝置不相容，因為您的裝置沒有足夠的記憶體。

source_string: This pack contains information to allow ray tracing, but your device does not support this option.
translation: 此套件包含允許光線追蹤的資訊，但您的裝置不支援此選項。

source_string: Looks for worlds from an older version of Minecraft. This might take a while to finish.
translation: 正在尋找較舊版 Minecraft 的世界。這可能需要一些時間才能完成。

source_string: Click a world to convert it into a playable world
translation: 按一下世界以將其轉換為可遊玩的世界

source_string: Looks for worlds from the retail version of Minecraft. This might take a while to finish.
translation: 正在搜尋 Minecraft 零售版的世界檔案。這可能需要一些時間，請稍候。

source_string: Click a world to convert it into a playable preview world
translation: 按一下世界以將其轉換為可遊玩的預覽版世界

source_string: You have converted your world. You can now find it in “all worlds”.
translation: 你已經成功轉換了你的世界。現在你可以在「所有世界」中找到它。

source_string: We have found %s old worlds from a previous version of Minecraft.
translation: 我們從舊版 Minecraft 中找到了 %s 個舊世界。

source_string: We have found %s retail worlds from the Retail version of Minecraft.
translation: 我們從零售版 Minecraft 中找到了 %s 個零售版世界。

source_string: You need to convert "%s" into the latest version of Minecraft to make it playable.
translation: 你需要將「%s」轉換為最新版本的 Minecraft 才能遊玩它。

source_string: Tap jump to exit the boat
Tap jump to exit the raft
Item can't be upgraded this way
translation: 無法以這種方式升級物品

source_string: Add Diamond armor, weapon, or tool
translation: 新增鑽石護甲、武器或工具

source_string: Want to get the most out of your equipment? You'll need a Smithing Table.
translation: 想要發揮裝備的最大威力？你需要一張鍛造台。

source_string: Use it to make all kinds of changes, for example by upgrading Diamond equipment to Netherite, or by making cosmetic changes with Armor Trims.
translation: 使用此材料進行各種改造，例如將鑽石裝備升級到獄髓錠，或更改紋飾護甲的外觀。

source_string: In order to upgrade your equipment, you'll need a Smithing Template. You can find a large variety throughout the world, which can be used for all kinds of upgrades.
translation: 為了升級你的裝備，你需要一個鍛造範本。您可以在世界各地找到各式各樣的物品，可用於各種升級。

source_string: Place a Template into the leftmost slot of a Smithing Table to see which items you need for the upgrade.
translation: 將範本放入鍛造台最左側的插槽，以查看升級所需的物品。

source_string: For example, to upgrade Diamond equipment to Netherite, you need a Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template, which you can find in Bastion Remnants. Then, place the Diamond equipment in the equipment slot and a Netherite ingot in the ingredient slot, and you're done!
translation: 舉例來說，若要將鑽石裝備升級到獄髓錠塊，你需要獄髓錠塊升級鍛造範本 (可在壁壘遺跡找到)。接著在裝備槽放入一件鑽石裝備，在原料槽槽放入一塊獄髓錠塊，這就大功告成了！

source_string: Item properties such as enchantments and armor trims will be retained, but the Smithing Template will be consumed when you upgrade your equipment. Don't worry - you can craft copies of them with your Crafting Table.
translation: 系統會保留附魔和紋飾護甲等物品屬性，但升級裝備時會消耗鍛造範本。別擔心，你可以用精製台製作副本。

source_string: Get creative and customize the look of your armor with Armor Trims. You'll need an Armor Trim Smithing Template to get started, which you can find throughout the world.
translation: 發揮創意，使用紋飾護甲自訂護甲外觀。您需要一個紋飾護甲鍛造範本才能開始自訂外觀，您可以在世界各地找到鍛造範本。

source_string: Place a Template into the leftmost slot of a Smithing Table to see which items you need for the upgrade. Then place a piece of armor in the equipment slot and a crystal or ingot in the ingredient slot. Done!
translation: 將範本放入鍛造桌最左側的插槽，以查看升級所需的物品。接著在裝備槽放入一件護甲，在原料槽槽放入一塊水晶或錠塊。搞定！

source_string: Only certain crystals and ingots can be used for Armor Trims. Try different kinds like Iron, Gold, or Lapis to create unique designs!
translation: 只有特定水晶和錠可用於紋飾護甲。嘗試不同種類的鐵、黃金或青金石，創造獨特的設計！
懸掛式緋紅蕈木告示牌
懸掛式紅樹林木告示牌
懸掛式扭曲蕈木告示牌

translation: 確定要刪除所選擇的物品嗎？物品將永遠無法使用！(時間很長喔！)  %s%s%s

translation: 以下世界可能停止運作：

source_string: The following content is dependent on this %s and may not continue to work correctly if you delete "%s":%s Do you still want to delete "%s"? This %s will be lost forever! (A long time!)

translation: 「%s」即將刪除。您仍擁有 %s，如果之後想要再次使用 %s，可以在市集中重新下載。

source_string: Are you sure you want to delete "%s"?
Did you want to break these?

translation: 某些其他物品需要您刪除的內容才能正常運作。您想要破壞這些物品嗎？

See our FAQ on minecraft.net for more details. %s+ RAM: 8GB or better %s+ CPU: Intel Core i5 or equivalent ##the %s will be turned into linebreaks. Don't reorder.
translation: 我們偵測到您的裝置不符合執行此套件的系統要求，因此您無法下載此套件。您可以在下方查看最低系統要求：%s+ GPU：具有硬體光線追蹤功能的 GPU，例如 NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 或更新版本。如需更多詳細資料，請參見 minecraft.net 上的常見問題集。%s+ RAM：8GB 或更高 %s+ CPU：Intel Core i5 或同等效能的產品

translation: 讓您的世界有更自然的外觀設計。

source_string: It may take some time for us to show your rating.
translation: 我們可能需要一點時間才能顯示您的評等。

source_string: Realms are available in Minecraft %s for all Realms subscribers for free! This is a new Realm that gives you the chance to try new features before their release.
translation: Realms 可在 Minecraft 中使用 %s 免費提供給所有 Realms 訂閱者！這是新的 Realm 資料庫，能讓您有機會在新功能發佈前先試用看看。

source_string: With a Realm subscription, you can create a new %s Realm using the “Create New” button in the main menu. If you don’t have a Realms subscription yet, please go to the full version of Minecraft to sign up.
translation: 訂閱 Realm 後，您可以使用主功能表中的「新建」按鈕來建立新%s Realm。如果您尚未訂閱 Realms，請前往完整版的 Minecraft 註冊。

source_string: All Realms screens and functions are available in %s except purchasing a new subscription or managing the subscriptions of existing Realms.
translation: 所有 Realms 的螢幕畫面和函數都可以在 %s 中使用，但購買新的訂閱或管理現有 Realms 訂閱除外。

source_string: Your %s Realm will remain active for as long as you have the paid Realm subscription that your %s Realm is linked to.
translation: 只要您的 %s Realm 所連結的付費 Realm 訂閱仍有效，您的 %s Realm 就會持續保持有效狀態。

source_string: Realms Plus is a subscription to a personal server supporting up to 10 simultaneous players, along with unlimited access to 150+ great Minecraft worlds, texture packs, skin packs, and mash-ups for one low monthly price.
translation: Realms Plus 是個人伺服器的訂閱內容，支援同時 10 名玩家連線，並且能夠以低廉的月費，無限制存取 150 種以上精心設計的 Minecraft 世界、材質套件、外觀套件和混搭套件。

source_string: A personal server allows you to create a shared world that is always online and accessible from any device with Minecraft Marketplace. Players that you invite to your Realm can play this world at any time.
translation: 個人伺服器允許您打造一個隨時連線的共用世界，您可以從任何能使用 Minecraft 市集的裝置存取。受邀到您的 Realm 的玩家能夠隨時遊玩這個世界。

source_string: Do my friends need to purchase Realms Plus to play on my Realm?
translation: 購買 Realms Plus 的好友才能在我的 Realm 上玩遊戲嗎？

source_string: Your friends don’t need to purchase a Realms Plus subscription to play on your Realm. You can invite any friend (that has their multiplayer permissions enabled) to join your Realm for free.
translation: 你的朋友不需要購買 Realms Plus 訂閱就可以在你的 Realm 上玩遊戲。你可以邀請任何好友 (啟用了多人遊戲權限) 免費加入你的 Realm。

source_string: Which devices support Realms Plus for Minecraft?
translation: 哪些裝置支援 Minecraft 的 Realms Plus？

source_string: Realms Plus is currently available on any platform where you can install Minecraft Bedrock Edition. You can play Realms and use any content from Realms Plus on any of these devices if you’re signed into your Microsoft account.##disable_3rd_party_console_resource_pack_check
translation: Realms Plus 目前可在任何能安裝 Minecraft：基岩版的平台上使用。如果你已登入 Microsoft 帳戶，則可以在任何這些裝置上玩 Realms 並使用 Realms Plus 中的任何內容。

source_string: Realms Plus members enjoy unlimited access to over 150+ great Minecraft worlds, texture packs, skin packs, and mash-ups, until either the subscription expires, or a pack leaves the catalog.

source_string: Where can I use Realms Plus packs?
translation: 哪裡可以使用 Realms Plus 套件？

source_string: Worlds and packs included in the subscription can either be played online, played on your personal Realm, or played on a local device. You just need to play online once every 30 days to validate that your subscription is active.
translation: 訂閱中包含的世界和套件可以在線上遊玩、在你的個人 Realm 上遊玩或在本地裝置上遊玩。你只需要每 30 天在線上遊玩一次，即可驗證你的訂閱是否有效。

source_string: What happens to my Realms and worlds when my subscription expires?
translation: 訂閱結束後，我的 Realms 和世界會怎樣？

source_string: If your subscription ends, you and your friends will no longer be able to play online together on Realms, and you will no longer have access to Realms Plus packs. You can download any world saved to your Realm (within 18 months of ending your subscription). If you used Realms Plus worlds, texture packs, or mash-ups you will need to purchase those packs in the store or, if those packs are still in Realms Plus, re-subscribe, to play those world templates.
translation: 如果訂閱結束，你和朋友將再也無法在 Realms 上一起線上遊玩，而且你將無法再存取 Realms Plus 套件。你可以下載任何已儲存至 Realm 的任何世界 (在訂閱結束後的 18 個月內)。如果你使用了 Realms Plus 世界、材質套件或混搭套件，則需要在商店中購買這些套件，或者，如果這些套件仍在 Realms Plus 中，請重新訂閱以遊玩這些世界範本。

source_string: Do I need Realms Plus and Marketplace Pass?
translation: 我需要同時擁有 Realms Plus 和 Marketplace Pass 嗎？

source_string: No. Marketplace Pass is a catalog of over 150+ packs for you to enjoy. Realms Plus is a 10 player Realm with Marketplace Pass included. We suggest that you subscribe to the one that’s right for you.
translation: 不用。Marketplace Pass 是包含 150 款以上的套件讓你享用的目錄。Realms Plus 則是包含 Marketplace Pass，可容納 10 名玩家的 Realm。建議你訂閱適合你的內容。

source_string: Marketplace Pass is a subscription for content to be used with supported versions of Minecraft (game sold separately) on Windows and other supported platforms on which you own the game (Minecraft Java & Amazon Kindle Fire Editions not supported); an active subscription is required to use Marketplace Pass content. We may occasionally provide content that remains available to you even after the end of your subscription, in which case we reserve the right to take down such content if it becomes incompatible or if our rights to the content expire. Subscription subject to change and/or retirement. Subject to the Microsoft Services Agreement (www.microsoft.com/msa) and the Minecraft EULA (https://www.minecraft.net/eula). source_string: This will remove your current world from your Realm's active slot and let you replace it with a new one. Your Realm's members will have access to your new world. Select "Cancel" to go and download a copy of the current world to prevent data loss or "Confirm" to continue and replace your world.
translation: 此動作將從 Realm 的使用中欄位刪除你目前的世界，並且替換成新的世界。你的 Realm 成員將能造訪你的新世界。選擇「取消」下載目前世界的副本，防止資料遺失，或是選擇「確認」繼續更換你的世界。

source_string: Are you sure you want to start broadcasting?

translation: 要用 Twitch 直播您的 Minecraft 遊戲實況，需要透過 mojang.com 連接 Twitch 帳戶。要現在完成這項設定嗎？

source_string: Before you can broadcast Minecraft through Twitch, you will need to migrate your Minecraft account to a Mojang account. Would you like to do that now?

translation: Twitch 驗證失敗。請到 mojang.com 重新連繫 Twitch 帳戶。

translation: 無法進行 Twitch 驗證。請稍後重試。

source_string: Unable to initialize the Twitch SDK.
The custom java version used to launch Minecraft has a different architecture than the one used to run the launcher. Please make sure these are the same, either 32-bit or 64-bit for both.
translation: 用來啟動 Minecraft 的自訂 Java 版本所採用的系統結構，與 Minecraft 啟動器並不相符。請確認兩者是否同樣使用 32 位元或 64 位元的系統結構。

translation: 無法載入用作 Twitch 實況轉播整合功能的函式庫。

source_string: Your video card needs to support at least OpenGL version 3.0 or support Framebuffer Objects via an extension to use the integrated Twitch broadcasting.
translation: 您的顯示卡必須最少支援 OpenGL 3.0 版本，或透過擴展元件以支援 Framebuffer Objects，方可使用 Twitch 直播整合功能。

translation: 很可惜，Mac 上的 Twitch 遊戲直播整合功能需要採用較新版本的 OS X。您必須使用 10.7 (Mac OS X Lion) 或更高版本，方可使用本服務。您想現在瀏覽 apple.com 了解升級的詳請嗎？

source_string: Corner Mode is used with the Detect button in Save Mode to define the area to save. It will only detect Corner Blocks with the same name as the structure being saved.
translation: 在 [儲存模式] 中透過 [偵測] 按鈕使用 [角落模式] 定義要儲存的區域。其只會偵測與已儲存的結構相同名稱的 [角落方塊]。

source_string: Export is disabled on Minecraft Marketplace world templates.
translation: Minecraft 市集的世界範本已停用匯出功能。

source_string: We failed to export the structure.
We failed to import the structure.
Note: Remix3D Upload service is no longer available, use Export to save locally instead.
translation: 注意：Remix3D 上傳服務已不再提供，使用「匯出」即可改為本機儲存。
